XXbsu041_u:753: saptāhāddhaviṣyāhāroṣitāṃ dvau trayo vā utpāditabodhicittaṃ upoṣadha upavāsocitāṃ citrakarā nipuṇatarāṃ praveśayet /
XXbsu041_u:754: mūlamantreṇaiva śikhāvandhaṃ kṛtvā, tataḥ suvarṇarūpyavividharatnapañcavicitrojjvalacārusūkṣmacūrṇatāmbrāṃ pratigṛhya, mahābhogaiḥ sattvaiḥ mahārājānaiśca dhārmikaiḥ likhāpanīyam /
XXbsu041_u:759: kuta evaṃvidhā bhogā vidhireṣā tu kalpyate /
XXbsu041_u:764: pūrvasthāpitakaṃ cūrṇaṃ maṇḍalācāryeṇa svayaṃ gṛhya, mahāmudrāṃ pañcaśikhāṃ badhvā mūlamantraṃ japatā taṃ cūrṇaṃ mudrayet /
XXbsu041_u:765: apareṇa tu sādhakācāryeṇa maṇḍalabahirdakṣiṇapūrvāyāṃ diśi vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā agnikuṇḍaṃ kārayet /
XXbsu041_u:766: dvihastapramāṇaṃ hastamātranimnaṃ samantāt padmapuṣkarākāraṃ bahiḥ padmapuṣkarākārā palāśakāṣṭhasamidbhiḥ agniṃ prajvālya śrīphalakāṣṭhasamidhānāṃ vitastimātrapramāṇānāṃ sādrāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktā mūlamantraṃ ṣaḍakṣarahṛdayena vā mudrāmuṣṭiṃ badhvā āhvayet /
XXbsu041_u:767: āhūya ca pūrvoktainaiva ekākṣaramūlamantrahṛdayena bhūyo aṣṭaśataṃ juhuyāt //
XXbsu041_u:768: tato maṇḍalācāryeṇa baddhoṣṇīṣakṛtaparikaraḥ ātmanā citrakarāṃśca nipuṇatarānātmanā kārayet
XXbsu041_u:769: tato maṇḍalācāryeṇa buddhabodhisattvāṃ manasi kurvatā pūrvoktenaiva dhūpamantreṇa dhūpaṃ daitā añjaliṃ kṛtvā sarvabuddhabodhisattvāṃ praṇamya, mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ namaskṛtya
XXbsu041_u:772: etena vidhinā prathamata eva buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ sarvākāravaropetaṃ ratnasiṃhāsanopaviṣṭaṃ śuddhāvāsabhavanasthaṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānamālikhet /
XXbsu041_u:773: likhitaśca maṇḍalācāryasyānusādhakena ātmarakṣāvidhānaṃ mūlamantreṇa kṛtvā sarvabhūtikā balirdeyā caturdikṣurdhvamadhaḥ bahirmaṇḍalasya kṣipet //
XXbsu041_u:774: tato snātvā agnikuṇḍasamīpaṃ gatvā śucivastraprāvṛtena śucinā kṛtā rakṣāvidhānena ghṛtāhutīnāṃ kuṅkumamiśrāṇāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyānmūlamantreṇa /
XXbsu041_u:775: tataḥ kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭena japaṃ kurvataḥ tatraiva sthātavyam /
XXbsu041_u:777: anekākāravikṛtarūpaghorasvaravātavarṣadurdinamanyatamānyatamaṃ vā vighnamāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā hutena sarṣapāhutayaḥ sapta hotavyāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:780: stambhitā bhavanti aśaktivantaḥ puruṣā mṛyanti vā /
XXbsu041_u:783: kiṃ punarduṣṭacetasā manuṣyāḥ, itare vā vighnā yamāntakakrodhabhayā nirnaṣṭā vidravanti ito ita iti //
XXbsu041_u:786: tato maṇḍalācāryeṇa bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ pratimāyā dakṣiṇe pārśve dvau pratyekabuddhau padmāsanopaviṣṭau paryaṅkenopaviṣṭau kāryau, tayoradhastād dvau mahāśrāvakau dharmaṃ śṛṇvantaḥ (Vaidya 28) kāryau teṣāmapi dakṣiṇataḥ bhagavānāryāvalokiteśvaraḥ sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitaḥ śaratkāṇḍagauraḥ
XXbsu041_u:787: padmāsanopaviṣṭaḥ, vāmahastena padmaṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇahastena varadaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:788: tasyāpi dakṣiṇataḥ bhagavatī paṇḍaravāsinī padmahastā dakṣiṇena hastena bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ vandamānā padmāsanopaniṣaṇṇā jaṭāmakuṭadhāriṇī śvetapaṭṭavastranivastā paṭṭāṃśukottarāsaṅginī kṛṣṇabhasmatṛmuṇḍīkṛtā /
XXbsu041_u:789: evaṃ tārā, bhrukuṭī svakasvakāsaneryāyathe susthitā kāryā /
XXbsu041_u:790: upariṣṭācca bhagavatī teṣāṃ prajñāpāramitā, tathāgatalocanā, uṣṇīṣarājā svakāryāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:797: ete ṣoḍaśa mahābodhisattvāḥ prasannamūrtayaḥ sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitā lekhyāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:799: sa ca yathāsmarattaḥ āgamataśca yathāsthāneṣu vā śeṣā lekhyāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:800: ante ca sthāne caturasrākāraṃ sthānaṃ sthāpaye padmapuṣpasaṃskṛtam /
XXbsu041_u:803: evaṃ dakṣiṇe pārśve bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ dvau pratyekabuddhau
XXbsu041_u:805: evaṃ prāṅmukhaṃ maṇḍalaṃ sarvataḥ praveśadvāraṃ kāryam /
XXbsu041_u:806: bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ pārśve aparau dvau pratyekabuddhau candanasiddhaśceti ālekhyau /
XXbsu041_u:808: teṣāmapi vāmataḥ āryavajrapāṇikuvalayaśyāmābhaḥ prasannamūrtiḥ sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitaḥ dakṣiṇe cāmaravyagrahastaḥ vāmena krodhamūrtihastaḥ vajramuṣṭiḥ vajrāṅkuśi vajraśṛṅkhalā subāhu vajrasena yathāveṣacinhasthānāsanasarvavidyārājñārājñīsaparivāraḥ rūpamudrādiṣu yathāsmaraṇā lekhyāḥ teṣāmapi vāmataḥ caturasrākāramubhayavajramudrāṃ likhet /
XXbsu041_u:809: likhya ca vaktavyam, ye 'tra sthāne na smaritā vidyāgaṇāḥ, te
XXbsu041_u:810: 'tra sthānena smaritā vidyāgaṇāḥ, te 'tra sthāne tiṣṭantviti //
XXbsu041_u:811: teṣāmupariṣṭāt vedyāramitāḥ bhagavatī māmakī ālekhyāḥ sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitāśca tāḥ prasannamūrtayaḥ
XXbsu041_u:817: sitātapatra, jayoṣṇīṣa, kamaloṣṇīṣa, tejorāśi, unnatoṣṇīṣa iti //
XXbsu041_u:818: ete ataḥ uṣṇīṣarājānaḥ pratyekabuddhānāṃ vāmataḥ ālekhya, dvāre buddho bodhisattvo kāryapraveśatadakṣiṇato lokātikrāntagāmī nāma jaṭāmakuṭadhārī saumyamūrtiḥ dakṣiṇahastena akṣasūtraṃ gṛhītvā vāmahastena kamaṇḍaluṃ
XXbsu041_u:819: dvārābhimukhaḥ īṣadbhrukuṭīvadanaḥ vāmataḥ praveśe mahābodhisattva ajitañjayo nāma ālekhyaḥ
XXbsu041_u:820: prasannamūrtiḥ jaṭāmakuṭadhārī daṇḍakamaṇḍaluvāmakarāvasaktaḥ (Vaidya 29) dakṣiṇahastena akṣasūtraṃ gṛhītvā varapradānakaraḥ īṣadbhrukuṭivadanaḥ dvārābhimukha ālekhyaḥ //
XXbsu041_u:822: ratnavimānaḥ, tatrastho bhagavāṃ mahābodhisattvaḥ mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ kumārarūpī kuṅkumagaurākāraḥ prasannamūrtiḥ cārurūpī īṣit prahasitavadanaḥ
XXbsu041_u:823: vāmahaste nīlotpalāvasaktaḥ dakṣiṇahastena śrīphalāvasaktavaradaḥ sarvabālālaṅkārabhūṣitapañcacīrakopaśobhitaḥ muktāvalīyajñopavītaḥ paṭṭāṃśukottarīyaḥ paṭṭavastranivastaḥ samantaprabhaḥ samantajvālamālākulaḥ padmāsanopaniṣaṇṇaḥ yamāntakakrodharājatadṛṣṭiḥ maṇḍalapraveśadvārābhimukhaḥ cārudarśano sarvataḥ ālekhyaḥ //
XXbsu041_u:824: tasya dakṣiṇe pārśve padmasyādhastād yamāntakaḥ krodharājā ālekhyaḥ mahāvikṛtarūpī samantajvālamālākulaḥ ājñāṃ pratīcchamānaḥ mahābodhisattvagatadṛṣṭiḥ sarvata ālekhyaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:825: vāmapārśve padmasyādhastācchuddhāvāsakāyikāḥ devaputrarūpiṇaḥ bodhisattvāḥ pañca ālekhyāḥ
XXbsu041_u:828: sarve ca te śuddhāvāsabhavanopaniṣaṇṇaḥ anekaratnojvalaśilātalākāraḥ samantajvālavicitrapuṣpāvakīrṇaścārurūpī ālekhyaḥ //
XXbsu041_u:829: bahiḥ samantāccaturasrākāraṃ catustoraṇākāraṃ caturdiśaṃ vicitrapañcaraṅgojjvalaṃ supraguṇarekhāvanaddhaṃ abhyantaramaṇḍalaṃ kāryam /
XXbsu041_u:830: pūrvāyāṃ diśi bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ upariṣṭād rekhābhiḥ madhye saṅkusumitarājendraḥ padmāsanopaniṣaṇṇaḥ tathāgatavigrahaḥ svalpamātraḥ kāryasamantajvālamālākulaḥ varadapradānahastaḥ paryaṅkopaniṣaṇṇaḥ tasya dakṣiṇataḥ uṣṇīṣacakravarttimudrā lekhyā /
XXbsu041_u:833: bhagavataḥ āryāvalokiteśvarasyopariṣṭāt prajñāpāramitāmudrāyā dakṣiṇataḥ bhagavānamitābhaḥ tathāgatavigrahaḥ kāryaḥ varapradānahastaḥ padmāsanopaniṣaṇṇaḥ samantajvālamālākulaḥ //
XXbsu041_u:836: bhagavatā saṅkusumitarājasya tathāgatasya vā mato uṣṇīṣatejorāśimudrā lekhyā samantajvālamālākulāḥ
XXbsu041_u:837: tasyāpi vāmataḥ ratnaketustathāgataḥ kāryaḥ, ratnaparvatopaniṣaṇṇaḥ dharmaṃ deśayamānaḥ nīlavaiḍūryamarakatapadmarāgavicitrajvālārciṣi nirgatasamantātsamantaprabha ālekhyaḥ //
XXbsu041_u:842: bhagavato mañjuśriyasyādhastānmahāmudrā pañcaśikhā nāma utpalamudrā vā lekhyā /
XXbsu041_u:846: vicitracārudarśanaṃ, catuḥkoṇavibhaktaṃ, catustoraṇākāraṃ caturdiśaṃ dvihastamātrābhyantaramaṇḍalato bahirālekhyam /
XXbsu041_u:847: pūrvasyāṃ diśi mahābrahmā caturmukhaḥ śuklavastranivastaḥ śvetastrottarāsaṅginaḥ śvetayajñopavītaḥ kanakavarṇaḥ jaṭāmakuṭadhārī daṇḍakamaṇḍaluṃ vāmāvasaktapāṇiḥ //
XXbsu041_u:848: tasya dakṣiṇataḥ ābhāsvaro devaputraḥ kāryaḥ kanakavarṇaḥ dhyānāntaragatamūrttiḥ paṭṭavastranivastaḥ paṭṭāṃśukottarīyaḥ suprasannavadanaḥ jaṭāmakuṭadhārī śvetayajñopavītaḥ paryaṅkopaniṣaṇṇaḥ dakṣiṇahastena varadaḥ //
XXbsu041_u:849: tasya dakṣiṇata akaniṣṭho devaputraḥ kāryaḥ sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitaḥ prasannamūrttiḥ dhyānagatacetasaḥ paṭṭavastranivasananivastaḥ paṭṭāṃśukottarīyaḥ //
XXbsu041_u:850: tasya dakṣiṇataḥ paryaṅkopaviṣṭaḥ dakṣiṇahastena varadaḥ śvetayajñopa vītaḥ //
XXbsu041_u:853: śakrasyādhastāccaturmahārājakāyikāḥ sadāmattāḥ mālādhāriṇo karoṭapāṇayaḥ vīṇādvitīyakā lekhyāḥ
XXbsu041_u:855: evaṃ dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśi avṛha anaya sudṛśa sudarśanaṃ parīttābha puṇyaprasavaprabhṛtayo devaputrā ālekhyā yathāveṣasthānāḥ //
XXbsu041_u:856: evaṃ paścimāyāṃ diśi cottarāyāṃ diśi teṣāmadhastād dvipaṅktyāśritā ālekhyāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:859: uttarāyāṃ diśi praviśato dakṣiṇaḥ dhanadaḥ, nidhisamīpasthaḥ sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitaḥ īṣadbhagnakirīṭa yakṣarūpī /
XXbsu041_u:862: priyaṅkaraḥ kumāra utsaṅgopaviṣṭo maṇḍalaṃ nirīkṣamāṇaḥ ālekhyāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:864: teṣāṃ ca samīpe yakṣāṇāṃ mudrā ālekhyāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:865: evamanupūrvataḥ varuṇo pāśahasta paścimāyāṃ diśi ālekhyaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:868: evaṃ dvipaṅktyāśritāḥ anupūrvataḥ yakṣarākṣasakinnaramahoragaṛṣayaḥ siddhapretapiśācagaruḍakinnaramanuṣyā manuṣyādyā oṣadhayaśca maṇiratnaviśeṣāḥ parvatāḥ saritaḥ dvīpāśca anupūrvataḥ sarve pradhānā lekhyāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:871: agniḥ samantajvālamālākulaḥ daṇḍakamaṇḍaluakṣasūtravyagrapāṇiḥ jaṭāmakuṭadhārī śvetavastranivastaḥ paṭṭāṃśukottarāsaṅgikaḥ śvetayajñopavīta kanakavarṇaḥ bhasmatripuṇḍarīkṛtaḥ //
XXbsu041_u:874: / sarvataḥ praviśato bahirmaṇḍale umāpatirvṛṣavāhanāstriśūlapāṇiḥ, umā ca devī kanakavarṇā sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitā, kārtikeyaśca mayūrāsanaḥ śaktyudyatahastaḥ kumārarūpī ṣaṇmukhaḥ raktābhāsamūrtiḥ pītavastrāanivastaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:875: pītavastrottarāsaṅgaḥ vāmahastena ghaṇṭāṃ gṛhītvā raktapatākāṃ ca anupūrvataḥ bhṛṅgiriṭi atyantakṛśākāraḥ mahāgaṇapatinandikeśvaramahākālau mātarāḥ sapta yathābharaṇapraharaṇaveṣasaṃsthānābhilekhyāḥ aṣṭau vasavaḥ, sapta
XXbsu041_u:878: aṣṭau grahāḥ, saptaviṃśatinakṣatrāḥ, yeṣu caranti bhuvi maṇḍale upagrahāścāṣṭā devā lekhyāḥ anupūrvaśaḥ pañcadaśa tithayaḥ sitakṛṣṇā, dvādaśa rāśayo ṣaṭ ṛtavo, dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraśca caturbhaginyaḥ nāvābhirūḍhāḥ bhrātṛpañcamāḥ salilavāsinaśceti saṃkṣepato mudrāsu vyavasthāpyā hi devatā anupūrvataśca dvipaṅktyā śritāśca kāryā saṃkṣepato maṇḍalatraye pitṛmaṇḍalāśrayaḥ abhilekhyaḥ caturasraśca /
XXbsu041_u:886: etadabhyantaramaṇḍalaṃ madhyamaṇḍale 'pi brahmā sahāmpatiḥ pūrvāyāṃ diśyavaśyamabhilikhitavyaḥ
XXbsu041_u:887: evamābhāsvaro dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśi, akaniṣṭha arūpinaśca devā maṇḍalākārā avyaktāḥ naiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanā devāḥ, uttarāyāṃ diśi śakro devarājā sayāmaḥ santuṣitaḥ sunirmitaḥ paranirmitaḥ parīttābhaprabhṛtayo devaputrā avaśyamekaikaḥ devarājo 'bhilikhitavyaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:889: evaṃ tṛtīyamaṇḍale 'pi uttarāyāṃ diśi īśāno bhūtādhipatiḥ sahomayāvaśyamabhilikhitavyaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:890: dvitīyadvārasamīpe kārttikeyamañjuśrīḥ mayūrāsanaḥ śaktipāṇiḥ raktāvabhāsamūrttiḥ pītavastranivastottarāsaṅginaḥ dakṣiṇahaste ghaṇṭāpatākāvasaktaḥ kumārarūpī maṇḍalaṃ nirīkṣamāṇaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:894: dakṣiṇapūrvataḥ catuḥkumāryāḥ kumārabhrātṛusahitā nauyānasaṃsthitā mahodadheḥ paribhramantyaḥ
XXbsu041_u:896: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi laṅkāpurī vibhīṣaṇaśca rākṣasādhipatiḥ, tatrasthitaḥ picumandavṛkṣāśritaḥ jambhalajalendranāmā yakṣarūpī bodhisattvo 'vaśyamabhilikhitavyaḥ //
XXbsu041_u:900: evaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi nandopanandau nāgamukhyau avaśyamabhilikhitavyau /
XXbsu041_u:901: grahamukhyaścādityaḥ paścimāyāṃ diśi kapilamunirnāma ṛṣivaro nirgrandhatīrtthakaraṛṣabhaḥ (Vaidya 32)
XXbsu041_u:904: uttarapaścimāsu ca diśāsu yakṣarāḍ dhanadaḥ, gandharvarāṭ paścaśikhaḥ, kinnararājā drumaḥ,
XXbsu041_u:906: saiṣā mudrāsu ca anupūrvataḥ yathāsthānaṃ saṃsthitā abhilikhitavyā iti //
XXbsu041_u:907: caturthamaṇḍalaṃ bahiḥ pañca rekhāḥ cittaṃ mudramālābhiścopaśobhitaṃ caturasraṃ catustoraṇākāraṃ caturmahārājavibhūṣitaṃ yathānupūrvasthitā /
XXbsu041_u:909: dakṣiaṇato vāmataḥ padmaṃ vajraṃ paraśukhaḍgaśūlatriśūlagadācakrasvastikakalaśamīnaśaṅkhakuṇḍaladhvajapatākaṃ pāśaghaṇṭākadvārakadhanurnārācamudgara etairvividhākārapraharaṇamudraiḥ samantāccaturasramālākulaṃ kuryādityataḥ bahiścaturdiśaṃ catvāro mahāsamudrāḥ sthāpanīyāḥ //
XXbsu041_u:910: uttarāyāṃ diśi caturasrākāraṃ maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā ubhayavajraṃ trisūcyākāraṃ samantajvālaṃ trikoṇākāraṃ maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā sthāpayet //
XXbsu041_u:911: dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśi dhanvākāraṃ maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā pātraṃ samantajvālaṃ sthāpayet /
XXbsu041_u:912: paścimāyāṃ diśi samantaprabhākāraṃ maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā nīlotpalaṃ sanālapatropetaṃ samantajvālaṃ vidikṣu ca catvāro mudrā bhavanti /
XXbsu041_u:913: uttarapaścimāyāṃ diśi pāśaṃ varttulākāraṃ maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā samantajvālaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi dīrghākāramaṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā daṇḍaṃ samantajvālaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi paraśuṃ samantajvālaṃ trikoṇākāraṃ maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā pūrvottarāyāṃ diśi khaḍgaṃ samantajvālaṃ sthāpayet //
XXbsu041_u:914: ālikhya sarvata ityūrdhvamadhastiryak trīṇi mudrādvārasamaye bahirmaṇḍalasyālekhyāḥ cūrṇaireva

XXbsu041_u:1119: saphalaṃ me etat karma adhiṣṭhitaṃ me buddhairbhagavadbhimahābodhisattvaiśca me /
XXbsu041_u:1120: tat paṭasūtraṃ sujīvitaṃ meha janmani avandhyā me mantrasiddhiḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1124: samaye jayasiddhi siddha datta dinna gṛhṇa śreyasaḥ saphalakaśakraprabhūta evamādayo anye vā śubhāṃ śabdāṃ pravyāharanti /
XXbsu041_u:1129: atha te tasmiṃ samaye krūraṃ pravyāharante gṛhṇa khāda khādāpaya naṣṭa vinaṣṭa kaṣṭa dūra sudūra nāstītyevamādayaḥ śabdā niścaranti vānaramahiṣakroṣṭukagardabhamārjārakutsitatiryagdvipadacatuḥpadānāṃ śabdā niścareyuḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1130: tato sādhakena jñātavyaṃ nāsti me siddhiriti /
XXbsu041_u:1135: tataḥ sādhakena tāṃ kumārīṃ kṛtarakṣāṃ kṛtvā kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭakāṃ kārayet /
XXbsu041_u:1136: pūrvābhimukhāmuttarābhimukhāṃ vā saṃsthāpya ātmanaśca haviṣyāhāraḥ tāṃ ca kanyāṃ haviṣyāhāraṃ bhojayet /
XXbsu041_u:1137: pūrvameva parikalpitaṃ kuśaviṇḍakaṃ tenaivaṃ vidhinā taṃ picuṃ kartāpayet /
XXbsu041_u:1138: tat sūtraṃ sukartitaṃ śuklaṃ pūrvaśikṣāpitakanyayā saṃhṛtya, aṣṭa pañca trīṇi ekaṃ prabhṛtī
XXbsu041_u:1139: ṣoḍaśamātrā palāṃ vā karṣāṃ vā supraśastagaṇametāṃ kuryānmadhyame aṣṭamāṃ gāthā itare pañcaika vā kṣudrasādhyeṣu karmasu yathāśaktitaḥ kuryāt sarvakarmiṣu mantravit //
XXbsu041_u:1140: tataḥ prabhṛti yat kiñcit pāpaṃ karma purākṛtam /
XXbsu041_u:1141: naśyate tatkṣaṇādeva sūtrārthaṃ ca na cetane // Mmk_4.1 //
XXbsu041_u:1143: na hi taṃtugato kṛtvā dhūpayet karpūradhūpanaiḥ // Mmk_4.2 //
XXbsu041_u:1148: tantuvāyaṃ tato gatvā mūlyaṃ datvā yathepsitam /
XXbsu041_u:1161: yathāmūlyaṃ tato datvā yathā vadati śilpinaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1162: prathame vāksamutthāne śilpinasya sa mantravit // Mmk_4.11 //
XXbsu041_u:1163: dadyāt puṇyaṃ tataḥ kṣipraṃ vīrakrayeti sa ucyate /
XXbsu041_u:1169: tato vidyādhareṇa tantuvāyasya poṣadhaṃ dattvā saśubhe nakṣatre prātihārakapakṣe śukle 'hani śubhagrahanirīkṣite 'nye vā śuklapakṣe sukusumitasahakāramañjarīvaratarupuṣpāḍhyavasantasamaye ṛtuvare tasmin
XXbsu041_u:1170: kāle tasmin samaye pūrvāhnodite savitari pūrvanirdiṣṭaṃ tantuvāyaṃ haviṣyāhāraṃ śucivastraprāvṛtabaddhoṣṇīṣaśiraskasusnātaṃ suviliptaṃ śvetacandanakuṅkumābhyāmanyatareṇānuliptāṅgaṃ karpūravāsitavadanaṃ hṛṣṭamanasaṃ kṣutpipāsāpagataṃ kṛtvā sarvatra bhāṇḍaṃ rajjvādyupakaraṇāni ca mṛdgomayābhyāṃ prakṣālya pratyagrāṇi ca bhūyo bhūyo pañcagavyena prakṣālayet /
XXbsu041_u:1173: śucau pṛthivīpradeśe apagatakolāhale vigatajanapade viviktāsane prasanne gupte puṣpārcite
XXbsu041_u:1174: tataḥ sādhakena saṃśodhanamantreṇaivāṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā śvetasarṣapān caturdikṣu ityūrdhvamadhaḥ vidikṣu ca kṣipet /
XXbsu041_u:1175: tato tantuvāyaṃ sarṣapaiḥ santāḍya, mahāmudrāṃ pañcaśikhāṃ baddhvā,
XXbsu041_u:1178: yadi jyeṣṭhaṃ paṭaṃ bhavati caturhastavistīrṇamaṣṭahastasudīrghaṃ etatpramāṇaṃ hi tantuvāyopacitaṃ kuryāt /
XXbsu041_u:1181: tatra bhagavato buddhasya vitastimadhyadeśapuruṣapramāṇahastamekaṃ eṣā sugatasya vitastiriti kīrtyate /
XXbsu041_u:1188: kṣudrakarmāṇi sidhyante kanyase tu paṭe sadā /
XXbsu041_u:1189: sarvakāryāṇi sidhyante sarvadravyāṇi vai sadā // Mmk_4.16 //
XXbsu041_u:1191: vidhibhraṣṭā na sidhyeyuḥ śakrasyāpi śacīpateḥ // Mmk_4.17 //
XXbsu041_u:1192: sidhyante kṣipramevaṃ tu sarvakarmā na yatnataḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1193: vidhinā ca samāyuktā itasyāpi tṛjanminaḥ // Mmk_4.18 //
XXbsu041_u:1199: lokottarāścāpi sidhyante maṇḍalā ye udāhṛtāḥ // Mmk_4.21 //
XXbsu041_u:1201: nānyeṣāṃ kathyate siddhiḥ ahitā ye jage sadā // Mmk_4.22 //
XXbsu041_u:1205: anupūrvaṃ tato śilpī paṭaṃ vāyeta yatnataḥ // Mmk_4.24 //
XXbsu041_u:1207: ahorātreṇa vai kṣipraṃ samāptiḥ paṭavāyane // Mmk_4.25 //
XXbsu041_u:1211: sacelastu tataḥ snātvā anyavāsānnivāsya ca // Mmk_4.27 //
XXbsu041_u:1214: bhūyo vayeta yatnena ślakṣṇaṃ sanghotaṃ sadā /
XXbsu041_u:1218: samāpte tu paṭe prokte pūrvakarmasu nirmite // Mmk_4.30 //
XXbsu041_u:1219: pramāṇasthe ahīne ca kuryād bhadre 'haniḥ samam /
XXbsu041_u:1220: avatārayet tato tantrā śuklapakṣe suśobhane // Mmk_4.31 //
XXbsu041_u:1221: pariṣphuṭaṃ tu paṭaṃ gṛhya daśā baddhānuśobhanam /
XXbsu041_u:1222: veṇuyaṣṭyāvanaddhaṃ tu paṭaṃ gṛhya tato vrajet // Mmk_4.32 //
XXbsu041_u:1225: sugandhapuṣpairabhyarcya śucau deśe tu taṃ nyaset /
XXbsu041_u:1227: yena tat picukaṃ pūrvaṃ saṃśodhya bahudhā punaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1228: tenaiva kārayed rakṣāmātmanaśca paṭasya vai // Mmk_4.35 //
XXbsu041_u:1236: na śādhayanti mantrāṇi sarvadravyāṇi vai punaḥ // Mmk_4.39 //
XXbsu041_u:1238: yastu śuddhamanaso nityaṃ śrāddho kotukamaṅgale sadā // Mmk_4.40 //
XXbsu041_u:1242: aśrāddhānāṃ tu jantūnāṃ śukla dharmeṇa rohate // Mmk_4.42 //
XXbsu041_u:1245: mantrasiddhiḥ sadā proktā teṣāṃ dharmārthaśīlinām // Mmk_4.43 //
XXbsu041_u:1248: tato sādhane śilpinaḥ, suśikṣitaciatrakaro vā ātmano vā kuśalā lekhyāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1249: aśleśakairaṅgaiḥ sarvojjvalaṃ raṅgopetaṃ varṇakaṃ gṛhya pūrveṇaiva vidhinā yathā tantuvāyayāyanenaiva lakṣaṇasamanvāgatena citrakareṇa peyālaṃ vistareṇa kartavya yathā pūrvaṃ tantuvāyavidhiḥ, tenaiva tatpaṭaṃ citrāpayitavyam ; svayaṃ vā citritavyam /
XXbsu041_u:1251: dhūpaṃ dahatā tenaiva mantreṇāṣṭaśatavāraṃ parijapya nāgakesarapunnāgavakulacampakavāpīkadhānuṣkārikamālatīkusumādibhiḥ taṃ paṭamabhyavakīrya pūrvābhimukhaḥ kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ svasthabuddhiḥ sarvabuddhabodhisattvagatacittaḥ sūkṣmavartipratigṛhītapāṇiranāyāsacittaḥ
XXbsu041_u:1254: sarvākāravaropetaṃ dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇalakṣita aśītyānuvyañjanopaśobhitaśarīraṃ ratnapadmopariniṣaṇṇaṃ samantajvālaṃ samantavyāmopaśobhitaṃ mūrtiṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānaṃ prasannamūrttiṃ sarvākāravaropetaṃ madhyasthaṃ vaidūryanālapadmaṃ adhaśca mahāsāraṃ dvau nāgarājānau taṃ padmanālaṃ dhārayayānau tathāgatadṛṣṭayo dakṣiṇahastena namasyamānau śuklau sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitau manuṣyākārarddhasarpadehanandopanandau lekhanīyau /
XXbsu041_u:1256: yad bhagavato mūlapadmadaṇḍaṃ viṭapaṃ, tatraiva vinisṛtānyanekāni padmapuṣpāni
XXbsu041_u:1258: teṣu ca padmeṣu niṣaṇṇāni aṣṭau mahābodhisattvavigrahāmabhilekhyāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1260: iṣatpadmakiñjalkagauraḥ kuṅkumakanakavarṇo vā kumārākārābāladārakarūpī pañcacīrakaśiraskaḥ kumārālaṅkārālaṅkṛtaḥ vāmahastanīloptalagṛhītaḥ,
XXbsu041_u:1261: dakṣiṇahastena tathāgataṃ namasyamānaḥ cārumūrtistathāgatagatadṛṣṭiḥ saumyākāraḥ īṣatprahasitavadanaḥ samantajvālāvabuddhamaṇḍalaparyeṣaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1263: tṛtīye sudhanaḥ, caturthe sarvanīvaraṇaḥ, pañcame gaganagañjaḥ, ṣaṣṭhe
XXbsu041_u:1266: kumārālaṅkārabhūṣitāḥ dakṣiṇapārśve bhagavata aṣṭau mahābodhisattvāḥ sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitāḥ varjayitvā tu maitreyaṃ bhagavataḥ samīpe āryamaitreyaḥ brahmacāriveṣadhārī jaṭāmakuṭāvabaddhaśiraskaḥ kanakavarṇaḥ raktakaṣāyadhārī raktapaṭāṃśukottarīyaḥ tṛpuṇḍrakakṛtacinhaḥ kāyarūpī daṇḍakamaṇḍaluvāmavinyastapāṇiḥ kṛṣṇasāracarma vāmaskandhāvakṣiptadakṣiṇahastagṛhītākṣasūtraḥ tathāgataṃ namasyamānaḥ tadnatadṛṣṭiḥ dhyānālambanagatacittacaritaḥ //
XXbsu041_u:1267: dvitīyasmiṃ padme samantabhadraḥ priyaṅguvarṇaśyāmaḥ sarvālaṅkāraśarīraḥ vāmahaste cintāmaṇiratnavinyastaḥ dakṣiṇahaste śrīphalavinyastahastavaradaḥ cārurūpī tathaivamabhilikhitavyam //
XXbsu041_u:1268: tṛtīye āryāvalokiteśvaraḥ śaratkāṇḍagauraḥ sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitaḥ jaṭāmakuṭadhārī śvetayajñopavītaḥ sarvajñaśirasīkṛta āryāmitābha daśabalajaṭāntopalagnopaviṣṭaṃ cārurūpaṃ cāmarahastāravindavinyastaṃ dakṣiṇahastena varadaṃ dhyānalambanagatacittacaritaṃ samantadyotitaśarīram
XXbsu041_u:1270: caturthe āryavajrapāṇiḥ vāmahastavinyastavajraṃ kanakavarṇaṃ sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitaṃ dakṣiṇahastoparuddhasaphalaṃ varadaṃ ca cārurūpiṇaṃ saumyadarśanaṃ hārārddhahāropaguṇṭhitadehaṃ muktāhārayajñopavītaṃ ratnojjvalavicchuritamakuṭaṃ paṭṭacalananivastaṃ śvetapaṭṭāṃśukottarīyaṃ tathaivāryāvalokiteśvaraṃ samantabhadraṃ tīrthanivāsanottarāsaṅgadehaṃ ākārataśca yathāpūrvanirdiṣṭam //
XXbsu041_u:1271: pañcamasmiṃ tathā padme āryamahāmatiḥ, ṣaṣṭhe śāntamatiḥ, saptame
XXbsu041_u:1276: bhikṣuveṣadhāriṇo mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaśarīrāḥ raktakāṣāyavāsasā paryaṅkopaviṣṭāḥ ratnopalaniṣaṇṇāḥ śāntaveṣātmakāḥ samantajvālamālākulāḥ sugandhapuṣpāṇiḥ kīrṇāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1277: tadyathā - mālatīvārṣikādhānuṣkārikāpunnāganāgakesarādibhiḥ puṣpaiḥ samantāt paṭamabhyavakīryamāṇaṃ likhitaṃ bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ vāmapārśve āryamañjuśriyasyopariṣṭāḥ anekaratnoparacittaṃ sudīrghākāraṃ vimānamaṇḍalaṃ śailarājopaśobhitaṃ ratnopalasañchannaparvatākāramabhilikhet //
XXbsu041_u:1280: ratnaśikhivaidūryaprabhāratnavicchuritasamantavyāmaprabhaṃ padmarāgendranīlamarakatādibhiḥ vaidūryāśmagarbhādibhiḥ mahāmaṇiratnaviśeṣaiḥ samantato prajvālyamāṇaṃ, īṣadādityodayavarṇaṃ tathāgatavigrahaṃ pītacīvarottarāsaṅginaṃ paryaṅkopaviṣṭaṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānaṃ pītanivāsitoparivastaṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇakavacitadehaṃ,
XXbsu041_u:1282: dvitīya saṅkusumitarājendraṃ tathāgataṃ kanakavarṇaṃ abhilikhet sutarāṃ nāgakesaravakulādipuṣpairabhyavakīritamabhilikhe
XXbsu041_u:1291: sarva eva kanakavarṇāḥ tathāgatavigrahāḥ kāryāḥ abhayapradānakarāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1292: upariṣṭācca tathāgatānāṃ meghāntarālasthāḥ paṭakoṇe ubhayataḥ puṣpavarṣamutsṛjamānāḥ dvau śuddhāvāsakāyikau devaputrau mabhilekhyau /
XXbsu041_u:1294: pratyekabuddhānāṃ cottarataḥ aṣṭau mahāśrāvakā abhilekhyāḥ bodhisattvaśiraḥsthānāvavarajopaviṣṭāḥ
XXbsu041_u:1295: tadyathā - sthaviraśāriputraḥ mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ mahākāśyapaḥ subhūtiḥ rāhulaḥ nandaḥ bhadrikaḥ kaphiṇaśceti //
XXbsu041_u:1298: sarva eva suśobhanāḥ śāntaveṣaṃ ātmano sudāntākārāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1299: mahāśrāvakā api kṛtāñjalayo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ nirīkṣamāṇāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1300: upariṣṭācca śuddhāvāsādeva sannikṛṣṭau aparau dvau devaputrau samantātpaṭṭavitānadīrghāpāyaśasobhanāgṛhītau sarvabuddhabodhisattvapratyekabuddhāryaśrāvakāṇāmupariṣṭāddhārayamāṇau divyamālyāmbaradharau devaputrau abhilekhyau /
XXbsu041_u:1301: bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ upariṣṭānmūrdhani muktāhāraratnapadmarāgendranīlādibhiḥ grathitaṃ ratnasūtrakalāpaṃ tasmiṃśca paṭṭavitānasuvinyastaṃ samantācca muktāhārapralambopaśobhitamabhilikhet /
XXbsu041_u:1302: adhaśca buddhasya bhagavataḥ padmāsanāt āryamañjuśriyasya pādamūlasamīpe nāgarājopanandapārśve mahāratnaṃ parvataṃ padmaśarādabhyunnataṃ ratnāṅkuraguhākandarapravālalatāpariveṣṭitaṃ ratnataruṃ maharṣayasiddhasevitaṃ tasya parvatasyottuṅge yamāntakaṃ krodharājānaṃ mahāghorarūpiṇaṃ pāśahastaṃ vāmahastagṛhītadaṇḍaṃ bhṛkuṭivadanamājñāṃ pratīcchamānaḥ āryamañjuśriyagatadṛṣṭiṃ vṛkodaraṃ ūrdhvaṃkeśaṃ bhinnāñjanakṛṣṇameghasaṅkāśaṃ kapilaśmuśrudīrghakarālaṃ dīrghanakhaṃ
XXbsu041_u:1303: raktalocanakaṃ sarpamaṇḍitakaṇṭhoddeśaṃ vyāghracarmanivasanaṃ sarvavighnaghātakaḥ mahādāruṇataraṃ mahākrodharājānaṃ samantajvālaṃ yamāntakaṃ krodharājā abhilikhet //
XXbsu041_u:1304: tasya parvatasyādhastācchilātalopaniṣaṇṇaṃ pṛthivyāmavanatajānudehaṃ dhūpakaṭacchukavyagrahastaṃ yathāveṣasaṃsthānagṛhītaliṅgaṃ yathānuvṛttacaritamāryamañjuśriyagatadṛṣṭiṃ sādhakamabhilikhe nandanāgendrarājasamīpaṃ bhagavataḥ śākyamuneradhastāt, dakṣiṇapārśve padmasarābhyudgataṃ mahāratnaśailendrarājaṃ kathitaṃ tathāgatamabhilikhet /
XXbsu041_u:1308: tatrāpāśritāṃ devīmāryāvalokiteśvarakaruṇāṃ āryatārāṃ sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitāṃ ratnapaṭṭāṃśukottarīyāṃ vicitrapaṭṭanivasanāṃ stryalaṅkārasarvāṅgavibhūṣitāṃ vāmahastanīlotpalavinyastāṃ kanakavarṇāṃ kṛśodarīṃ nātikṛśāṃ nātibālāṃ nātivṛddhāṃ dhyānagatacetanāṃ ājñāṃ pratīcchayantī dakṣiṇahastena varadādīṣidavanatakāyāṃ paryaṅkopaniṣaṇṇāṃ āryāvalokiteśvara īṣadapagatadṛṣṭiḥ samantajvālāmālaparyeṣitāṃ tatraiva vaidūryaratnaśṛṅge punnāgavṛkṣapariveṣṭitaṃ sarvataḥ śākhāsu samantapuṣpoparacitavikasitasupuṣpitaṃ bhagavatīṃ tārāmabhicchādayamānāṃ tenaiva cāpagataśākhāsucitraṃ pravālāṅku rāvanaddhaṃ vicitrarūparaṅgojjvalaṃ tārādevīmukhāvalokanamabhilekhyā //
XXbsu041_u:1310: sādhakasya tu rakṣārthaṃ likhed varadāṃ śubhām // Mmk_4.44 //
XXbsu041_u:1323: sughoro ghorarūpī ca niṣeddhā sarvanirghṛṇām // Mmk_4.50 //
XXbsu041_u:1325: khacare bhūcare vāpi pātāle cāpi samantataḥ // Mmk_4.51 //
XXbsu041_u:1326: nāśayati sarvaduṣṭānāṃ viruddhā ye śāsane mune /
XXbsu041_u:1327: caturaśraṃ samantādvai catuḥkoṇaṃ paṭaṃ likhet // Mmk_4.52 //
XXbsu041_u:1332: saptasphuṭo mahāvīryo maheśākhyo ananto nāma nāmataḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1340: ālikhe yo hi vidvāṃ vai tasya puṇyamanantakam // Mmk_4.58 //
XXbsu041_u:1341: yat kṛtaṃ kalpakoṭībhiḥ pāpaṃ karma sudāruṇam /
XXbsu041_u:1342: naśyate tatkṣaṇādeva paṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu bhūtale // Mmk_4.59 //
XXbsu041_u:1345: gatiyoninikṛṣṭānāṃ paṭaṃ teṣāṃ na vārayet // Mmk_4.60 //
XXbsu041_u:1348: dṛṣṭamātraṃ pramucyante tasmāt pāpāttu tatkṣaṇāt // Mmk_4.61 //
XXbsu041_u:1351: yat puṇyaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ pūjayitvā kalpakoṭi ye /
XXbsu041_u:1352: tat puṇyaṃ prāpnuyānmantrī paṭamālikhanād bhuvi // Mmk_4.63 //
XXbsu041_u:1353: sikatā yāni gaṅgāyāḥ pramāṇe yāni kīrtitā /
XXbsu041_u:1355: khaḍginaḥ sādhakā loke jitvā bahudhā punaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1359: yāvanti laukikā mantrāḥ bhāṣitā ye jinapuṅgavaiḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1361: siddhyante sarvamantrā vai paṭasyāgra tu magratamiti // Mmk_4.67 //
XXbsu041_u:1366: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ sarvaṃ tatparṣanmaṇḍalamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayeta sma /
XXbsu041_u:1367: asti mañjuśrīḥ aparamapi tvadīyaṃ madhyamaṃ paṭavidhānam /
XXbsu041_u:1369: śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru //
XXbsu041_u:1370: ādau tāvat pūrvanirdiṣṭenaiva sūtrakeṇa pūrvoktenaiva vidhinā pūrvaparikalpitaiḥ śilpibhiḥ pūrvapramāṇaiva madhyamapaṭaḥ suśobhanena śuklena suvratena sadaśena aśleṣakauraṅgairapagatakeśasaṅkārādibhiryathaiva prathamaṃ tathaiva tat kuryāt varjayitvā tu pramāṇarūpakāt tatpaṭaṃ paścādabhilikhāpayitavyam ādau tāvad śuddhāvāsabhavanaṃ samantaśobhanākāraṃ sphuṭitaratnamayākāraṃ sitamuktāhārabhūṣitaṃ tasmiṃ madhye bhagavāṃśchākyamuniḥ citrāpayitavyaḥ ratnasiṃhāsanopaniṣaṇṇaḥ dharmaṃ deśayamānaḥ sarvākāravaropetaḥ,
XXbsu041_u:1371: dakṣiṇapārśve āryamañjuśrīḥ padmakiñjalkābhaḥ kuṅkumādityavarṇo vā vāmaskandhapradeśe nīlotpalāvasaktaḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭaḥ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ nirīkṣamāṇaḥ īṣatprahasitavadanaḥ kumārarūpī pañcacīrakopaśobhitaśiraskaḥ bāladārakālaṅkārabhūṣitaḥ dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalāvanataśiraḥ bhagavataśca śākyamunervāmapārśve āryāvalokiteśvaraḥ śaratkāṇḍagauro yathaiva pūrvaṃ
XXbsu041_u:1373: kintu bhagavataśvāmaramuddhūyamānaṃ tasya pārśve āryamaitreyaṃ samantabhadraḥ vajrapāṇirmahāmatiḥ śāntamati gaganagañjaḥ sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhinaśceti /
XXbsu041_u:1376: teṣāṃ copariṣṭā aṣṭau buddhā bhagavantaścitrāpayivyāḥ sthitakā abhayapradānadakṣiṇakarāḥ pītacīvarottarāsaṅgīkṛtadehāḥ vāmahastena cīvarakarṇakāvasaktā īṣadraktāvabhāsakāṣāyasunivastāḥ samantaprabhāḥ sarvākāravaropetāḥ tadyathā - saṅkusumitarājendrastathāgataḥ ratnaśikhiḥ śikhiḥ viśvabhuk krakucchandakaḥ bakagrīviḥ kāśyapaḥ sunetraśceti /
XXbsu041_u:1378: dakṣiṇe pārśve bhagavata āryamañjuśriyasya samīpe mahāparṣanmaṇḍalaṃ ciatrāpayitavyam /
XXbsu041_u:1379: aṣṭau mahāśrāvakāḥ aṣṭau pratyekabuddhāḥ yathaiva pūrvaṃ tathaiva te ciatrāpayitavyāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1380: kintu āryamahāmaudgalyāyanaśāriputrau bhagavataḥ śākyamune cāmaramuddhūyamānau sthitakāyamabhilekhyau
XXbsu041_u:1382: śakraśca devānāmindraḥ sayāmaśca santuṣitaśca sunirmitaśca śuddhaśca vimalaśca sudṛśaśca atapaśca ābhāsvaraśca brahmā ca sahāmpatiḥ akaniṣṭhaśca evamādayo devaputrā rūpāvacarāḥ kāmāvacarāścānupūrvato
XXbsu041_u:1384: bhagavataḥ siṃhāsanastādhastātsamantānmahāparvataḥ mahāsamudrābhyudgataṃ yāvat paṭānte citrāpayitavyaḥ
XXbsu041_u:1385: ekasmin paṭāntakoṇe sādhako yathāveṣasaṃsthānākāraḥ avanatajānukaurparaśiraḥ dhūpakaṭacchukavyagrahastaḥ citrāpayitavyaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1387: vāmapārśve bhagavataḥ siṃhāsanasyādhastād āryāvalokiteśvarapādamūlasamīpe tasmiṃśca ratnaparvatopaniṣaṇṇā tārādevī abhilekhyāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1389: samantāśca tatpaṭaṃ muktapuṣpāvakīrṇaṃ campakanīlotpalasaugandhikamālatīvarṣikadhānuṣkārīkapunnāgakesarādibhiḥ puṣpairabhyavakīrṇaṃ samantāt paṭam /
XXbsu041_u:1390: upariṣṭācca paṭāntakoṇe ubhayānte dvau devaputrau mahāpuṣpaughamutsṛjamānau vicitrarūpadhāriṇau antarīkṣasthitau vārimeghāntargatanilīnau utpatamānau sitavarṇau abhilekhyāviti //
XXbsu041_u:1393: yatkiñcit kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ saṃsāre saṃsarato purā /
XXbsu041_u:1396: paṭasyā darśanā ye tu mañjughoṣasya madhyame // Mmk_5.3 //
XXbsu041_u:1400: rogī mucyate rogād daridro labhate dhanam /
XXbsu041_u:1401: aputro labhate putraṃ madhyame paṭadarśane // Mmk_5.5 //
XXbsu041_u:1402: dṛṣṭamātraṃ tadā puṇyaṃ prāpnuyād vipulaṃ mahat /
XXbsu041_u:1404: buddhatvaṃ niyataṃ tasya janmānte ca bhaviṣyati // Mmk_5.6 //

XXbsu041_u:1415: atha khalu bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ punarapi mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma /
XXbsu041_u:1416: asti mañjuśrīḥ aparamapi paṭavidhānarahasyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ kanyasaṃ nāma /
XXbsu041_u:1418: pūrvanirdiṣṭenaiva vidhinā śilpibhiḥ sugatavitastipramāṇaṃ tiryak tathaiva samaṃ caturasraṃ pūrvavat paṭaścitrāpayitavyaḥ pūrvanirdiṣṭairaṅgaiḥ //
XXbsu041_u:1419: ādau tāvadāryamañjuśrīḥ siṃhāsanopaniṣaṇṇaḥ bāladārakarūpī pūrvavat dharmaṃ deśayamānaḥ samantaprabhā arciṣo nirgacchamānaścārurūpī citrāpayitavyaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1420: vāmapārśve āryasamantabhadaḥ ratnopalasthitaḥ camaravyagrahastaḥ cintāmaṇivāmavinyastakaraḥ priyaṅguśyāmavarṇaḥ pūrvavaccitrāpayitavyaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1423: adhaśca siṃhāsanāt kanakavarṇaḥ parvato yāvat paṭānte citrāpayitavyaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1424: paṭāntakoṇasya āryamañjuśriyasya siṃhāsanasyādhastād dakṣiṇapārśve yamāntakaḥ krodharājā pūrvavaccitrāpayitavyaḥ
XXbsu041_u:1429: upariṣṭācca paṭakoṇāvasthitau parvataprāgbhārasaṃśliṣṭau utpatamānavimānapuṣpaughamutsṛjamānau śuddhāvāsakāyikau devaputrau śuddhaśca nāma viśuddhaśca nāma pūrvavaccitrāpayitavyau /
XXbsu041_u:1432: kanyasaṃ nāmato hyetat paṭaḥ śreyo kṣudrakarmasu // Mmk_6.1 //
XXbsu041_u:1433: yat kṛtaṃ kāritaṃ cāpi pāpaṃ karma sudāruṇam /
XXbsu041_u:1435: paṭaṃ tu dṛṣṭamātraṃ vai tatkṣaṇādeva mucyate /
XXbsu041_u:1437: kanyasaṃ tu paṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā kalā nāyāti ṣoḍaśīm // Mmk_6.3 //
XXbsu041_u:1438: yat puṇyaṃ sarvabuddhānāṃ pūjā kṛtvā tu tāpinām /
XXbsu041_u:1439: tat puṇyaṃ prāpnuyād vidvāṃ kanyase paṭadarśane /
XXbsu041_u:1440: śobhanāni ca karmāṇi bhogahetoḥ ihācaret // Mmk_6.4 //
XXbsu041_u:1445: sarve mantrā ihānītāḥ sidhyante paṭamagrataḥ // Mmk_6.6 //
XXbsu041_u:1446: śāntikāni sadā kuryāt pauṣṭikāni tathā iha /
XXbsu041_u:1447: dāruṇāni ca varjīta garhitā jinavaraistviheti // Mmk_6.7 //
XXbsu041_u:1452: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūta utthāyāsanād bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya, bhagavataścaraṇayornipatya, bhagavantamevamāha - sādhu sādhu bhagavatā yastathāgatenārhatā samyak sambuddhena subhāṣito 'yaṃ
XXbsu041_u:1453: dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvavidyāvratacāriṇāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya lokānukampāyai bodhisattvānāmupāyakauśalyatā darśitā nirvāṇoparigāminī vartmopaviśeṣā niyataṃ bodhiparāyaṇā santatirbodhisattvānāṃ sarvamantrārthacaryāsādhanīyametanmantrarahasyasarvajanavistāraṇakarī bhaviṣyatyanāgate 'dhvani nirvṛte lokagurau astamite tathāgatādityaṃ vaṃśe riñcite sarvabuddhakṣetre sarvabuddhabodhisattvāryaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ
XXbsu041_u:1455: sarvavidyāmantroṣadhimaṇiratnopagate sādhujanaparihīṇe nirāloke sattvadhātau sattvā bhaviṣyanti kusīdā naṣṭaspṛhatayā aśrāddhāḥ khaṇḍakā akalyāṇamitraparigṛhītāḥ śaṭhāḥ māyāvino dhūrtacaritāḥ te imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā ca satrāsamāpatsyante /
XXbsu041_u:1456: ālasyakausīdyābhiratā na śraddhāsyanti kāmagaveṣiṇo na patīṣyanti mithyādṛṣṭiratāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1457: te bahu apuṇyaṃ prasaviṣyanti saddharmapratipakṣepakāḥ avīciparāyaṇāḥ ghorād ghorataraṃ gatāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1458: teṣāṃ duḥkhitānāmarthāya avaśānāṃ vaśamānetā vaśyānāṃ bhayapradāya upāyakauśalyasaṅgrahayā mantrapaṭavidhānaṃ bhāṣatu bhagavāṃ /
XXbsu041_u:1460: atha bhagavān śākyamuniḥ mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ sādhukāramadāt /
XXbsu041_u:1461: sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ yastvaṃ tathāgatamarthaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ manyase /
XXbsu041_u:1462: asti mañjuśrīḥ tvadīyaṃ paramaṃ guhyatamaṃ vidyāvratasādhanacaryāpaṭalapaṭavidhānavisaraṃ paramahṛdayānāmarthaṃ paramaṃ guhyatamaṃ mahārthaṃ nidhānabhūtaṃ sarvamantrāṇāṃ, ṣaḍete ṣaḍākṣaraparamahṛdayāḥ avikalpato tasmiṃ kāle siddhiṃ gacchanti /
XXbsu041_u:1463: teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ damanāya upāyakauśalyasambhārasamantrapraveśanatāya niyataṃ sambodhiprāpaṇatāyā ṣaṭsaptatibuddhakoṭibhiḥ pūrvabhāṣitamahamapyetarhi idānīṃ bhāṣiṣye /
XXbsu041_u:1464: anāgatajanatāpekṣāya taṃ śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru /
XXbsu041_u:1467: atha khalu bhagavāṃ śākyamunirmantraṃ bhāṣate sma - om vākyārthe jaya /
XXbsu041_u:1473: ityete mañjuśrīḥ tvadīyaṣaḍmantrāḥ ṣaḍakṣarāḥ mahāprabhāvāḥ tulyasamavīryāḥ paramahṛdayāḥ paramasiddhāḥ buddhamivotpannāḥ sarvasattvānāmarthāya sarvabuddhaiḥ samprabhāṣitāḥ samayagrastāḥ sampracalitāḥ sarvakarmikāḥ bodhimārgānudeśakāḥ, tathāgatakule mantrapravarāḥ uttamamadhyametaratṛdhāsamprayuktāḥ suśobhanaṃ karmaphalavipākapradāḥ śāsanāntardhānakālasamayasiddhiṃ yāsyanti /
XXbsu041_u:1474: samavaśaraṇaṃ saddharmanetrārakṣaṇārthaṃ ye sādhayiṣyanti, teṣāṃ mūlyaprayogeṇaiva mahārājyamahābhogaiśvaryārthaṃ te sādhayiṣyanti /
XXbsu041_u:1475: teṣāṃ kṣiprataraṃ tasmiṃ kāle tasmiṃ samaye siddhiṃ yāsyanti /
XXbsu041_u:1476: antato jijñāsanahetorapi sādhanīyā hyete paramahṛdayāḥ saṃkṣepataḥ yathā yathā prayujyante, tathā tathā siddhiṃ yāsyanti samāsataḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1477: eṣāṃ paṭavidhānaṃ bhavati tasmiṃ kāle tasmiṃ samaye mahābhairave pañcakaṣāye sattvā (Vaidya
XXbsu041_u:1479: alpeśākhyāḥ alpajīvinaḥ alpabhogāḥ mandavīryā na śakyante ativistarataraṃ paṭavidhānādīni karmāṇi prārabhantum /
XXbsu041_u:1481: ādau tāvad vikrayeṇa sūtrakaṃ krītvā, palamātramardhapalamātraṃ vā,
XXbsu041_u:1482: hastamātraṃ dīrghatvena arghahastamātraṃ tiryakkarpaṭaṃ sadaśaṃ tantuvāyena vāyayitavyam /
XXbsu041_u:1483: apagatakeśamanyaṃ vā navaṃ karpaṭakhaṇḍaṃ pratyagramata ūrdhvaṃ pathepsataḥ dvihastacaturhastaṃ vā ṣaṭ pañca daśa cāṣṭaṃ vā suśuklaṃ gṛhya yathepsataḥ citrakareṇa citrāpayitavyam /
XXbsu041_u:1485: caikīkṛtya, niṣprāṇakenodake niḥkaluṣenāloḍya nave bhāṇḍe paṭaṃ plāvayitvā, divasatrayaṃ supidhānaṃ pathi taṃ sthāpayet /
XXbsu041_u:1486: kṛtarakṣāṃ śucau deśe ātmanaḥ śucirbhūtvā, śuklapakṣe pūrṇamāsyāṃ paṭabhāṇḍasyāgrataḥ
XXbsu041_u:1488: tadyathā - om he he bhagavaṃ bahurūpadharaḥ divyacakṣuṣe avalokaya avalokaya māṃ samayamanusmara
XXbsu041_u:1493: tata utthāya avilambitasiddhinimittaṃ svapnaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ paṭaṃ likhāpayet,
XXbsu041_u:1495: tat paṭaṃ tasmād bhāṇḍāduddhṛtya ātape śoṣayet /
XXbsu041_u:1496: śoṣayitvā ca bhūyaḥ anye nave bhāṇḍe nyaset /
XXbsu041_u:1498: tato bhūyo teṣāṃ paramahṛdayānāṃ anyatamaṃ mantraṃ gṛhītvā, yatheṣṭataḥ ṣaḍakṣarāṇāṃ bhūyo
XXbsu041_u:1501: ādau tāvat taṃ paṭaṃ gṛhya prātihārakapakṣe anye vā śukle 'hani
XXbsu041_u:1502: śubhanakṣatrasaṃyukte śubhāyāṃ tithau śuklapakṣadivase vā suśobhanaiḥ śakunaiḥ maṅgalasammatāyāṃ rātrau ardharātrakālasamaye upoṣadhikena citrakareṇa taṃ paṭaṃ citrāpayet śucau pradeśe karpūradhūpaṃ dahatā //
XXbsu041_u:1503: ādau tāvadāryamañjuśriyaṃ bāladārakākāraṃ pañcacīrakaśiraskaṃ bālālaṅkārabhūṣitaṃ kanakavarṇaṃ nīlapaṭṭacalanikānivasitaṃ nīlapaṭṭāṃśukottarīyaṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānaṃ siṃhāsane ardhaparyaṅkopaviṣṭadakṣiṇacaraṇaṃ ratnapādapīṭhasthaṃ sthāpitasiṃhāsanopaviṣṭaṃ sarvālaṅkāropetaṃ cārudarśanaṃ īṣasmitamukhaṃ sādhakagatadṛṣṭiṃ citrāpayet //
XXbsu041_u:1504: dakṣiṇe pārśve āryasamantabhadraṃ sitacāmaroddhūyamānaṃ priyaṅguśyāmaṃ vāmahastacintāmaṇivinyastaṃ sarvāṅgaśobhanaṃ sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitaṃ nīlapaṭṭacalanikānivastaṃ muktāhārayajñopavītaṃ sikataṃ śvetapadmāsanasthaṃ ciatrāpayitavyam //
XXbsu041_u:1505: āryamañjuśriyasya vāmapārśve āryāvalokiteśvaraḥ nīlapaṭṭavalanikānivastaḥ sarvāṅgaśobhanaḥ sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitaḥ muktāhārayajñopavītaḥ vāmahaste śvetapadmavinyastaḥ dakṣiṇahaste sitoddhūyamānacamaraḥ hemadaṇḍavinyastaḥ saumyākāraḥ āryamañjuśriyagatadṛṣṭiḥ tathaivāryasamantabhadraḥ śvetapadmāsanasthau ubhāvapyetau abhilekhyau ekapadmaviṭapitthitau //
XXbsu041_u:1509: aparasmiṃ padme āryasamantabhadraḥ, tṛtīye padme āryāvalokiteśvaraḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1510: śobhanaṃ ca tat padmadaṇḍaṃ marakatapadmākāraṃ anekapadmapuṣpamukulitaṃ patropetaṃ vikasitārdhavikasitapuṣpamahāsarānavataptoitthitaṃ dvau nāgarājāvaṣṭabdhanābhaṃ nandopanandasandhāritaṃ tat padmadaṇḍaṃ sitavarṇā ca tau nāgarājānau saptasphaṭāvabhūṣitau sarvālaṅkāraśobhitaśarīrau manuṣyārdhakāyau ahibhogāṅkitamūrtayaḥ āryamañjuśriyaṃ nirīkṣamāṇau jalāntārdhanilīnau maṇiratnopaśobhitacchadau likhāpayitavyau samantācca mahāsaraṃ adhastāt sādhakaḥ dakṣiṇapārśve paṭāntakoṇe āryamañjuśriyasya vatkramaṇḍala nirīkṣamāṇo dhūpakaṭacchakavyagrahastaḥ avanataśirakorparajānukāyaḥ yathā veṣaparṇataḥ, tathāmabhilekhyam upariṣṭādāryamañjuśriyasya ubhau patāntakoṇābhyāṃ dvau devaputrau mālādhāriṇau puṣpamālāgṛhītau utpatamānau meghāntarnilīnau mahāpuṣpaughamutsṛjamānau suśobhanau abhilekhyau //
XXbsu041_u:1513: āryamañjuśrīḥ dharmaṃ deśayamānaḥ āryasamantabhadraḥ āryāvalokiteśvaraścamaravinyastapāṇayo likhāpayitavyāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1514: yathābhirucitakaṃ vā sādhakasya trīṇi rūpakāṇi avaśyaṃ likhāpayitavyāni /
XXbsu041_u:1515: yatheṣṭākārā vā yathāsaṃsthānasaṃsthitā vā sādhakasya yathā yathā rocate tathā tathā likhitavyāni
XXbsu041_u:1516: madhye va āryamañjuśrīḥ, ubhayānte ca āryāvalokiteśvaraḥ, samantabhadraśca yathepsitaḥ anya avaśyaṃ likhāpayitavyāni /
XXbsu041_u:1517: yathālabdhe vā karpaṭakhaṇḍe vitastihastamātre vā ātmanā vā pareṇa vā citrakareṇa poṣadhikena vā apoṣadhikena vā śrāddhena vā aśrāddhena vā śucinā vā aśucinā vā śīlavatena vā duḥśīlena vā citrakareṇa likhāpayitavyaḥ //
XXbsu041_u:1518: ātmanā sādhakena avaśyaṃ kṛtapuraścaraṇena śrāddhena utpāditabodhicittena avaśyaṃ bhavitavyamiti
XXbsu041_u:1519: evaṃ sidhyanti mantrā vai nānyeṣāṃ pāpakāriṇām /
XXbsu041_u:1520: śrāddhena tathā bhūtvā sādhanīyā mantradevatāḥ // Mmk_7.1 //
XXbsu041_u:1522: śraddhā hi paramaṃ yānaṃ yena yānti vināyakāḥ // Mmk_7.2 //
XXbsu041_u:1523: aśrāddhasya manuṣyasya śuklo dharmo na rohate /
XXbsu041_u:1525: śrāddhe sthitasya martyasya boddhāraṃ hi karmaṇā /
XXbsu041_u:1526: sidhyante devatāstasya aśrāddhasya na sidhyati // Mmk_7.4 //
XXbsu041_u:1529: laukikā devatā ye 'pi ye 'pi lokottarā tathā /
XXbsu041_u:1530: sarve vai śraddadhānasya sidhyate vigatakalmaṣaḥ // Mmk_7.5 //
XXbsu041_u:1532: nānyeṣāṃ kathyate siddhiḥ śāsane 'smin nivāritāḥ // Mmk_7.6 //
XXbsu041_u:1533: paṭaḥ svalpo viśeṣo vā madhyamo parikīrtitaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1534: adhunā tu pravakṣyāmi sarvakarmasu sādhanamiti // Mmk_7.7 //
XXbsu041_u:1535: bodhisattvapiṭakānmahāyānavaipulyasūtrādāryamañjuśriyamūlakalpāt saptamaḥ paṭalavisarāt caturthaḥ paṭavidhānapaṭalavisaraḥ parisamāpta iti //
XXbsu041_u:1538: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunirmañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma /
XXbsu041_u:1539: ye te mañjuśrīḥ tvayā nirdiṣṭā sattvā teṣāmarthāya idaṃ paṭavidhānaṃ visaramākhyātam /
XXbsu041_u:1541: teṣāmarthāya sādhanopayikaṃ guṇavistaraprabhedavibhāgaśo karmavibhāgaṃ samanubhāṣiṣyāmi taṃ śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru bhāṣiṣye /
XXbsu041_u:1549: atha bhagavān śākyamuniḥ sarvāvantaṃ parṣanmaṇḍalamavalokya smitamakārṣīt
XXbsu041_u:1550: / atha bhagavataḥ śākyamunirmukhadvārāt nīlapītasphaṭikavarṇādayo raśmayo niścaranti sma
XXbsu041_u:1551: samanantaraniścaritā ca raśmayo sarvāvantaṃ parṣanmaṇḍalaṃ avabhāsya trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ sarvamārabhavanaṃ jihmīkṛtya sarvanakṣatradyotiśailagaṇaprabhāṃ yatremau candrasūryau mahardhikau mahānubhāvau tayā prabhayā te 'pi jihmīkṛtau
XXbsu041_u:1553: na virocante jihmīkṛtāni ca saṃdṛśyante sarvamaṇimantraupadhiratnaprabhāṃ niḥprabhīkṛtya punareva bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ mukhadvārāntardhīyate sma //
XXbsu041_u:1554: atha khalu vajrapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tatraiva parṣanmaṇḍale sannipatito 'bhūt sanniṣaṇṇaḥ
XXbsu041_u:1555: sa utthāyāsanāt sattvaramāṇarūpo bhagavataścaraṇayornipatya bhagavantametadavocat - nāhetukaṃ nāpratyayaṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti /
XXbsu041_u:1556: ko bhagavan hetuḥ, kaḥ pratyayo smitasya prāviṣkaraṇāya //
XXbsu041_u:1562: yo idaṃ sūtrendrarājaṃ mañjuśrīmūlakalpā vidyācaryānuṣṭhānakarmasādhanopayikasamavaśaraṇadharmameghāniḥśritaṃ samanupraveśānuvartakaṃ kariṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti śraddhāsyanti pustakalikhitaṃ kṛtvāḥ pūjayiṣyanti vandanacūrṇānulepanadhūpamālyaiḥ chatradhvajapatākaiḥ vividhairvā prakārairvādyaviśeṣairvā nānātūryatāḍāvacaraiḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1563: antaśaḥ anumodanāsahagataṃ vā cittasantatirvā pratialapsyante romaharṣaṇaṃ sañjanaṃ vā kariṣyanti vidyāprabhāvaśaktiṃ vā śrutvā saṃhṛṣyante anumodiṣyante caryāṃ vā pratipatsyante /
XXbsu041_u:1564: vyākṛtāste mayā anuttarāyāṃ samyak sambodho sarve te bhaviṣyanti /
XXbsu041_u:1566: ata eva jināḥ smitaṃ kurvanti nānyathā iti //
XXbsu041_u:1567: ādau tāvad dṛṣṭasamayaḥ kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ labdhābhiṣekaḥ asmin kalparājamūlamantrahṛdayaṃ upahṛdayaṃ vā anyataraṃ vā mantraṃ gṛhītvā ekākṣaraṃ vā anyaṃ vā yathepsitaṃ mahāraṇyaṃ gatvā triṃśallakṣāṇi jape phalodakāhāraḥ mūlaparṇabhakṣo vā kṛtapuraścaraṇo bhavati //
XXbsu041_u:1569: tato parvatāyamabhiruhya jyeṣṭhaṃ paṭaṃ paścānmukhaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya, ātmanā pūrvābhimukho kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ śvetapadmānāṃ śvetakuṅkumābhyaktānāṃ lakṣamekaṃ bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ
XXbsu041_u:1574: tato 'rdharātrakālasamaye śuklapūrṇamāsyāṃ prātihārakapratipūrṇāyāṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ agnikuṇḍaṃ kṛtvā padmākāraṃ
XXbsu041_u:1578: tataḥ bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ raśmayo niścaranti samantācca paṭaḥ ekajvālībhūto bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:1579: tataḥ sādhakena sattvaramāṇarūpeṇa paṭaṃ triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya sarvabuddhabodhisattvapratyekabuddhāryaśrāvakāṇāṃ praṇamya paṭaṃ grahītavyam //
XXbsu041_u:1583: yatrāsau bhagavāṃ saṅkusumitarājendrastathāgataḥ tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati dharmaṃ ca deśayati āryamañjuśriyaṃ ca sākṣāt paśyati dharmaṃ śṛṇoti anekānyapi bodhisattvaśatasahasrā paśyati tāṃśca paryupāste mahākalpasahasraṃ ajarāmaralīlī bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:1584: paṭastatraiva tiṣṭhati sarvabuddhabodhisattvādhiṣṭhito bhavati teṣāṃ cādhiṣṭhānaṃ sañjānīte kṣetraśatasahasraṃ cākrāmati kāyaśatasahasraṃ vā darśayati anekaṛddhiprabhāvasamudgato bhavati āryamañjuśriyaśca kalyāṇamitro bhavati niyataṃ bodhiparāyaṇo bhavatīti //
XXbsu041_u:1588: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ sarvāvatī parṣanmaṇḍalopaniṣaṇṇāṃ devasaṅghānāmantrayate sma
XXbsu041_u:1589: śṛṇvantu bhavanto mārṣā mañjuśriyasya kumārabhūtasya caryāmaṇḍalamantrasādhakamopayikaṃ rakṣārthaṃ sādhakasya paramaguhyatamaṃ paramaguhyahṛdayaṃ sarvatathāgatabhāṣitaṃ mahāvidyārājam
XXbsu041_u:1592: mañjuśriyo 'pi kumārabhūto 'nena vidyārājñā ākṛṣṭo vaśamānīto sammatībhūtaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1595: sarvavighnāṃśca nāśayatyeṣa mahāvīryaḥ prabhāvaḥ ekavīryaḥ eka eva sarvamantrāṇām agramākhyāyate
XXbsu041_u:1600: sarvapāpapranāśanaṃ sarvamantrapratipūraṇaṃ śubhakāriṇaṃ sarvalaukikalokottaramantrāṇāmuparyuparivartate apratihatasarvatathāgatahṛdayasarvāśāpāripūraka katamaṃ ca tat /
XXbsu041_u:1603: eṣa sa mārṣā paramaguhyatamaṃ sarvakarmikaṃ ekākṣaraṃ nāma vidyārājā anatikramaṇīyaḥ sarvasattvānām
XXbsu041_u:1604: adhṛṣyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ maṅgalaṃ sarvabuddhānāṃ sādhakaḥ sarvamantrāṇāṃ prabhuḥ sarvalokānām īśvaro sarvavitteśānāṃ maitrātmako sarvavidviṣṭānāṃ kāruṇiko sarvajantūnāṃ nāśakaḥ sarvavighnānāṃ saṃkṣepataḥ yathā yathā prayujyate tathā tathā karoti asādhito 'pi karmāṇi karoti /
XXbsu041_u:1605: mantrajapatā yaṃ spṛśati sa vaśyo bhavati vastrāṇyabhimantrya prāvaret subhago bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:1608: akṣiśūle saindhavaṃ cūrṇayitvā saptavārānabhimantrya akṣi pūrayet akṣiśūlamapanayati /
XXbsu041_u:1609: karṇaśūle gajaviṣṭhotthitāṃgarjānasambhavāṃ chatrikāṃ kedhukapatrāvanaddhāṃ mṛdvāgninā pacet
XXbsu041_u:1610: sukelāyitāṃ sukhoṣṇaṃ saindhavacūrṇapūtāṃ kṛtvā saptābhimantritena karṇāṃ pūrayet /
XXbsu041_u:1612: prasavanakāle striyāyā vā mūḍhagarbhāyāḥ śūlābhibhūtāyāḥ āṭaruṣakamūlaṃ niṣprāṇakenodakena pīṣayitvā nābhideśaṃ lepayet /
XXbsu041_u:1613: sukhenaiva prasavati naṣṭaśalyo vā puruṣaḥ purāṇaghṛtaṃ aṣṭaśatavārānabhimantrya pāyayellepayed vā tatpradeśaṃ tatkṣaṇādeva niḥśalyo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:1614: ajīrṇaviśūīcikāyātisāre mūleṣu sauvarcalaṃ saindhavaṃ vā anyaṃ lavaṇaṃ saptavārānābhimantrya bhakṣaye tasmāvdyādhermucyate tadaha eva svastho bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:1615: ubhayātisāre sadyātisāre vā mātuluṅgaphalaṃ pīpayitvā niṣprāṇakenoidakena tasmādābādhānmucyate
XXbsu041_u:1616: sakṛjjaptena tu japtena vā vandhyāyāḥ striyā vā aprasavadharmiṇyāḥ prasavamākāṃkṣatā aśvagandhamūlaṃ gavyaghṛtena saha pācayitvā gavyakṣīreṇa saha pīṣayitvā gavyakṣīreṇaivādvālya pañcaviṃśatparijaptaṃ ṛtukāle pāyaye snānānte ca
XXbsu041_u:1618: svapatiṃ vā janayate sutaṃ tripañcavarṣaprasavanakālātirekaṃ vā anekavarṣaviṣṭabdho vā paramantratantroṣadhaparamudritaparaduṣṭakṛtaṃ vā garbhadhāraṇavidhṛtaṃ vā vyādhisamutthitaṃ vā anyaṃ vā yatkiñci vyādhiṃ paravidhṛtasthāvarajaṅgamakṛtrimākṛtrimagarādipradattaṃ vā sarvamūlamantrauṣadhimitrāmitraprayogakṛtaṃ vā saptaviṃśativārāṃ purāṇaghṛtamayūracandrakaṃ (Vaidya 58) cekīkṛtya pīṣayet /
XXbsu041_u:1619: tataḥ supiṣṭaṃ kṛtvā śarkareṇa saha yojya harītakīmātraṃ bhakṣayet /
XXbsu041_u:1620: saptadivasāni ca śarkaropetaṃ śṛtaṃ kṣīraṃ pāyayed abhimantrya punaḥ punaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1621: mastakaśūle kākapakṣeṇa saptābhimantritena umārjāyet svastho bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:1622: strīpradarādiṣu rogeṣu ālambuṣamūlaṃ kṣīreṇa saha pīṣayitvā nīlikāmūlasaṃyuktamaṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ kṣīreṇāloḍya pāyayet /
XXbsu041_u:1623: evaṃ cāturthaekāhikadvyāhikatryāhikasātatikaṃ nityajvaraviṣamajvarādiṣu pāyasaṃ ghṛtasaṃyuktaṃ aṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ bhakṣāpayet /
XXbsu041_u:1627: evaṃ mātaravālapūtanavetālakumāragrahādiṣu sarvāmānuṣaduṣṭadāruṇagṛhīteṣu ātmano hastamaṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā gṛhītakaṃ mastake spṛśet /
XXbsu041_u:1629: ekajaptenātmarakṣā dvijaptena sahāyarakṣā tṛjaptena gṛharakṣā caturjaptena grāmarakṣā pañcajaptena yāmagocaragatarakṣā bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:1631: etāni cāparāṇi anyāni ca kṣudrakarmāṇi sarvāṇi karoti asādhite 'pi /
XXbsu041_u:1633: ekāntaṃ gatvā viviktadeśe samudragāminīṃ saritsamudbhave samudrakūle gaṅgānadīkūle vā athavā mahānadīkūlamāśritya śucau pradeśe uḍayaṃ kṛtvā trisnāyī tricailaparivartī maunī bhikṣabhaikṣāhārasādhakaḥ yāvakapayo phalāhāro vā triṃśallakṣāṇi japet siddhinimittaṃ tato dṛṣṭvā tato sādhanamārabhet jyeṣṭhaṃ paṭaṃ tatraiva deśe tasmiṃ sthāne paṭasya mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā suvarṇarūpyamayī tāmramṛttikamayairvā pradīpakaiḥ turuṣkatailapūrṇaiḥ gavyaghṛtapūrṇairvā pradīpakaiḥ pratyagravastrakhaṇḍābhiḥ khaṇḍābhiḥ kṛtavartibhiḥ lakṣamekaṃ paṭasya pradīpāni nivedayet /
XXbsu041_u:1634: sarvāṇi samaṃ samantāt samanantarapradīpitaiḥ pradīpamālābhiḥ paṭasya raśmayo niścaranti /
XXbsu041_u:1638: tato vidyādhareṇa sattvaramāṇarūpeṇa sādhakapaṭāntakoṇaṃ pūrvalikhitapaṭaḥ niḥsṛtaṃ arghaṃ dattvā pradakṣiṇīkṛtya sarvabuddhāṃ praṇamya grahetavyam /
XXbsu041_u:1639: tato gṛhītamātreṇa sarvapradīpagṛhītaiḥ sattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ samutpatati ekādhikavimānalakṣaṇaṃ vā gacchanti /
XXbsu041_u:1640: divyatūryapratisaṃyukte madhuradhvanigītavāditanṛtyopetaiḥ vidyādharībhiḥ samantādākīrṇaṃ taṃ sādhakaṃ vidyādharacakravartirājye abhipecayanti /
XXbsu041_u:1660: vigatajane niḥsaṅgasaṅgarahite mahāraṇyamanupraviśya yatra sthāne padmasaraṃ saritopetaṃ ekaparvatāśritaṃ parvatāgramabhiruhya ekākṣaraṃ vidyārājaṃ mañjuśrīkalpabhāṣitaṃ vā tathāgatānyabodhisattvabhāṣitaṃ vā anyataraṃ mantraṃ gṛhya teṣāṃ yathepsataḥ padmamūlaphalāhāro
XXbsu041_u:1662: japānte ca tenaiva vidhinā pūrvanirdiṣṭena jyeṣṭhaṃ paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya padmapuṣpāṇāṃ śvetacandanakuṅkumābhyaktānāṃ khadirakāṣṭairagniṃ prajvālya pūrvaparikalpitāṃ padmāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśat sahasrāṇi juhuyāt //
XXbsu041_u:1663: tato homāvasāne bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ paṭasya raśmayo niścaranti /
XXbsu041_u:1675: bodhisattvapiṭakāvataṃsakād mahāyānavaipulyasūtrād āryamañjuśrīmūlakalpānnavamaḥ paṭalavisarād dvitīyaḥ uttamasādhanopayikakarmapaṭalavisaraḥ parisamāpta iti //
XXbsu041_u:1678: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ punarapi karmasādhanottamaṃ bhāṣate sma /
XXbsu041_u:1679: iha kalparāje anyatamaṃ mantraṃ gṛhītvā gaṅgāmahānadīmavatīrya nauyānasaṃsthitaḥ gaṅgāyāḥ madhye kṣīrodanāhāraḥ triṃśallakṣāṇi japet yatheṣṭadivasaiḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1681: tataḥ sādhanamārabhe tatraiva naumadhye agnikuṇḍaṃ kārayet padmākāram /
XXbsu041_u:1682: tato nāgakesarapuṣpaiḥ paṭasya mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā jyeṣṭhaṃ paṭaṃ paścānmukhaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya ātmanaśca pūrvābhimukhaṃ kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ nāgakesarapuṣpaṃ ekaikaṃ saptābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā khadirakāṣṭhendhanāgniprajvālite juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:1683: yāvat triṃśasahasrāṇi śvetacandanakuṅkumapūtānāṃ nāgakesarapuṣpāṃ nānyeṣāṃ nāgānāṃ darśanamavekṣyaṃ siddhadravyaiśca pralobhayanti /
XXbsu041_u:1692: sa mūrdhni spṛśati spṛṣṭamātraśca pañcābhijño bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:1695: gaṅgāmahānadīmavatīrya ekakāṣṭhenaiva vilvavṛkṣamayena nauyānaṃ kṛtvā sudṛṣṭaṃ sukṛtaṃ tatra samābhirūhya bilvakāṣṭhakamayaṃ vāhanaṃ tenaiva tāṃ nau anusādhakenaiva vyaktena nipuṇatareṇa vāhaye gaṅgāmahānadīmaparityajya bāhayet samantāt /
XXbsu041_u:1698: aṣṭākṣara ekākṣaraṃ vā krodhadūtīdūta aparā vā anyataraṃ vā mantraṃ gṛhītvā jyeṣṭhaṃ paṭaṃ tatraiva aścānmukhaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya ātmanaśca pūrvāmukhaṃ prathamataḥ paścād yatheṣṭaṃ bhavati kṣīrayāvakaphalāhāro vā udakakandamūlaphalāhāro vā maunī triḥ kālasnāyī tricelaparivartī śuklakarmasamācārī suśuklabuddhiḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1699: prathamaṃ tāvat paṭasyāgrataḥ yathopadiṣṭapūrvadṛṣṭavidhiḥ vidyāṃ ṣaṣṭilakṣāṇi japet /
XXbsu041_u:1701: tato sādhakenopakaraṇāni saṅgṛhya pūrvasthāpitakāni kuryāt tatraiva nauyāne /
XXbsu041_u:1704: na ca śakyante nivarttāpayituṃ varjayitvā sādhakaśāt //
XXbsu041_u:1705: tato muhūrtamātreṇaiva mahāsamudraṃ praviśati yojanasahasrasthitāpi, kiṃ punaḥ svalpamadhvānam
XXbsu041_u:1707: khadirakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya pūrvakāritāgnikuṇḍe kumbhakārakārite vā mṛdbhāṇḍe nāgakesarakiñjalkāhutīnāṃ śvetacandanakarpūravyāmiśrāṇāṃ svalpatarāṇāṃ prabhūtatarapramāṇānāṃ vā ṣaṣṭilakṣāṇi juhuyāt juhvataśca laṅkāpurivāsino rākṣasā bahurūpadhāriṇaḥ hāhākāraṃ kurvantāḥ nāgapuribhogavatīvāsināśca nāgarājānaḥ uttiṣṭhante vividharūpadhāriṇo krūratarāḥ saumyatarāśca /
XXbsu041_u:1708: te nāgarākṣasāśca evamāhuḥ - uttiṣṭhatu bhagavānuttiṣṭhatu bhagavāniti /
XXbsu041_u:1710: evaṃ asurāḥ yakṣāḥ devāḥ mahoragāḥ siddhāḥ sarvamānuṣāśca pralobhayanti /
XXbsu041_u:1713: tato vidyādhareṇa mantraṃ japatā vāmahaste tarjanyā tarjayitavyā /
XXbsu041_u:1714: tato vidravanti itaścāmutaśca prapalāyante naśyanti ca /
XXbsu041_u:1715: tato homāvasāne sā nautaṃ sādhakaṃ gṛhītvā kṣaṇenākaniṣṭhabhavanaṃ gacchanti /
XXbsu041_u:1716: aparāṇyapi lokadhātuṃ gacchatyāgacchati ca bodhisattvacittavido bhavati pañcābhijñaḥ maharddhiko bhavati mahānubhāvaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:1718: sarvanāgāḥ sarvarākṣasāḥ sarvadevāḥ sarvāsurāḥ sarvasattvā cāsya vaśyā bhavanti /
XXbsu041_u:1719: ājñākarāḥ sthāpayitvā sarvabuddhabodhisattva pratyekabuddhāryaśrāvakānāmiha mantrasiddhānāṃ ca /
XXbsu041_u:1720: te cāsya maitrātmakā bhavanti anumantāraḥ yāvatsarvasattvānāmadhṛṣyo bhavati //
XXbsu041_u:1725: tasmiṃśca nauyāne viṃśottaraśataṃ puṣpāṇāṃ pradīpavyagrahastānāṃ nauyānamabhirūḍhānāṃ śuklāmbaravasanānāṃ kṛtarakṣāṇāṃ jyeṣṭhapaṭapūrvavidhisaṃsthāpitakasyāgrataḥ saṃsthāpayet /
XXbsu041_u:1726: tato paṭasya mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā nāgakesaracūrṇānāṃ kuṅkumaśvetacandanakarpūravyāmiśrāṇāṃ khadirānale āhūtīsahasrāṇi ṣaṭtriṃśa juhuyāt //
XXbsu041_u:1727: tato homāvasāne sā nau kṣaṇamātreṇa brahmalokaṃ gacchati /
XXbsu041_u:1731: dṛṣṭamātraśca bhūmiprāpto bhavati pañcābhijñaḥ cirakālajīvī mahākalpasthāyī mahāvidyādharacakravartirājā bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:1733: sahāyakā taiḥ sārddhaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ vicarate svacchandagāmī bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:1742: ete deśeṣu sidhyante mantrā vai jinabhāṣitā // Mmk_10.3 //

XXbsu041_u:4749: yadā śubhe ca nakṣatre lagne cāpi śubhottame /
XXbsu041_u:4750: tithiśreṣṭhe site cāpi śabdo śuśrāva medinīm // Mmk_20.138 //
XXbsu041_u:4752: siddhamantrastu jāyet varadā jāpināṃ sadā // Mmk_20.139 //
XXbsu041_u:4753: tadā kāle bhavet siddhiḥ sarvakarmasu yojitā /
XXbsu041_u:4756: nirghātā bahudhā proktā kṣmātale 'smina nibodhatā // Mmk_20.141 //
XXbsu041_u:4759: taṃ ca śabdaṃ śruyāt kṣipraṃ devasaṅghā nibodhatām /
XXbsu041_u:4760: dhīro gambhīrayuktaśca stanitaṃ cāpi garjite // Mmk_20.143 //
XXbsu041_u:4762: sa śabdo bhairavaḥ krūro yathānirdiṣṭakārakaḥ // Mmk_20.144 //
XXbsu041_u:4764: śabdaṃ krūranirghoṣaṃ nirdiśaṃ cāpi yojayet // Mmk_20.145 //
XXbsu041_u:4766: sattvāghātaṃ tato vidyāt durbhikṣaṃ vyādhisambhavam // Mmk_20.146 //
XXbsu041_u:4773: tithibhiḥ sarvatra yojyaṃ syānnakṣatraṃ cāpi yuktavām /
XXbsu041_u:4774: nirghāte yathā sarvaṃ karmeṣveva yojayet // Mmk_20.149 //
XXbsu041_u:4776: bharaṇyāṃ kṛttikāṃ caiva ubhau kampau sukhaudayau /
XXbsu041_u:4777: rohiṇyāṃ mṛgaśiraḥ kampo jāyate arthasampadaḥ // Mmk_20.150 //
XXbsu041_u:4779: eṣu kamped yathā pṛthvī tatra deśe mahadbhayam // Mmk_20.151 //
XXbsu041_u:4782: tatra deśe śivaṃ śāntiṃ subhikṣamārogyaṃ vinirdiśet // Mmk_20.152 //
XXbsu041_u:4783: āśleṣāyāṃ calate kṣipraṃ kṛtsnā caiva vasundharā /
XXbsu041_u:4785: maghāsu calitā bhūmiḥ sarveṣveva na sarvataḥ /
XXbsu041_u:4787: māgadhā janapadāḥ sarve pīḍyante vyādhitaskaraiḥ // Mmk_20.154 //
XXbsu041_u:4798: calate medinī kṛtsnā dṛśyante vaṇijā pare // Mmk_20.159 //
XXbsu041_u:4803: bhramate vasumatī kṛtsnā namate cāpi dāruṇam /
XXbsu041_u:4804: yadā unnatanimnasthā parvatā nimnagā varā // Mmk_20.161 //
XXbsu041_u:4805: kṣmātalaṃ kampate krūraṃ ubhe saṅghye tadā pare /
XXbsu041_u:4806: bhavet tatra bhayaṃ kṣipraṃ durbhikṣaṃ cāpi ninditam // Mmk_20.162 //
XXbsu041_u:4808: naśyante puravarā kṣipraṃ madhyadeśeṣu te janāḥ // Mmk_20.163 //
XXbsu041_u:4810: sasyaniṣpatti sarvatra madhyā yadi jāyate // Mmk_20.164 //
XXbsu041_u:4814: medinī sarvato jñeyā yadi kampo bhaved divā // Mmk_20.166 //
XXbsu041_u:4818: śatabhiṣe bhadrapade cāpi yadi kampeta medinī // Mmk_20.168 //
XXbsu041_u:4819: durbhikṣaṃ rāṣṭrabhaṅgaṃ vai dṛśyate tatra āspade /
XXbsu041_u:4820: hanyate taskare martyā durbhikṣaṃ cāpi kutsitam // Mmk_20.169 //
XXbsu041_u:4821: bhavanti bhūtale martyā ardharātre niśi kampate /
XXbsu041_u:4822: uttarāsu ca sarvāsu revatyāsu ca kīrttitā // Mmk_20.170 //
XXbsu041_u:4824: eteṣveva hi sarvatra yadā kampa ajāyata // Mmk_20.171 //
XXbsu041_u:4826: ete kampā samākhyātā nirghātā varacihnitā // Mmk_20.172 //
XXbsu041_u:4828: niryāte ca yadā pūrviṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ vistarānvitam // Mmk_20.173 //
XXbsu041_u:4833: yogināṃ ca tathā siddhi abhikṣāṃ tu sambhave // Mmk_20.175 //
XXbsu041_u:4834: bodhisattvānāṃ tathā jāte buddhabodhiṃ ca prāptaye /
XXbsu041_u:4838: kampamutpadyate kṣipraṃ eteṣveva ca kāraṇaiḥ // Mmk_20.177 //
XXbsu041_u:4839: niḥśabdā ca nirālokā yadā kampeta medinī /
XXbsu041_u:4840: nārakāṇāṃ tu sattvānāṃ calitānāṃ tu nirdiśet /
XXbsu041_u:4841: duḥkhaṃ bahuvidhaiḥ khinnā mayā kāyāti bhīṣaṇā // Mmk_20.178 //
XXbsu041_u:4842: teṣāṃ ca karmajaṃ duḥkhaṃ paśyamāvṛtti dṛśyate /
XXbsu041_u:4845: ketunā dṛśyate sarvaṃ gaganasthaṃ tu kīrtayet // Mmk_20.180 //
XXbsu041_u:4846: rātrau divā ca kathyete dṛśyante cottarā nabhe /
XXbsu041_u:4847: madhyāhni sarvatra dṛśyate dīrghato dhruvā // Mmk_20.181 //
XXbsu041_u:4850: tadeva deśe nṛpo hyagro hanyate vyādhibhirdhruvam /
XXbsu041_u:4853: tadeva rāśinakṣatraṃ grahaṃ caiva sulakṣayet // Mmk_20.184 //
XXbsu041_u:4855: yasmāt tu dṛśyate rekhā dhūmravarṇā mahadbhayā // Mmk_20.185 //
XXbsu041_u:4856: taṃ deśaṃ nāśayet kṣipraṃ grahaḥ krūro na saṃśayaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:4859: rūkṣavarṇā vivarṇā vā dhūmravarṇā tu ninditā // Mmk_20.187 //
XXbsu041_u:4862: kīrtitā puṣpalakṣmīkaṃ taṃ vidyādyatra mā tithāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:4868: nakṣatre vāpi yukte 'gre tale tārakamaṇḍale // Mmk_20.191 //
XXbsu041_u:4869: nirgate nabhasi vikhyāte dṛśyate yaṃ mahītale /
XXbsu041_u:4870: sarvā samantādāyurārogyaṃ jātā ye tārakāśrayāḥ // Mmk_20.192 //
XXbsu041_u:4871: prabhaviṣṇu bhavet tatra sukhī dharmacaraḥ prabhuḥ /
XXbsu041_u:4872: śreṣṭho jāyate martyaḥ tasmaiḥ nakṣatramāśrayet // Mmk_20.193 //
XXbsu041_u:4874: rekhā ca dṛśyate yatra taṃ vidyāt sukhasamarpitam // Mmk_20.194 //
XXbsu041_u:4876: rekhā nabhastale yātā dhūmāyantī mahadbhayā // Mmk_20.195 //
XXbsu041_u:4878: śivaṃ subhikṣamārogyaṃ taṃ deśaṃ vidurbudhāḥ // Mmk_20.196 //
XXbsu041_u:4880: sitā sphaṭikasaṅkāśā prabhāḥ sañceyu sarvataḥ // Mmk_20.197 //
XXbsu041_u:4882: tataḥ sphaṭikasaṅkāśā raśmyā cāpi mūrtijaḥ // Mmk_20.198 //
XXbsu041_u:4884: ketavo bahudhā huktā sahasrau dvau trayo 'tha vā // Mmk_20.199 //
XXbsu041_u:4891: kecit tiryagaḥ krūrā uttarā dakṣiṇā parā /
XXbsu041_u:4892: śreyasā caiva bhūtānāṃ udayante śaśisamaprabhā // Mmk_20.203 //
XXbsu041_u:4896: pūrvapaścimato yātā paścād deśā nṛpatiṃ hanet // Mmk_20.205 //
XXbsu041_u:4900: nihanet sarvato yātā tasmiṃ sthāne samādiśet /
XXbsu041_u:4903: divā sarvato nityaṃ madhyāhne yadi dṛśyate yadā /
XXbsu041_u:4904: mahad duḥkhaṃ mahotpātaṃ nṛpatīnāṃ tadā viśet // Mmk_20.208 //
XXbsu041_u:4905: yatra tiryaggatā rekhā yatra sthite samoditā /
XXbsu041_u:4906: tatrasthā nṛpatiṃ hanti yasmiṃ deśe samāgatā // Mmk_20.209 //
XXbsu041_u:4908: taskaropadravāṃ mṛtyuṃ tasmiṃ sthāne samādiśet // Mmk_20.210 //
XXbsu041_u:4912: yātiraudrā vidāhyuktā rātrau kecit śubhodayā // Mmk_20.212 //
XXbsu041_u:4914: rudhirāktāṃ mahīṃ kṣipraṃ śastrasampātitaṃ tadā // Mmk_20.213 //
XXbsu041_u:4918: pītā ca pītanirbhāsā dṛśyate vyomni mūrtinā // Mmk_20.215 //
XXbsu041_u:4921: tatra vidyānmahad duḥkhaṃ sarvasattveṣu lakṣaṇam // Mmk_20.216 //
XXbsu041_u:4928: dṛśyante gaganā ghorā tasmād deśādapakramet // Mmk_20.219 //
XXbsu041_u:4937: akasmāt paśyate yo hi naro vā yadi vā striyaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:4938: tasya mṛtyu samādiṣṭaṃ saptāhābhyantareṇa tu // Mmk_20.223 //
XXbsu041_u:4940: tadā divā vā yadi vā paśyedakasmānniśireva vā // Mmk_20.224 //
XXbsu041_u:4942: viṣeṇa hanyate jantuḥ śastribhirvā na saṃśayaḥ // Mmk_20.225 //
XXbsu041_u:4946: rātrau cāpi divā cāpi sadyaḥ prāṇaharāḥ smṛtā // Mmk_20.227 //
XXbsu041_u:4949: tasya rājyaṃ samākhyātaṃ siddhirvā mantrajāpine // Mmk_20.228 //
XXbsu041_u:4950: ete ketavo iṣṭā śarīre mandire 'pi vā /
XXbsu041_u:4954: sarvataḥ kathitā martyairvigrahe mandire 'pi vā // Mmk_20.230 //
XXbsu041_u:4957: sarve vai kathitā hyete ketavo grahacihnitāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:4960: pūrvavat sarvamityeṣāṃ kathitāḥ sarvataḥ loke // Mmk_20.233 //
XXbsu041_u:4963: citrā kvacittataḥ śubhraḥ snigdho varṇataḥ śubhaḥ // Mmk_20.234 //
XXbsu041_u:4970: ye mayā kathitā pūrvaṃ tatsaṃjñāśca sarvataḥ /
XXbsu041_u:4973: vigrahā grahamukhyānāṃ dṛśyate ca samantataḥ // Mmk_20.239 //
XXbsu041_u:4974: devāsure ca yuddhe vai darśayanti tadātmanām /
XXbsu041_u:4978: sarve vai asurapakṣe tu krūrakarmāntacāriṇā // Mmk_20.241 //
XXbsu041_u:4980: asurāḥ parājitā devaiḥ ketavaḥ sūcayanti te /
XXbsu041_u:4981: darśane bhū(ta)le martyaṃ pradadyuḥ sarvato nabhaḥ // Mmk_20.242 //
XXbsu041_u:4985: asurairnirjitā devā yadā kāle bhavanti vai /
XXbsu041_u:4987: asurāṇāṃ tadā pakṣe ketava udayanti vai // Mmk_20.244 //
XXbsu041_u:4988: tadā sarvataḥ krūrā vātā vāyanti jantunām /
XXbsu041_u:4996: aśmavṛṣṭiṃ tadākāśe prapated bhūtale tadā // Mmk_20.248 //
XXbsu041_u:4997: mahāvātāḥ pravāyanti tasmiṃ kāle tu bhīṣaṇāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:5001: mānuṣāṇāṃ tadā vighnaṃ cakrire prāṇoparodhinām // Mmk_20.250 //
XXbsu041_u:5006: kapilā bhāsato varṇā vātā krūrāśca agnijāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:5007: vāyanti vividhā loke yadā devaparājayet // Mmk_20.253 //
XXbsu041_u:5009: tadā te devapakṣāstu hīyante daityayonibhiḥ // Mmk_20.254 //
XXbsu041_u:5011: buddhadharmaratāḥ śreṣṭhā saṅghe caiva sadā varā // Mmk_20.255 //
XXbsu041_u:5013: tadā te sarvato devā nirjije daityayonijam // Mmk_20.256 //
XXbsu041_u:5017: tadā tāsu sukhā daityā hlādino vyādhināśakāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:5018: bhaveyuḥ sarve te loke sukhakāraṇaśītalāḥ // Mmk_20.258 //
XXbsu041_u:5019: nātiśītā na coṣṇā vai ṛtavaḥ sukhadā sadā /
XXbsu041_u:5023: na codvegaṃ tadā cakre nṛpatirdhārmiko bhavet /
XXbsu041_u:5026: phalāḍhyā taravo nityaṃ bahukṣīrāśca dhenavaḥ // Mmk_20.262 //
XXbsu041_u:5029: kurvante ca janāḥ sarve jambūdvīpagatā narāḥ // Mmk_20.263 //
XXbsu041_u:5031: samantāt sarvato teṣāṃ yasya pūrṇā vasundharā // Mmk_20.264 //
XXbsu041_u:5033: karme yugādhame kāle anyathā phalamādiśet // Mmk_20.265 //
XXbsu041_u:5035: vikṛtaṃ hetujaṃ karma aśubhā caiva kāmayet // Mmk_20.266 //
XXbsu041_u:5040: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma /
XXbsu041_u:5041: asti mañjuśrīḥ tvadīye kalpavisare sarvasādhanopayike mantracaryābhiyuktasya sādhanakāle sarvamantrāṇāṃ sarvakalpavistareṣu rāhurāgamanasurāṇāmadhipateḥ sarvagrahānāyakasya grahasaṃjñā candradivākarādiṣu nakṣatrayogena dṛśyante
XXbsu041_u:5042: / ta śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru te bhāṣiṣye //
XXbsu041_u:5043: evamukte bhagavatā śākyamuninā samyak sambuddhena mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā bhagavatastriḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃ tenāñjali pragṛhya bhagavataścaraṇayornipatya punarevotthāya bhagavantamanimiṣaṃ vyavalokayamānaḥ utphullanayano bhūtvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭo bhagavantamevamāha - tat sādhu bhagavāṃ nirdiśatu rāhorāgamanam ; yatra sattvānāṃ mantracaryābhiyuktānāṃ siddhikālaṃ bhaveyuriti sarvasattvānāṃ ca sukhodayaṃ śubhāśubhanimittaṃ vā; taṃ nirdiśatu bhagavāṃ /
XXbsu041_u:5045: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ mañjuśriyasya kumārabhūtasya sādhukāramadāt
XXbsu041_u:5046: / sādhu mañjuśrīḥ yastvaṃ tathāgatametamatha paripraśnase sarvasattvānāṃ
XXbsu041_u:5052: yadā devāsuraṃ yuddhaṃ vartate ca mahad bhayam /
XXbsu041_u:5053: tadāsau daityarājā vai dānavendro maharddhikaḥ // Mmk_21.2 //
XXbsu041_u:5057: prabhaviṣṇurgraho mukhyo yadā bheje surālayam // Mmk_21.4 //
XXbsu041_u:5059: apsarāṃ prekṣate daityaḥ yadā kāle nabhastalam /
XXbsu041_u:5060: tadā candramasapūrṇaḥ kare vāme sa daityarāṭ // Mmk_21.5 //
XXbsu041_u:5062: tadā bhuvi loke 'smiṃ grahabhūteti kathyate // Mmk_21.6 //
XXbsu041_u:5064: tadā tārkikā mānavā āhuḥ āgreyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ vibhoḥ // Mmk_21.7 //
XXbsu041_u:5065: yadā tu nīlarakte 'smiṃ prabhā nīlatāṃ vrajet /
XXbsu041_u:5066: tadā nīlamiti jñeyaṃ śaśine bhāskare 'pi vā // Mmk_21.8 //
XXbsu041_u:5071: vividhaṃ tārkike śāstre vividhā gatiyonijāḥ // Mmk_21.10 //
XXbsu041_u:5074: tasmāt tathāgataṃ jñānaṃ samyak tena niyojayet // Mmk_21.11 //
XXbsu041_u:5077: yadā kāle bhuvi martyānāṃ rāhorāgamanaṃ bhuvi // Mmk_21.12 //
XXbsu041_u:5079: tadā mahad bhayaṃ vidyānakṣatreṣveva nibodhatām // Mmk_21.13 //
XXbsu041_u:5081: ubhau tau yugmataḥ grāsaṃ divā rātrau ca kathyate /
XXbsu041_u:5082: aśvinyāgamanaṃ nityaṃ durbhikṣaṃ taṃ vidurbudhāḥ // Mmk_21.14 //
XXbsu041_u:5083: bharaṇyāṃ tu yadā candraṃ ravervā maṇḍalāśrayet /
XXbsu041_u:5084: vividhā sasyaniḥṣpattiḥ subhikṣaṃ cāpi nirdiśet // Mmk_21.15 //
XXbsu041_u:5085: kṛttikāsu yadā candraḥ rāhunā grasyate dhruvam /
XXbsu041_u:5086: rātrau vā yadi prabhāte vā yāmānte ninditaṃ hitam // Mmk_21.16 //
XXbsu041_u:5087: tadā vindyā mahad duḥkhaṃ vyādhisambhavameva vā /
XXbsu041_u:5090: mṛgaśirāsu yadā candraḥ bhāskaro vā nabhastale /
XXbsu041_u:5091: rāhuṇā grastapūrvau tau astaṃ yātau maharddhikau // Mmk_21.18 //
XXbsu041_u:5093: nṛpādhyakṣā gatāyuṣyā tatra deśe vinirdiśet // Mmk_21.19 //
XXbsu041_u:5095: rudhirāktā mahīṃ sarvāṃ mlecchadeśeṣu kīrtayet // Mmk_21.20 //
XXbsu041_u:5100: puṇyāśleṣau yadā candre bhāskare vā nabhastale /
XXbsu041_u:5104: rāhuṇā saha mudyanto astaṃ yātau grahottamau /
XXbsu041_u:5105: tadā prahāya taṃ vidyājjambūdvīpeṣu sarvataḥ // Mmk_21.23 //
XXbsu041_u:5108: madhyāhne 'thavā rātre ca mucyate ca punaḥ kṣaṇāt /
XXbsu041_u:5111: grastau saha mucyete astaṃ yātau ca duḥkhadā // Mmk_21.26 //
XXbsu041_u:5114: diśaḥ sarve samantādvai durbhikṣaṃ cāpi nirdiśet // Mmk_21.27 //
XXbsu041_u:5119: rāhorāgamanaṃ tatra subhikṣaṃ vā vinirdiśet // Mmk_21.29 //
XXbsu041_u:5121: udayantaṃ tadā grastaṃ uditaṃ vāpi sarvataḥ // Mmk_21.30 //
XXbsu041_u:5122: astaṃ yātena tenaiva śaśino rāhuṇā sadā /
XXbsu041_u:5126: rājā vai naśyate tatra vyādhinā saha mūrchitaḥ // Mmk_21.32 //
XXbsu041_u:5128: tatra duḥkhaṃ mahāvyādhi tatra dṛśyati bhūtale /
XXbsu041_u:5134: rāhurāgamanaṃ dṛśyeta subhikṣaṃ caivaṃ nirdiśet // Mmk_21.35 //
XXbsu041_u:5135: uttarāyāṃ yadā yuktaḥ nakṣatre bhadrapade tathā /
XXbsu041_u:5136: rāhurāgamanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ divā rātrau tu ninditam // Mmk_21.36 //
XXbsu041_u:5137: revatyāṃ tu yadā candraḥ rāhuṇā grasta sarvataḥ /
XXbsu041_u:5144: nakṣatramālā vicitrā vai bhramate vai nabhastale /
XXbsu041_u:5147: nakṣatraṃ kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ tasya taṃ kurute 'nyathā // Mmk_21.41 //
XXbsu041_u:5148: īṣat pramāṇaṃ na doṣo 'sti bahuvācāsti ninditam /
XXbsu041_u:5149: etat pramāṇakāle vai grahamukhyo 'rthakṛt smṛtaḥ // Mmk_21.42 //
XXbsu041_u:5150: kālaṃ kathitaṃ jñeyaṃ niyamaṃ caiva kīrtyate /
XXbsu041_u:5152: sagrahau yadi tatrasthau ravicandrau tu dṛśyate /
XXbsu041_u:5153: ubhayāntaṃ tadā tasya nakṣatrāṃ jātibhūṣitām // Mmk_21.44 //
XXbsu041_u:5154: anyathā niṣphalaṃ vidyāt prabhāvaṃ vāpi nindite /
XXbsu041_u:5157: tadā mahad bhayaṃ vidyāt paracakrabhayet tadā // Mmk_21.46 //
XXbsu041_u:5158: śaśine bhāskare cāpi dhūmravarṇo yadā bhavet /
XXbsu041_u:5159: paryeṣā dvitrayo vā vā tatra vidyānmahad bhayam // Mmk_21.47 //
XXbsu041_u:5162: grīṣme śarade caiva dhūmikā yadi jāyate /
XXbsu041_u:5163: samantāt saptarātraṃ tu tatra vidyānmahad bhayam // Mmk_21.49 //
XXbsu041_u:5165: divā vā yadi vā rātrau dhūmikā yadi jāyate /
XXbsu041_u:5167: pūrvavat kathitaṃ sarvaṃ yathā nirghāt ulkinām /
XXbsu041_u:5168: taireva divasaiḥ pūrvaṃ dhūmikāyā niyojayet // Mmk_21.51 //
XXbsu041_u:5171: śarade yadi hemante grīṣme prāvṛṣe 'pi vā /
XXbsu041_u:5172: dhūmikā sarvato jñeyā nakṣatraiścaiva kīrttitaḥ // Mmk_21.53 //
XXbsu041_u:5173: śubhāśubhaṃ tathā jñeyaṃ divā vā yadi vāniśā /

XXbsu041_u:5908: evaṃ ca vācire mūcuḥ śubhaṃ śreyaṃ japaṃ sadā /
XXbsu041_u:5914: kumāraṃ kāñcanaṃ śubhraṃ agniskandhaṃ mahotsavam // Mmk_22.251 //
XXbsu041_u:5915: jinaṃ padma tathā vajraṃ lokeśaṃ bodhimuttamam /
XXbsu041_u:5916: bodhisattvā tathā lokāṃ brahmaścaiva surottamām // Mmk_22.252 //
XXbsu041_u:5918: śuśrāva śabdāṃ yathā gantā sarvāsāṃ prāpnuyā hi sau // Mmk_22.253 //
XXbsu041_u:5919: tato 'nye lokavidviṣṭaṃ sa śabdaṃ cāpi ninditam /
XXbsu041_u:5920: praśastā śakunayo hyetā prasthitānāṃ jape ratām // Mmk_22.254 //
XXbsu041_u:5922: tato 'nya ninditaṃ sarva na lebhe kāyitaṃ phalam // Mmk_22.255 //
XXbsu041_u:5923: praśastaiva sarvato gacche apraśastaiśca na vrajet /
XXbsu041_u:5924: praṇamya sarvato buddhāṃstrayaṃ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam // Mmk_22.256 //
XXbsu041_u:5925: svamantraṃ mantranāthaṃ ca mātāpitrau tha duḥkarām /
XXbsu041_u:5926: praṇamya sarvato gacche śivaṃ tatra vinirdiśet // Mmk_22.257 //
XXbsu041_u:5938: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma /
XXbsu041_u:5939: asti mañjuśrīḥ tvadīyakalpavisare śabdagaṇanānirdeśaṃ nāma vivarttanam /
XXbsu041_u:5940: śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru /
XXbsu041_u:5942: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto utthāyāsanādekāṃśamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā, dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya, yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya, triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya,
XXbsu041_u:5944: śabdajñānagaṇanānirdeśaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā sarvamantracaryānupraviṣṭānāṃ sattvānāṃ ca sarvaśabdagaṇanājñānaṃ tad bhaviṣyati sarvasattvānāṃ sarvamantracaryānupraviṣṭānāṃ ca hitodayaṃ sukhāvahaṃ sarvaśabdagaṇanāsamatikramajñānaṃ tad bhagavāṃ arthakāmo hitaiṣī sarvasattvānāmarthe bhāṣayatu //
XXbsu041_u:5946: sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ yastvaṃ tathāgatametametamarthaṃ sattvasattvārthasampadaṃ prati prastitavyaṃ manyase /
XXbsu041_u:5947: tena hi tvā mañjuśrīḥ śṛṇu nirdekṣyāmi /
XXbsu041_u:5948: atha khalu mañjuśrīrbhagavatā kṛtābhyanujñātastatotthāya sve āsane niṣaṇṇo 'bhūd dharmaśravaṇāya bhagavantaṃ vyalokayamāno //
XXbsu041_u:5949: atha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ sarvāvantaṃ śuddhāvāsabhavanaṃ buddhacakṣuṣā
XXbsu041_u:5950: mavalokya, sarvaśabdagaṇanāsamatikramāspandanā nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma /
XXbsu041_u:5952: niścarya ca samantāt sarvasattvānāṃ sarvalokadhātuṃ mahatāvabhāsenāvabhāsya, sarvasattvabhavanāni ca sarvanarakatiryakpretāyāmalaukikāṃ asurābhavanāṃ avabhāsayitvā,
XXbsu041_u:5957: gaṇanāṃ caiva lokajño bhāṣire madhurāṃ girām // Mmk_23.1 //
XXbsu041_u:5960: liṅgaṃ śabdata jñeyaṃ na liṅgaṃ śabdavarjitam /
XXbsu041_u:5962: nānā neyaṃ śabda ca jñānaṃ na śabdaṃ jñānayojitaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:5963: jñānaśabdācca yo bhāvaḥ sa śabdo tattvārthayojanaḥ // Mmk_23.4 //
XXbsu041_u:5965: pratyaye tu tadā hetau kriyāyogavibhāvinī // Mmk_23.5 //
XXbsu041_u:5967: dhāraṇā vā tado hyuktā āśrayo pratyayo vidā /
XXbsu041_u:5969: na śabdo arthato jñeyaṃ na śabdādarthamiṣyate /
XXbsu041_u:5972: yaṃ pratītya tadā śabdā vibhejuste varāśrayā // Mmk_23.8 //
XXbsu041_u:5976: na tāṃ didṛkṣu sarvatra mantrāṃ pratyayato śivām // Mmk_23.10 //
XXbsu041_u:5978: na tāṃ viddhi saṃyogaṃ liṅgavākyārthasammatam // Mmk_23.11 //
XXbsu041_u:5982: citratvamativā śabde yo vācamavasṛjet sadā // Mmk_23.13 //
XXbsu041_u:5994: ubhau tāṃ śabdaniḥpattiṃ pratyamādāśrayaḥ smṛtaḥ // Mmk_23.19 //
XXbsu041_u:5996: vibhaktiyonijā hyeṣā śabdā mantrāśca sarvataḥ // Mmk_23.20 //
XXbsu041_u:6006: sambandhāddhi mantrāṇāṃ liṅge dve niyojitā // Mmk_23.24 //
XXbsu041_u:6008: strīṣu saliṅginī ṣaṣṭhyā aṣṭamantreṣu yojayet // Mmk_23.25 //
XXbsu041_u:6017: puṣṭyārthā dhātavo ye tu śabdāḥ pratyayārthasuśobhitā // Mmk_23.29 //
XXbsu041_u:6019: vibhajya yaṃ sthānaṃ ye 'nye parikīrttitāḥ // Mmk_23.30 //
XXbsu041_u:6023: pavarge kathitaṃ hyagra pravaraṃ sarvakārmakam // Mmk_23.32 //
XXbsu041_u:6025: madhyacihnaṃ visargaṃ ca bhakāraṃ gatibhūṣitam // Mmk_23.33 //
XXbsu041_u:6027: niyataṃ naiṣṭhike vartma bodhisattve niyojite // Mmk_23.34 //
XXbsu041_u:6029: yaṃ japaṃ mānuṣo kṣipraṃ sarvamantrā prasādhayet // Mmk_23.35 //
XXbsu041_u:6035: jajñe yā pravaro mantro utkṛṣṭo śabdayonijo /
XXbsu041_u:6036: buddho lokaguruḥ śreṣṭhaḥ chatroṣṇīṣeti lakṣyate // Mmk_23.38 //
XXbsu041_u:6037: ante takāravarge tu kathitā lokaguro trikam /
XXbsu041_u:6038: mantrā sarvataḥ hyagrye saśabdo lokapūjito // Mmk_23.39 //
XXbsu041_u:6042: pañcamārthe niyuktā ye saṅkhye gaṇanodbhave // Mmk_23.41 //
XXbsu041_u:6044: anantā kathitā mantrā anantā jinabhāṣitā // Mmk_23.42 //
XXbsu041_u:6048: sa śabdā sarvataḥ śreṣṭho pavarge yaḥ caturaṃ padam /
XXbsu041_u:6057: vikāsārthaṃ sphuṭadhātūnāṃ pratyaye liṅge 'tha yojayet // Mmk_23.48 //
XXbsu041_u:6058: prathame ante ca yaḥ śabdo sa śabdo lokapūjito /
XXbsu041_u:6063: sa śabdo lokamukhyo 'sau pravaro arthato sadā /
XXbsu041_u:6064: dhātvopetaṃ sadākāraṃ samārthe taṃ prayojayet // Mmk_23.51 //
XXbsu041_u:6065: uṣasame ca tadā vavre dhātuṃ tāṃ nibodhatām /
XXbsu041_u:6066: madhurākṣarasampanno utvaṃ tāṃ puṃsi yojitām // Mmk_23.52 //
XXbsu041_u:6068: catuṣṭyāṃ tamakṣaraṃ varjye dvitīyāyāṃ parikīrtitā // Mmk_23.53 //
XXbsu041_u:6072: ūrdhvacihnaṃ tatho bhrāntaṃ sa mantro buddhabhāṣito // Mmk_23.55 //
XXbsu041_u:6074: ādyā varṇato grāhyāgrā śāntikā pauṣṭikodayā // Mmk_23.56 //
XXbsu041_u:6075: dvitīyaṃ karmaṇi proktaṃ tṛtīyā karaṇe stathā /
XXbsu041_u:6076: ubhayo vibhaktayo jñeyaṃ saśabdo mantrarāṭ smṛtaḥ // Mmk_23.57 //
XXbsu041_u:6079: hite vibhaktyantā sarvato jñeyā pratyayāntāśca dhātujā // Mmk_23.58 //
XXbsu041_u:6081: mantrāḥ kathitamukhyāstu vibhoḥ jinajā surāḥ // Mmk_23.59 //
XXbsu041_u:6085: mantrā liṅgagatāntā ca madhye hutvā tathodyatāḥ // Mmk_23.61 //
XXbsu041_u:6089: taṃ liṅgaṃ svaritopetaṃ kṣipraṃ mantreṣu yojayet // Mmk_23.63 //
XXbsu041_u:6093: phalārthe niṣpadaśreyaṃ sa mantro buddhabhāṣitaḥ // Mmk_23.65 //
XXbsu041_u:6097: vākyaṃ parato śreyaṃ śāntamarthākṣaraṃ śubham // Mmk_23.66 //
XXbsu041_u:6102: ukto lokanāthaistu sa mantro mukhyato smṛto /
XXbsu041_u:6109: sucayo nirmalā proktā akṣarā ekajā parā // Mmk_23.72 //
XXbsu041_u:6111: mantrā agravarā proktā uṣṇīṣā jinasūnubhiḥ // Mmk_23.73 //
XXbsu041_u:6121: mantrāṃ tāṃ tu vai siddhiḥ tavarge mādimakṣaram // Mmk_23.78 //
XXbsu041_u:6124: sā vai tāramukhyā tu anantā mantrā hi vai ture /
XXbsu041_u:6129: tārā tu kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ rakṣo 'rthe tāṃ prayojaye /
XXbsu041_u:6135: locanā bhuvi vikhyātā mantrāgrā tatra sādhanī /
XXbsu041_u:6136: yataḥ sarvamiti jñeyaṃ ādimantreṣu yojayet // Mmk_23.85 //
XXbsu041_u:6138: saprasiddhā sarvato jñeyā devīṃ taṃ jinalocanām // Mmk_23.86 //
XXbsu041_u:6142: ādimeṣu ca sarvatra tavargā tacca varṇayoḥ // Mmk_23.88 //
XXbsu041_u:6145: te maya pauṣṭikā varṇā tadanye cābhicārukāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:6146: te punaḥ trividhā jñeyā krūraśāntikapauṣṭikāḥ // Mmk_23.90 //
XXbsu041_u:6147: tathā te triḥprakārāstu tathā hyuktā tridhā tridhā /
XXbsu041_u:6149: saumyāṃ akṣarāṃ viddhi śāntaye taṃ viyojayet /
XXbsu041_u:6154: evametena yogena anantāṃ mantrāṃśca yojayet // Mmk_23.94 //
XXbsu041_u:6156: ekārasahito yo varṇaḥ sa śabdo mantrabhūṣitaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:6157: napuṃsakaṃ taṃ vidurmantraṃ madhyakarmeṣu yojayet // Mmk_23.95 //
XXbsu041_u:6159: ikārasahito yo varṇaḥ sa mantro vidyate kīrtyate /
XXbsu041_u:6160: sā strītare mantreṣu prasiddhā kṣudrakarmasu // Mmk_23.96 //
XXbsu041_u:6162: tridhāṃ tāṃ trividhāṃ sarvāṃ sarvakarmeṣu yojayet // Mmk_23.97 //
XXbsu041_u:6163: pulliṅgasaṃjño yo vākyo puruṣo 'rtho sarvato mataḥ /
XXbsu041_u:6164: taṃ viduḥ puruṣamantraṃ vai sarvakarmeṣu yojayet // Mmk_23.98 //
XXbsu041_u:6165: napusaṃkaliṅge yo mantraḥ tāṃ viddhi napuṃsakam /
XXbsu041_u:6167: strīliṅgasaṃjño yo mantraḥ tāṃ viddhi sadā striyam /
XXbsu041_u:6174: jāpināṃ hitakāmyārthaṃ tāṃ tu viddhi divaukasāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:6176: daśaguṇaṃ pañcakāṃ viṃśat sahasraṃ taṃ nibodhatām /
XXbsu041_u:6180: daśārbudo nirbudo jñeyaḥ samudraṃ ca tataḥ pare /
XXbsu041_u:6181: daśo 'nyat sāgaro jñeyastā daśārthe samudyataḥ // Mmk_23.106 //
XXbsu041_u:6182: akṣobhyaṃ pare vindyānniḥkṣobhyaṃ ca tataḥ pare /
XXbsu041_u:6183: devarāṭ sarve vivāhaṃ kīrtyate budhaiḥ // Mmk_23.107 //
XXbsu041_u:6184: adhikā daśa tare tasya khaḍgamityāhu vāṇijāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:6185: nikhaḍgaṃ tad vidurmantrī nikhaḍgaṃ cāpi khaḍginam // Mmk_23.108 //
XXbsu041_u:6186: tataḥ pareṇa śaṅkhaṃ vai saṅkhyā tasya pareṇa tu /
XXbsu041_u:6187: sā mayā gaṇite jñeyā mahāmāyanipaścimā // Mmk_23.109 //
XXbsu041_u:6189: daśārdhaguṇitā sarve sārdhā ca daśayojitāḥ // Mmk_23.110 //
XXbsu041_u:6191: tataḥ pareṇa śakyaṃ vai aśakyaṃ cāpi durjayam /
XXbsu041_u:6194: tataḥ pareṇa buddhānāṃ jñānaṃ śrāvakakhaḍginām // Mmk_23.112 //
XXbsu041_u:6196: anantā gatayo hyeṣāṃ gaṇanaṃ sthānamuttamam // Mmk_23.113 //
XXbsu041_u:6198: kathitaṃ gaṇite sthānaṃ gaṇitajñaistu mantribhiḥ // Mmk_23.114 //
XXbsu041_u:6202: asiddhā praviśe vindhyaṃ siddhamantro vraje hitam // Mmk_23.116 //
XXbsu041_u:6203: tathā haimavataṃ śailaṃ siddhamantro vrajet sadā /
XXbsu041_u:6204: yatheṣṭaṃ gamanaṃ tasya siddhamantrasya dehinaḥ // Mmk_23.117 //
XXbsu041_u:6205: asiddho himālayaṃ gacched yadi mantrī jāpakāraṇāt /
XXbsu041_u:6206: na sehuḥ duḥsahaṃ sainyaṃ sarvadvandvāṃ ca śītalām // Mmk_23.118 //
XXbsu041_u:6209: bheje mantrasujaptarthaṃ tasmāt vindhyaṃ tu bhūdharam /
XXbsu041_u:6212: gaṅgādakṣiṇato bhāge sarvaṃ bindhye prayojayet // Mmk_23.121 //
XXbsu041_u:6218: sarvatra sādhayenmantrāṃ yathā tuṣṭikaraṃ hitamiti // Mmk_23.124 //
XXbsu041_u:6222: atha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ sarvanakṣatragrahatārakajyotiṣāṃ sarvalokadhātuparyāpannānāṃ sarvadigvyavasthitāṃ sarvamaharddhikotkṛṣṭatarāṃ grahaṇāmantrayate sma /
XXbsu041_u:6223: śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ mārṣāḥ sarvagrahanakṣatraprabhāvasvavākyaṃ prabhāvaṃ nirdeśayituṃ bhavantaḥ sarvamantrakriyārthāṃ sādhayantu bhavantaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:6224: iha kalparāje mañjughoṣasya śāsane siddhiṃ parataścānyāṃ kalparājāṃsi autsukyamānā bhavantu bhavanta iti 'tha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ -
XXbsu041_u:6235: maghāphalgunyau ubhau cāpi hastacitrau tathaiva ca /
XXbsu041_u:6240: revatyā jāyate śrīmān yuddhaśauṇḍo viśāradaḥ // Mmk_24.7 //
XXbsu041_u:6243: tiṣya upapadaścaiva kaniṣṭho niṣṭha eva tu /
XXbsu041_u:6244: bhūtaḥ satyastathā loka ālokaśca prakīrtyate // Mmk_24.9 //
XXbsu041_u:6245: bhogadaḥ śubhadaścaiva aniruddho ruddha eva tu /
XXbsu041_u:6248: na eteṣāṃ prabhāvo 'yamasmin kāle yugādhame // Mmk_24.11 //
XXbsu041_u:6250: svayambhuprabhāvāstu sattvā vai tasmin kāle kṛtau yuge // Mmk_24.12 //
XXbsu041_u:6253: asmin kāle na nakṣatrā nārkacandrā na tārakā /
XXbsu041_u:6254: na devatā nāsurā loke ādau kāle yugottame // Mmk_24.13 //
XXbsu041_u:6255: na saṃjñā nāpi gotraṃ vai na tithirna ca jātakam /
XXbsu041_u:6256: nopavāso na mantrā vai na ca karma śubhāśubham // Mmk_24.14 //
XXbsu041_u:6257: svacchandā vicarantyete na bhojyaṃ nāpi bhojanam /
XXbsu041_u:6258: śuddhā nirāmayā hyete sattvā bahudhā samā /
XXbsu041_u:6260: tataste pūrveṇa karmeṇa ākṛṣṭā yānti bhūtalam /
XXbsu041_u:6263: madhyame tu yuge prāpte mānuṣyaṃ tanumāśritāḥ // Mmk_24.17 //
XXbsu041_u:6266: tato divasamāsā vai saṃvṛtā vai grahajyotsnayā /
XXbsu041_u:6267: tataḥ prabhṛti yat kiñcit jyotiṣāṃ jñānameva vā /
XXbsu041_u:6268: mayā hi tat kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ satvānāmanugrahakṣamā // Mmk_24.19 //
XXbsu041_u:6272: paiśācīṃ tanu eva syājjāto jāto vadāmyaham /
XXbsu041_u:6273: kuśalā bodhisattvāstu tāsu tāsu ca jātiṣu // Mmk_24.21 //
XXbsu041_u:6279: chandaṃ ca jyotiṣaścaiva gaṇitaṃ kalpasammatam // Mmk_24.24 //
XXbsu041_u:6280: mithyājñānaṃ tathā jñānaṃ mithyācāraṃ tathaiva ca /
XXbsu041_u:6281: sarvaśāstraṃ tathā loke purā gītaṃ mayā cirā /
XXbsu041_u:6282: na ca jñānaṃ mayā labdhaṃ yathā śānto munī hyayam // Mmk_24.25 //
XXbsu041_u:6285: saṃsāracārake ruddho na ca mukto 'smi karmabhiḥ // Mmk_24.26//
XXbsu041_u:6286: buddhatvaṃ virajaṃ śāntaṃ nirvāṇaṃ yacyutaṃ padam /
XXbsu041_u:6288: prāpto 'smi vidhinā karmaiḥ yuktimanto 'dhunā svayam // Mmk_24.27 //
XXbsu041_u:6290: na taṃ paśyāmi taṃ sthānaṃ bahirmārgeṇa labhyate // Mmk_24.28 //
XXbsu041_u:6292: na ca prāpto mayā jñānaṃ yādṛśo 'yaṃ svayambhuvaḥ // Mmk_24.29 //
XXbsu041_u:6293: adhunā prāpto 'smi nirvāṇaṃ karmayuktā śubhe rataḥ /
XXbsu041_u:6294: kevalaṃ tu mayā hyetad vakṣyate śāstrasaṅgrahaḥ // Mmk_24.30 //
XXbsu041_u:6300: ata eva grahādyuktā sānugrāhyā śubhāśubhe // Mmk_24.33 //
XXbsu041_u:6305: teṣu jāpiṣu yatne vai rakṣaṇīyā śubhāśubhaiḥ /
XXbsu041_u:6307: te 'pi tasmin tadā kāle yugānte parikalpitā /
XXbsu041_u:6308: mantrā siddhiṃ prayatnena siddhyante ca yugādhame // Mmk_24.37 //
XXbsu041_u:6313: nakṣatraṃ jyotiṣajñānaṃ tasmin kāle bhaviṣyati // Mmk_24.39 //
XXbsu041_u:6315: rāśayo dvādaśaścaiva tasmin kāle yugādhame // Mmk_24.40 //
XXbsu041_u:6317: te grahā saṃvibhājyaṃ vai nakṣatrāṇāṃ rāśimāśritā /
XXbsu041_u:6318: pṛthubhūtāni sarvāṇi saṃśrayanti pṛthak pṛthak // Mmk_24.41 //
XXbsu041_u:6319: jātakaṃ caritaṃ caiva sattvā rāśe pratiṣṭhitā /
XXbsu041_u:6322: sattvānāṃ siddhiyātraṃ tu kalpayanti śubhāśubham // Mmk_24.43 //
XXbsu041_u:6325: arthabhāgī tathā nityaṃ senāpatyaṃ karoti saḥ /
XXbsu041_u:6328: kṛttikāṃśe tathā nityaṃ rājā dṛśyati medinīm /
XXbsu041_u:6330: prādeśike 'tha durge vā ekadeśe nṛpo bhavet /
XXbsu041_u:6331: yadi jātakasampannaḥ grahe ca gurucihnite // Mmk_24.47 //
XXbsu041_u:6333: daśa varṣāṇi pañca vai tasya tasya rājyaṃ vidhīyate // Mmk_24.48 //
XXbsu041_u:6337: jātakaṃ asya nakṣatre rakte bhāskaramaṇḍale // Mmk_24.50 //
XXbsu041_u:6345: jāyante vividhā sattvā vyatimiśre prajātake // Mmk_24.54 //
XXbsu041_u:6347: ata eva na jāyante jātikeṣveva varṇitaiḥ // Mmk_24.55 //
XXbsu041_u:6354: ahorātre tathā nityaṃ samyag jātakamiṣyate // Mmk_24.58 //
XXbsu041_u:6361: eṣa jāto mahātyāgī śaṭhaḥ sāhasiko naraḥ /
XXbsu041_u:6362: strīṣu saṅgī sadā lubdho arthānarthasavidviṣaḥ // Mmk_24.62 //
XXbsu041_u:6363: paradārābhigāmī syāt kṛṣṇābhaḥ śyāma eva vā /
XXbsu041_u:6364: varṇato jāyate dhūmro ugro vai maithunapriyaḥ // Mmk_24.63 //
XXbsu041_u:6366: śaniścarati tatrasthā divā rātrau muhurmahuḥ // Mmk_24.64 //
XXbsu041_u:6369: sa bhave dhananiṣpattiḥ aiśvarya bhuvi cihnitam /
