XXbsu041_u:6773: anugrahārtthaṃ tu sattvānāṃ jāpināṃ ca sukhodayām /
XXbsu041_u:6778: atha teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ sannipātā sarvaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātavaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ ca lokabhājanāni ekajvālībhūtāni, na ca ekasattvānāṃ pīḍā abhūt /
XXbsu041_u:6780: atha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ sarvaṃ taṃ śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya, tāṃśca bodhisattvānmahāsattvān tatrasthitāni ca devaputrāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhāṃśca bhagavataḥ mahāparṣatsannipātānāmantrayate
XXbsu041_u:6782: samanvāharantu buddhā bhagavantaḥ sarvapratyekabuddhāryaśrāvakāḥ kalpamekākṣarasya vidyācakravartinaḥ sarvatathāgatoṣṇīṣāṇāṃ uparyuparivartamānasyāpratihataśāsanasyāparimitabalaparākramasya bhagavataḥ uṣṇīṣarājacakravartinaḥ punarapi kalpaṃ bhāṣe 'ham asmiṃ kāle kalau yuge //
XXbsu041_u:6783: atha bhagavato duratikramaśāsanasya trailokyaguroḥ sarvadevanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragasatkṛtasya sarvakarmārthasādhakasya mantre vakṣye punarapi kalau yuge kāle śāsanāntarddhānakāle samaye śāsanārakṣako bhagavāṃ uṣṇīṣacakravartī bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu041_u:6785: sarvakālaṃ sarvabuddhānāṃ ca śāsanāntarddhānakālasamaye buddho 'yaṃ bhagavāṃ sattvārthaṃ kariṣyati
XXbsu041_u:6793: sa dharmadhātuṃ niḥsṛtya sthito 'yaṃ viśvarūpiṇaḥ // Mmk_25.8(="9") ///
XXbsu041_u:6794: yathā hi buddhānāṃ śarīrā pravṛttā dhātavo jane /
XXbsu041_u:6795: sāmiṣā lokapūjyāste nirāmiṣāḥ ṣu viśeṣataḥ // Mmk_25.9(="10") //
XXbsu041_u:6797: sāmiṣā kalevare proktā jinendrāṇāṃ maharddhikā // Mmk_25.10(="11") //
XXbsu041_u:6802: sa viśvarūpī sarvajñaḥ dṛśyate ha mahītale /
XXbsu041_u:6804: eṣa saṃkṣepato mantraḥ japto 'yaṃ vidhinā svayam /
XXbsu041_u:6805: karoti sarvakarmaṃ vai īpsitāṃ saphalāṃ sadā // Mmk_25.14(="15") //
XXbsu041_u:6806: asya kalpaṃ samāsena punaḥ kāle pracakṣyate /
XXbsu041_u:6807: yugānte munivare loke astaṃ yāte tathāgate /
XXbsu041_u:6809: atha bhagavataścakravartinastathāgatoṣṇīṣasya parakarmaprayogavidhvaṃsanakarasyājitaṃjayasya sarvamantrādhipateḥ sarvabuddhabodhisattvānunītasyoṣṇīṣacakravartinaḥ saṃkṣepataḥ kalpamekākṣarasya pravartitapūrvaṃ vistarataḥ //
XXbsu041_u:6811: ādau tāvat yasmiṃ sthāne 'yaṃ japyate, tasmiṃ sthāne pathe
XXbsu041_u:6812: yojanābhyantareṇa sarvaduṣṭagrahāḥ prapalāyanti, sarvamantrāḥ siddhā api
XXbsu041_u:6813: na prabhavanti, sarvadevāḥ sānnidhyaṃ tyajanti, anyatra sādhakasyecchayānyeṣāṃ laukikalokottarāṇāṃ sādhakānāṃ siddhimapaharati,
XXbsu041_u:6815: svayaṃ vidyācchedaṃ karttukāmaḥ kuśānāṃ haritānāṃ muṣṭiṃ gṛhītvā,
XXbsu041_u:6816: aṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā, śastreṇacchindyāt tā vidyāmuddiśya, sā chinnā bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:6817: anena pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā, hṛdaye kīlakena tāḍayet /
XXbsu041_u:6836: anenaiva yasya rakṣā kriyate, so 'pyadṛśyo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:6838: pratyādeśaṃ vā na dadāti, anenaiva saha japet /
XXbsu041_u:6843: dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ tilānāmaṣṭaśataṃ juhuyāt trisandhyaṃ saptāhaṃ yaṃ
XXbsu041_u:6846: pratyādeśaṃ vā prayacchāmi devā vaśīkarttukāmaḥ devadārusamidhānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt, saptarātreṇa vaśyo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:6849: yakṣāṃ vaśīkarttukāmo dadhibhaktaṃ juhuyād vaśyā bhavanti /
XXbsu041_u:6852: aśokapriyaṅgusamidbhiḥ kusumairvā yakṣiṇīnāgināgagrahāṇāṃ rājikābhiḥ rājānasiddhārthakaiḥ brahmāṇaṃ puṣpahomena, veśyaṃ dadhikṣīraghṛtena,
XXbsu041_u:6853: śūdraṃ tuṣapāṃsubhiḥ, striyāṃ lavaṇahomena, raṇḍāṃ māṣajambūlikāhomena,
XXbsu041_u:6854: kanyāṃ lājāhomena, sarvān ghṛītatailahomena vaśyāṃ karoti sarvatra trisandhyaṃ saptarātram
XXbsu041_u:6859: mañjughoṣaṃ tadā vavre bodhisattvaṃ maharddhikam // Mmk_25.17(="18") //
XXbsu041_u:6860: eṣa kalpo mayā proktaḥ ekadeśo hi cakriṇe /
XXbsu041_u:6861: vistīrṇa yasya nāthasya devadevasya dhīmataḥ // Mmk_25.18(="19") //
XXbsu041_u:6863: kalpairyasya pramāṇaṃ tu na śakyaṃ bhāṣituṃ jinaiḥ /
XXbsu041_u:6864: saṃkṣepeṇa pravakṣye te māṇuṣāṇāṃ hitodayā // Mmk_25.19(="20") //
XXbsu041_u:6866: addhyeṣayati taṃ buddhaṃ śuddhāvāsopari sthitam // Mmk_25.20(="21") //
XXbsu041_u:6868: naṣṭe kāle yugānte vai mānuṣāṇāṃ sukhodayam // Mmk_25.21(="22") //
XXbsu041_u:6870: paṭasiddhiḥ pradṛśyete kṣipraṃ paṭavidhiḥ kathamiti // Mmk_25.22(="23") //
XXbsu041_u:6874: atha khalu bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma /
XXbsu041_u:6875: śṛṇu mañjuśrīḥ ekākṣaracakravartinasya mahānubhāvasya saṃkṣepeṇa paṭavidhānaṃ bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:6877: adhunā saṃkṣepeṇa yugādhame sattvā alpavīryā bhavanti, alpaprajñā mandacetasaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:6880: uttamārthaṃ tu yathā siddhiḥ prāpnuvanti sa jāpinaḥ // Mmk_26.1 //
XXbsu041_u:6881: uttamasādhanaṃ kartukāmena anāhate paṭe acchinnadaśe keśāpagate aśleṣakairvarṇairbhagavāṃ citrāpayitavyaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:6882: dharmarājā dharmacakrapravarttakaḥ sarvalokādhipatiḥ puruṣottamaḥ dvipadānāmagryaḥ tathāgataratnaḥ ratnaketurnāmā jinottamaḥ dharmaṃ deśayamānaḥ samantajvālaprabhāmaṇḍalaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:6887: prathamaṃ cakrasādhanaṃ kartukāmaḥ, dvādaśāraṃ puṣpalohamayaṃ cakraṃ kṛtvā prātihārakapakṣe bhagavato 'gratastrisandhyamagarudhūpaṃ dahatā daśa lakṣāṇi japet /
XXbsu041_u:6888: ante pūrṇamāsyāṃ udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā, hastenāvaṣṭabhya,
XXbsu041_u:6892: atha cchatraṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ, śvetacchatraṃ vicitraṃ cābhinavaṃ kārayitvā,
XXbsu041_u:6893: suvarṇacakracihnaṃ kauśeyavastrāvalambitaṃ tenānenaiva vidhānena śirasi kṛtvā japed, vidyā svayamevopatiṣṭhati /
XXbsu041_u:6896: ante pūrṇamāsyāmudārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā, hastenāvaṣṭabhya tāvajjaped, yāvat prajvalitamiti /
XXbsu041_u:6898: māse māse paurṇamāsyāṃ pañcabhiḥ pakṣaiḥ prātihārikapakṣe siddhyati /
XXbsu041_u:6903: athoṣṇīṣaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ hastamātre daṇḍe sauvarṇarajatatāmramayaṃ maṇimayaṃ vā kṛtvā tāvajjaped yāvat prajvalitamiti /
XXbsu041_u:6907: atha bhadraghaṭaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ sauvarṇaṃ bhadraghaṭaṃ kṛtvā sarvabījaratnauṣadhiparipūrṇaṃ śuklavastrāvakuṇṭhitaṃ tamanena sādhayed ekasmiṃ prātihārakapakṣe karmārabhed, aparasmin siddhyati tasmiṃ haste prakṣipya yamicchati taṃ labhate /
XXbsu041_u:6909: atha cintāmaṇiratnaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ sauvarṇadaṇḍo jātyamaṇiṃ sphaṭikamaṇiṃ ca sauvarṇaṃ vā vastrāvalambantaṃ kṛtvā anenaiva vidhānena sādhayed, yaṃ cintayati tat sarvaṃ siddhyati /
XXbsu041_u:6914: anye vā yorasitātapatraprakhyādayaḥ tadapyanena bhagavato daśalakṣajaptena karmāṇi kartavyāni siddhyanti /
XXbsu041_u:6915: evamapratihataḥ tathāgatoṣṇīṣaḥ parakalpavidhānenāpi yathā yathā prayujyati, tathā tathā siddhyati
XXbsu041_u:6916: acirādeva bhagavataḥ uṣṇīṣacakravarttinaḥ daśalakṣajaptaḥ sarvaṃ sādhayati sarvavidyāmantrādhipaticakravartī
XXbsu041_u:6917: atha vajraṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ raktacandanamayaṃ ekasūcikaṃ vajraṃ kṛtvā,
XXbsu041_u:6918: athavā puṣpalohamayaṃ kṛtvā, pañcagavyena prakṣālya, śuklapañcadaśyāṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā, ghṛtapradīpān prajvālya, gandhodakena
XXbsu041_u:6921: niryātya, anenoṣṇīṣarājā parivāreṇa tejorāśisitātapatreṇa vā rakṣāṃ kṛtvā,
XXbsu041_u:6922: maṇḍalabandhaṃ sahāyānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kṛtvā, vajraṃ dakṣiṇena hastena
XXbsu041_u:6923: gṛhītvā, prathame yāme 'tikrānte dvitīye yāme upaviśya ekāgracittaḥ
XXbsu041_u:6934: atha khaḍgaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ, nirvraṇaṃ khaḍgaṃ gṛhītvā, ahorātroṣito bhagavatodārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā, tāvajjaped, yāvajjvalitena siddhena saparivāreṇotpatati //
XXbsu041_u:6935: ākuñcitakuṇḍalakeśaḥ dviraṣṭavarṣākṛtiḥ apanthadāyī agamyaḥ sarvavidyādharāṇāṃ antarakalpaṃ jīvati //
XXbsu041_u:6936: atha manaḥśilāṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ, vīrakrayeṇa krītvā puṣpayogatrirātroṣitaḥ
XXbsu041_u:6940: trirātroṣitaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ maitracittamutpādya ātmānaṃ niryātya manaḥśilāṃ gṛhītvā tāvajjaped, yāvat trividhā siddhiḥ /
XXbsu041_u:6952: trīṇi varṣasahasrāṇi jīvati jvalitena vidyādharo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:6955: devakumāravapuḥ adharṣaṇīyaḥ sarvadevānāṃ kaḥ punarvidyādharāṇāṃ kalpasthāyī bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:6957: atha triśūlaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ, puṣpalohamayaṃ tṛśūlaṃ kṛtvā, saṃvatsaraṃ japet /
XXbsu041_u:6958: tato vālukāmayaṃ hastapramāṇaṃ caityaṃ kṛtvā, tasya mahatīṃ pūjāṃ
XXbsu041_u:6959: kṛtvā, udāraṃ ca baliṃ nivedya, dakṣiṇahastena tṛśūlaṃ gṛhītvā,
XXbsu041_u:6960: tāvajjaped, yāvat paryaṅkaṃ badhvā yāva sphurati, jvalati, raśmisahasrāṇi
XXbsu041_u:6966: trinetraḥ dvitīya iva maheśvaraḥ sarvavidyādharanamaskṛtaḥ mahākalpasthāyī nirīkṣitamātreṇa duṣṭacittāṃ pātayati /
XXbsu041_u:6968: sadevake loke prāgeva vidyādharāṇāṃ cyutaḥ sukhāvatyāvupapadyate //
XXbsu041_u:6989: yadā mṛyate, tadā ekadeśiko rājā bhavati //
XXbsu041_u:6990: athāṅkuśaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ, kuśamayamaṅkuśaṃ kṛtvā, kṛṣṇamayorekatareṇa pañcagavyena prakṣālya, ekarātroṣitaḥ aṅkuśasya hastaṃ pramāṇamātraṃ kartavyam /
XXbsu041_u:6991: udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā, vajrapāṇerghṛtapradīpaśataṃ prajvālyayitaṃ kartavyam /
XXbsu041_u:6992: vajraṃ kuryāt tathaiva sitātapatrasya ātmano rakṣā kartavyā /
XXbsu041_u:6993: tejorāśinā maṇḍalabandhaṃ vikareṇena kīlakāṃ saptābhimantritāṃ kṛtvā,
XXbsu041_u:6995: athābandhaṃ sthānaṃ ca parigrahaṃ kṛta bhavati
XXbsu041_u:6996: / tato dvitīye prahare ekāgramanāḥ paryaṅkaṃ badhvā, aṅkuśaṃ gandhapuṣpadhūpairabhyarcya kṛtarakṣaḥ sarvabuddhabodhisattvāṃ namaskṛtya aṅkuśaṃ hastena gṛhya tāvajjaped yāvadatrāntare narakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ vedanānyupaśāmyante /
XXbsu041_u:7000: kalpasthāyī yadā mṛyate, tadā vajrabhavanaṃ gacchati /
XXbsu041_u:7002: yadi paṭaṃ sādhayati, tena jvalitena vidyādharo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:7003: yamicchati kalpaṃ sādhayituṃ tasya mantrasya nāmaṃ grahāya lakṣaṃ japedante ekārātroṣitaḥ udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā arkakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya tilānāṃ
XXbsu041_u:7008: atha maheśvaraṃ kartukāmaḥ maheśvarasya mahatiṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇāyāṃ mūrttau arkakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:7010: na bhetavyaṃ tata āgacchati bravīti kiṃ karttavyā sarve maheśvarā vidyā mama siddhā bhavantu
XXbsu041_u:7017: atha yakṣiṇī ākarṣayitukāmaḥ tasya nāmaṃ gṛhya saptāhamaśokapuṣpāṇi juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:7024: ante ekarātroṣitaḥ bhagavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā yakṣāṇāṃ yakṣabaliṃ codanāni nivedya yakṣakarṣaṇaṃ kariṣyāmīti manasi kṛtvā vaṭavṛkṣasamidhāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt
XXbsu041_u:7028: vaktavyāḥ ekaikaṃ dine yakṣa ājñākaraṃ yakṣaṃ preṣayeti /
XXbsu041_u:7038: atha vajrapāṇiṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ caturguṇaṃ saptaguṇaṃ pūrvasevāṃ kṛtvā prātihārakapakṣe sakalāmudāratarāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā yāvat pūrṇamāsīti pūrṇamāsyāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā bhikṣavaḥ saṅghoddiṣṭakāṃ bhojayitvā āryavajradharasthaiva anumoditavyā tata udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā prathame yāme
XXbsu041_u:7039: 'tikrānte dvitīye yāme paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā upaviśyaikāgramanasaḥ vajradharaṃ
XXbsu041_u:7040: drakṣyāmīti cittaṃ saṅkalpya guggulugulikānāṃ badarāsthipramāṇāṃ rātrāvekayāmaṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:7045: atrāntare bhagavāṃ vajrapāṇirāgacchanti sarvavidyābhiḥ parivṛtaḥ vidyottamapramukhaiḥ vidyārājaiḥ parivṛtaḥ sarvadevaiḥ sarvanāgaiḥ sarvayakṣaiḥ sarvagandharvaiḥ kinnarairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ āgacchati /
XXbsu041_u:7046: tatkṣaṇaṃ nārakāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ tīvravedanā vyuparatā bhavanti /
XXbsu041_u:7048: praṇipatya sthātavyaṃ ato vajradharo vakṣyati kiṃ te varaṃ dadāmi /
XXbsu041_u:7049: vidyādharacakravarttitvaṃ bilapraveśaṃ rāṣṭraṃ antardhānaṃ yadvā rocate tasyaiva bhagavataḥ sakāśāllabhyate /
XXbsu041_u:7050: yadvā rocati vidyādharacakravartittvaṃ sarvavidyādharāṇāṃ cakravarttī vajrakāyo vajrapāṇisadṛśaḥ cittamātreṇa sarvapraharaṇānyutpadyante /
XXbsu041_u:7053: anyeṣāmapi vidyādharāṇāṃ eṣa eva vidhiḥ saṃkṣepato yāni vajrapāṇikalpe yāni avalokiteśvarakalpe yāni ca bhagavatā proktāni kalpāni yāni brahmakalpe yāni maheśvarakalpe saṃkṣepato laukikalokottareṣu kalpeṣu ye śādhanīyāḥ, te etenaiva sādhanayā siddhyante
XXbsu041_u:7055: anena sārddhaṃ japtavyāḥ saptarātraṃ niyataṃ darśanaṃ dadāti /
XXbsu041_u:7057: maheśvarapramukhānāṃ devānāṃ agrataḥ yadi japati saptarātrābhyantareṇa darśanaṃ dadāti /
XXbsu041_u:7058: yadi na dadāti trisaptadhā mūrdhnā sphuṭati /
XXbsu041_u:7061: atha dravyaṃ sādhayitukāmasya manaḥśilāṃ gṛhya mānuṣakṣīreṇa pīṣayitvā pañcagulikā karttavyā
XXbsu041_u:7063: candragrahe sūryagrahe vā balividhānaṃ kṛtvā yadā sarṣapa ciṭiciṭīyanti tathā prathamā siddhā yā vā sarvajanavaśīkaraṇaṃ tayā sarvasya laukikeyā vidheyā bhavanti /
XXbsu041_u:7067: jvalite tadā devakumāravapuḥ taruṇārkatejo vidyādhararājā bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:7070: athāñjanaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ śrotāñjanaṃ nīlotpalaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ candanaṃ caikataḥ kṛtvā tāmrabhājane saṃsthāpya candragrahe tāvajjaped yāvad dhūmāyati /
XXbsu041_u:7071: tenāñjitanayanaḥ antarddhīyate kāmarūpī sarvāntarddhānikānā rājā bhavati
XXbsu041_u:7072: atha khaḍgā sādhayitukāmaḥ nirvraṇaṃ khaḍgamādāya kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ vā paṭasyodārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā balividhānaṃ ca kṛtarakṣaḥ khaḍgaṃ dakṣiṇahastena gṛhītvā tāvajjaped yāva sphurati jvalite sphurite ekākī vidyādharo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:7074: apratihatabalaparākramaḥ yairdṛśyate yāṃśca paśyati taiḥ sahotpatati //
XXbsu041_u:7075: atha vajraṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ puṣpalohamayaṃ vajraṃ kṛtvā ṣoḍaśāṅgulaṃ ubhayatriśūcakaṃ raktacandanenānulipya prātihārakapakṣaprattipadamārabhya paṭasyodārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā japet pratidinaṃ varddhamānā bhikṣavo bhojayitavyā /
XXbsu041_u:7076: ante trirātroṣitaḥ paṭaṃ sadhātuke caitye pratiṣṭhāpya udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā ghṛtapradīpaśataṃ prajvālya kuśapiṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ vajramubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ gṛhītvā tāvajjaped yāvajjvalitamiti taṃ gṛhya saptaparivāra utpati /
XXbsu041_u:7080: evaṃ śūlacakraśaraśaktiprabhṛtaya sarve praharaṇāḥ paṭapādukadaṇḍakāṣṭhayajñopavītādīni parakalpavidhānena sādhayitavyāni /
XXbsu041_u:7082: śāntikaṃ kartukāmaḥ padmākāraṃ vediṃ kṛtvā yājñikaiḥ samidbhiragniṃ prajvālya sruveṇa paramānnāhutīnāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:7090: prātihārakapakṣe śuklapūrṇamāsyāṃ trirātroṣitaḥ candragrahe kṛṣṇagokṣīra aṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā pibed rasāyanaṃ guṇopetaṃ bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:7096: sarvavrīhigandhodakaparipūrṇaṃ navaṃ kalaśaṃ kṛtvā aṣṭaśatajaptena vināyakopadrutaṃ spṛṣṭvā snāpayet /
XXbsu041_u:7105: samudragāminīṃ nadīmavatīrya raktacandanāktānāṃ padmānāṃ śatasahasraṃ pravāhayet /
XXbsu041_u:7110: devāṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ agarusamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ juhuyāt aṣṭasahasraṃ /
XXbsu041_u:7114: aśokasamidbhiryakṣiṇīnām nāgānāṃ nāgapuṣpāṃ āryavajravajrapāṇiragarusamidhābhiḥ vidyādharāṇāṃ damanakasamidhābhiḥ agurusamidhānāṃ turuṣkatailāktānāṃ gandharvāṇāṃ kunduruhomena pretānāṃ śrīvāsakahomena kinnarāṇāṃ sarjarasahomena vināyakānāṃ sarveṣāmaṣṭaśatiko homaḥ saptāhaṃ rājānasya rājasarṣapatailāktānāṃ aṣṭaśataṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:7115: trisandhyaṃ saptarātraṃ ādityābhimukhaṃ lakṣaṃ japet sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyati //
XXbsu041_u:7116: sarvavidyānāmāpyayanaṃ kartukāmaḥ gomūtrayāvakāhāraḥ uśīramayīṃ pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā śuklapuṣpairabhyarcya kṣīrāṣṭaśataṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:7121: dviruccāritena parasya triruccāritena dravyasya rakṣā kṛtā bhavati //
XXbsu041_u:7122: chinnabhinnanaṣṭakīlitānāṃ āpyāyanaṃ kartukāmaḥ uśīramayīṃ pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā śuklaṣuṣpairabhyarcya anena uṣṇīṣarājena paṭasyāgrataḥ rājasarṣapāṇāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt vidyāmuddiśya utkīlitā bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:7123: pāpijanātiriktāṃ vidyāṃ jñātvā gorocanayā bhūrjapatre likhya tataḥ ātmamantramaṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā bhagavataḥ udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā anena bhagavatā sārddhaṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ japtvā tatraiva kuśasaṃstare svapet /
XXbsu041_u:7125: atha padmaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ raktacandanamayaṃ padmaṃ kṛtvā udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā trirātroṣitaḥ taṃ padmaṃ dakṣiṇena hastena gṛhītvā tāvajjaped yāvajjvalitamiti /
XXbsu041_u:7131: atha vajraṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ valmīkamiśrayā mṛttikayā vālukamiśrayā vajraṃ kṛtvā bhikṣāhāraḥ maunī apatthadāyī vajraṃ gṛhya trīṇi lakṣa japet /
XXbsu041_u:7133: taṃ vajramante siddhārthakamadhye sthāpya candragrahe candragrahe sthātavyam /
XXbsu041_u:7150: uṣṇīṣacakravarttinaṃ sādhayato na kaścicchaknoti vighnaṃ kartum /
XXbsu041_u:7152: asya ca jāpakāle satataṃ buddhalocanāṃ pūrvaṃ paścācca japtavyam /
XXbsu041_u:7155: atha samudragāminīṃ nadīmavatīrya padmānāṃ lakṣa nivedayet /
XXbsu041_u:7161: vivarasyāgrataḥ paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya lakṣāṇi trīṇi japet /
XXbsu041_u:7169: śuklapratipadamārabhya triḥkālaṃ jātīkusumaiḥ sakṛjjaptena bhagavatā pādāṅguṣṭhe tāḍayitavyam
XXbsu041_u:7175: atha samudrataṭe paścānmukhaṃ paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya nāgakāṣṭhaiḥ agniṃ prajvālya samudrasyauddiśya nāgapuṣpāṇāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:7183: padmaṃ bhūmyāṃ likhya sahasrapatraṃ tasyoparyupaviśya śatasahasraṃ japet /
XXbsu041_u:7187: prātihārakapakṣe jātīpuṣpāṇāṃ bhagavataḥ uṣṇīṣarājasyopari lakṣaṃ nivedayet /
XXbsu041_u:7192: daśalakṣajaptaḥ yathā yathā prayujyati tathā tathā anenaiva bhagavatā sārddhaṃ yadi vidyā japyate sā niyatamāgacchati /
XXbsu041_u:7193: sākṣādasya japyamānā yadi na vāgacchati sa mūrdhnā sphuṭati /
XXbsu041_u:7196: ayaṃ ca ekākṣara uṣṇīṣacakravartī tathāgata eva sākṣāt ko 'nyaḥ sadevake loke sarvamantravidyānāṃ rājā tathāgata eva /
XXbsu041_u:7205: yatra nidhānaṃ tiṣṭhati tatra gatvā akālakalaśaṃ gṛhya sarvagandhairlipya śvetacandanodakaṃ kumbhe prakṣipya aṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā nidhānaṃ sthāpayet /
XXbsu041_u:7206: yadi nidhānaṃ tiṣṭhati tadā sa bhūmiḥ sphuṭati /
XXbsu041_u:7207: yadi nidhānaṃ puruṣamātre tiṣṭhati udakena spraṣṭavyam /
XXbsu041_u:7209: atha siṃhaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ valmīkamṛttikayā kṛtvā gorocanayā samālabhya piṇḍikāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tāvajjaped yāvacalati /
XXbsu041_u:7215: yadā siṃhanādaṃ nadati tadā devā āsanebhyaścalanti //
XXbsu041_u:7220: jātīpuṣpāṇāṃ lakṣaṃ samudragāminyāṃ nadyāṃ pravāhayet kanyāṃ labhate yāmicchati /
XXbsu041_u:7222: anenoṣṇīṣacakravartinā sa yatra gacchati indro 'pyasyāsanaṃ dadāti /
XXbsu041_u:7223: sarve ca devarājānaḥ dūrādeva dṛṣṭvā bhītā trastā bhavanti /
XXbsu041_u:7224: sarveṣāṃ ca devarājānāṃ prabhāṃ prabhāṃ vyāmīkaroti /
XXbsu041_u:7226: ayaṃ cakravartī tathāgata eṣa devaloke sarve ca kalpasya bhagavataḥ uṣṇīṣacakravartinaḥ ekākṣarasya vaśe vartanti /
XXbsu041_u:7227: tannimnāśca sarve mantratantrāḥ sakalpakāḥ savistarā ityāha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ siṃho narottama iti //
XXbsu041_u:7228: āryamañjuśriyamūlakalpād bodhisattvapiṭakāvataṃsakāt mahāyānavaipulyasūtrāt caturviṃśatimaḥ ekākṣaracakravartikarmavidhipaṭanirdeśapaṭalavisaraḥ parisamāpta iti //
XXbsu041_u:7231: atha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya tatrasthāṃśca devasaṅghāṃ sarvāṃśca buddhabodhisattvā pratyekabuddhāryaśrāvakāṃ punarapi mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma nirdiṣṭo 'yaṃ mañjuśrīḥ sarvatathāgatānāṃ sarvasvabhūtaṃ dharmakośaṃ cintāmaṇipratiprakhyaṃ lokānāmāśayasaphalīkaraṇārthaṃ tasmiṃ kāle yugādhame śūnye buddhakṣetre
XXbsu041_u:7232: parinirvṛtānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ saddharmanetrī antarddhānakālasamaye tasmiṃ kāle tasmiṃ samaye sarvatathāgatānāṃ mantrakośasaṃrakṣanārthaṃ tvadīyakumāramantratantrāṇāṃ kalparāje 'smiṃ nidhānabhūto bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu041_u:7233: japyamāno vidhinā sārabhūto 'yaṃ mañjuśrīḥ sarvatathāgatamantratantrāṇāṃ tvadīye ca kumārakalparāje 'grabhūto bhaviṣyatyayaṃ ekākṣaracakravarttī /
XXbsu041_u:7234: anena japyamānena sarve tāthāgatā vidyārājānaḥ japtā bhavanti //
XXbsu041_u:7235: aparamapi mañjuśrīḥ tvadīyakalparāje nidhānabhūtaṃ sārabhūtaṃ agrabhūtaṃ jyeṣṭhabhūtamekākṣaraṃ pūrvamāsīt /
XXbsu041_u:7236: atīte kāle atīte samaye dvāṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīsikataprakhyaiḥ kalpaiḥ amitāyurjñānaviniścayarājendro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyak sambuddhaḥ vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavāṃ
XXbsu041_u:7237: / yasya smaraṇādeva nāmagrahaṇamātreṇa pañcānantaryāṇi kṣayaṃ gacchanti /
XXbsu041_u:7238: niyataṃ bodhiparāyaṇā bahavaḥ sattvāḥ ye nāmamātraṃ śroṣyante /
XXbsu041_u:7240: avaśyaṃ ca sarvamantrajāpibhiḥ ayaṃ bhagavānamitāyurjñānaviniścayarājā tathāgataḥ prathamata eva manasi karttavyaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:7241: vācā ca vaktavyā - namastasmai bhagavate amitāyurjñānaviniścayarājendrāya tathāgatāyārhate samyak sambuddhāya //
XXbsu041_u:7242: tato 'mitābhaṃ ratnaketuṃ tataḥ sarvabuddhānāṃ praṇāmaṃ kṛtvā yathepsitaṃ
XXbsu041_u:7245: yat kāraṇaṃ mahāpuṇyābhivṛddhaye mantrāṇāṃ tathāgatānāṃ saṃjñāparikīrttanaṃ namaskāraṃ ca sarvatathāgatānāṃ ca pramāṇaṃ niyataṃ bodhiparāyaṇo 'yaṃ
XXbsu041_u:7248: mantrā ca tasya āśu siddhiṃ prayacchanti /
XXbsu041_u:7249: amitāyurjñānaviniścayarājendreṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyak sambuddhena ayamekākṣaramantraḥ sarvatathāgatahṛdayaḥ sarvamantratantrābhimataḥ sarvakarmāsādhakaḥ mañjughoṣa tvadīye kalparāje paramarahasyaṃ paramaguhyatamaṃ lokenātmahitāya prayoktavyam /
XXbsu041_u:7251: aprasanne tathā śāstu śāsane 'smiṃ jinodite // Mmk_27.1 //
XXbsu041_u:7253: na kathañcit prayoktavyaḥ aprasanne jinasūbunām // Mmk_27.2 //
XXbsu041_u:7255: na tasya deyaṃ mantraṃ vai siddhistasya na dṛśyate // Mmk_27.3 //
XXbsu041_u:7262: hṛdayaṃ sarvabuddhānāṃ sarvamantrāṇāṃ ca udbhavaḥ // Mmk_27.6 //
XXbsu041_u:7263: ṣaṭsaptatyaḥ tathā koṭyaḥ purā gītaṃ svayambhunā /
XXbsu041_u:7272: sāṣṭaṃ karmasahasraṃ ca kurute ca dhruvaṃ tathā /
XXbsu041_u:7273: vicitrāṃ sampadaṃ dadyād vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā // Mmk_27.11 //
XXbsu041_u:7278: ta imaṃ yugāntake loke śāstariḥ parinirvṛte /
XXbsu041_u:7279: siddhiṃ ca yāsyate kṣipraṃ vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā // Mmk_27.14 //
XXbsu041_u:7285: sa dadyuḥ mantravaraṃ mukhyaṃ buddhaputrasya dhīmate // Mmk_27.17 //
XXbsu041_u:7292: śreyasārthaṃ tu bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ mantramabrīt // Mmk_27.20 //
XXbsu041_u:7297: eṣa saḥ mārṣā amitāyurjñānaviniścayarājendreṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyak sambuddhena bhāṣitam
XXbsu041_u:7298: amitavyūhavatyāṃ lokadhātau sthitena sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janasyārthāya anāgatānāṃ ca janatāmavekṣya śāsanāntarddhānakālasamayaṃ viditvāṃ ante yugādhame ratnatrayāpakāriṇāṃ duṣṭarājñāṃ nivāraṇārthaṃ jyeṣṭhamaurasaṃ putraṃ sarvatathāgatānāṃ mahāsthāmaprāptāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya dattavāṃ /
XXbsu041_u:7300: samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ mañjuśriyasya kumārabhūtasya dattavāṃ /
XXbsu041_u:7301: tato mañjuśriyeṇa kumārabhūtena sarvasattvānāmanugrahārthaṃ mahākaruṇāvaśena hṛdayasthaḥ svamūrttau sthāpitavāṃ /
XXbsu041_u:7302: anāgatakālamavekṣya yugādhame śāsanāntarddhānakālasamaye ahamapaścimakastathāgataḥ duṣṭe kāle kalau yuge mama śāsanasaṃrakṣaṇārthaṃ kariṣyatyayaṃ mantravaraḥ //
XXbsu041_u:7304: śṛṇu kumāra mañjusvara susvara tavaitanmāhātmyaṃ kalpavistaram /
XXbsu041_u:7308: / kṣīrāhāreṇa mauninā nānyatra mantragatacittena tṛśaraṇaparigṛhītena utpāditabodhicittena ca moṣadhaśīlasaṃvarasamādāpanābodhisattvasaṃvarasaṃvaraparigṛhītena japtavyam /
XXbsu041_u:7311: upoṣadhikena citrakareṇa aśleṣakairvarṇaiḥ anyatareṇa śucinā celakhaṇḍena paṭṭake vā candanakarpūrakuṅkumaparyuṣitena śucau deśe śucinā citrakareṇa triśuklabhojinā śucivastraprāvṛtena ādityodayakālaparipūrṇapañcadaśyāṃ viśuddhanakṣatreṇa likhāpayitavyaṃ yāvanmadhyāhnam /
XXbsu041_u:7313: evaṃ divase divase yāvat parisamāpta iti //
XXbsu041_u:7315: hastamātre paṭe sugatavitasticaturasre paṭṭake vā samantādamitāyurvatīṃ lokadhātuṃ samantāt padmarāgendranīlasphaṭikamarakataparvatairadhastāt upaśobhitaṃ
XXbsu041_u:7316: upariṣṭācca teṣāṃ mahāratnavimānopaśobhitākāraṃ dhvajapatākopaśobhitocchritākāraṃ tatra madhye ratnasiṃhāsanopaviṣṭamamitāyuviniścayarājendraṃ tathāgataṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānaṃ samantaprabhājvālāmālinaṃ īṣadraktāvadātaṃ vāmapārśvaratnopalaniṣaṇṇaṃ mahāsthāmaprāptaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ cāmaravyagrahastaṃ tathāgatadṛṣṭiṃ vāmahastabījapūrṇakaphalanyastaṃ priyaṅguśyāmāvadātaṃ sarvālaṅkārālaṅkṛtaśarīraṃ samantajvālaṃ dakṣiṇapārśve bhagavantaṃ samantabhadraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ ratnopalasthitaṃ cāmaravyagrahastaṃ uddhūyamānasitavinyastapāṇiṃ vāmahastena ratnapāṇisarvālaṅkāraratnamakuṭavicchuritapriyaṅguśyāmāvadātaṃ (Vaidya 237) nīlapaṭṭacalanikānivastaṃ muktikāhāraratnayajñopavītaṃ samantajvālāmālāvabaddhaṃ tasya dakṣiṇapārśve āryamañjuśriyaṃ ratnopalasthitakaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ pañcacīrakopaśobhitaṃ śiraṃ bāladārakālaṅkārālaṅkṛtaṃ kanakavarṇaṃ nīlapaṭṭacalanikānivastaṃ
XXbsu041_u:7317: muktāvalīratnavyatimiśraṃ yajñopavītaṃ tathāgatadṛṣṭiṃ īṣatprahasitavadanaṃ saumyākāraṃ cārurūpaṃ kṛtāñjalipuṭaṃ sarvākāravaropetaṃ likhāpayitavyam /
XXbsu041_u:7318: tasyādhastād yathā ce liṅgaṃ veṣī saṃsthānadhārī sādhakaḥ padmamālāṃ gṛhya jānukorparasaṃsthitaḥ avanataśiraḥ paṭakoṇāntadeśe likhāpayitavyaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:7321: vāmapārśve upariṣṭād dvau tathāgatau abhilikhāpayitavyau sālendrarājā ratnaketuśca /
XXbsu041_u:7322: samantaprabhā samantajvālā kanakavarṇāḥ sarvākāravaropetā sarvapuṣpābhikīrṇā niṣaṇṇā padmāsaneṣveva nānyāsaneṣu dharmaṃ deśayamānāḥ paryaṅkopaviṣṭāḥ saumyākārā bhagavataḥ upariṣṭāt puṣpa varṣaṃ pravarṣayamānaṃ meghāntargatalīnaṃ tathāgatavigrahamutpatamānaṃ sunetranāmā abhilikhāpayitavyaḥ sarvākāravaropetaṃ samantaprabhājvālāmālinaṃ dakṣiṇahastena varapradaṃ vāmahastena cīvarakarṇakāvasaktam
XXbsu041_u:7323: etad bhagavataḥ amitāyurjñānaviniścayarājendrasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya paṭavidhānam
XXbsu041_u:7329: saṃkṣepataḥ sarvatathāgatoṣṇīṣarājānaṃ mahācakravartinamekākṣarasya ca yāni kalpavistarāṇi uktāni tāni sarvāṇi karoti /
XXbsu041_u:7334: manasā yadabhirucitaṃ asya paṭasya darśanādeva niyataṃ bodhiparāyaṇo bhavati //
XXbsu041_u:7335: tasyaiva bhagavataḥ amitāyurjñānaviniścayarājendrasyādhiṣṭhānena sarvatathāgatahṛdaya ityucyate sarvatathāgata uṣṇīṣarājamityucyate /
XXbsu041_u:7351: katame ca te? ādau tāvadekajaptaḥ ātmarakṣā /
XXbsu041_u:7359: varjayitvā tu svecchayā tadaha eva rātryāmeko yadi rocate dine dine kartavyaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:7360: atha na rocate bhasma saptābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā nābhideśaṃ spṛśet /
XXbsu041_u:7363: pañcajapto buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dhyātvā yaṃ spṛśet sa vaśyo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:7364: candramasagrahe śaśigrahe śaśimaṇḍale arkakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya vināpi paṭena pūrvābhimukhaḥ ājyāhutīnāṃ daśasahasrāṇi juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:7365: rājakulasamīpe nimnagānāntarite devāvasathe vā nāntaritaṃ yasmiṃ deśe rājā tiṣṭhati tatra samīpe homakarmaḥ prayoktavyaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:7368: yadā na paśyate tadā tasya cittaṃ nyastaṃ bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:7375: etat karma śrāddhānāṃ ratnatrayaprasannānāṃ utpāditabodhicittānāṃ na kartavyam /
XXbsu041_u:7378: duṣṭacittānāṃ raudracittānāṃ dinedine darśanaṃ ca dātavyam /
XXbsu041_u:7380: yadi na bhavanti mahatā arthena viyujyante /
XXbsu041_u:7384: prabhāte deśasvāmī rājā bhavati mantrāpayati mantritavyam /
XXbsu041_u:7388: yadi sarvayāmikaṃ rātriṃ juhoti māsenekena labhate /
XXbsu041_u:7389: yadi māsaṃ juhoti rātryāṃ rātryāṃ viṣayaṃ pratilabhate /
XXbsu041_u:7390: viṣayapratitulyaṃ vā grāmaṃ anyaṃ vā yat kiñcid vitam /
XXbsu041_u:7393: candragrahe apāmārgakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya palāśasamidhānāṃ brāhmaṇāre dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:7395: prabhāte saumyā brāhmaṇā rājā vidviṣṭo bhavati //
XXbsu041_u:7398: homānte ca yasyāṃ diśi prabhustiṣṭhati tasyāṃ diśi tad bhasma kṣipet /
XXbsu041_u:7400: yaṃ vā taṃ vā yasmiṃ vā tasmiṃ vā kāle rocate bhogāṃ vistarataiḥ sāhāyyatāṃ ca pratipadyate
XXbsu041_u:7401: svalpamalpaṃ vā mahāntaṃ vā grāmamanuprayacchati viṣayaṃ vā /
XXbsu041_u:7403: atha kruddhacittaścaturvarṇyo anyataraṃ vikṛtasthāne vā yāto vikṛṣṭapradhānaliṅgena vā anyadevatābhaktaṃ laukikeṣu yasmiṃ diśi te tiṣṭhanti tadeva veśma so 'sya deśāntaraṃ prakramate /
XXbsu041_u:7410: candragrahe tenaiva vidhinā buddhabodhisattvapratimāpaṭasya vā saddharmapustake vā sadhātukagarbhacaitye vā śucinā śucivastraprāvṛtena ahorātroṣitena niṣprāṇakenodakena karma karttavyam /
XXbsu041_u:7411: śuṣkapuṣpaiḥ sugandhaiḥ candanakuṅkumaparipūrṇaḥ karpūradhūpadhūpitoddeśaṃ taṃ kuryāt /

XXbsu041_u:7414: aśvatthakāṣṭhaiḥ vaiśyāreḥ khadirakāṣṭhaiḥ śūdrārestadanyaiḥ kāṣṭhaiḥ agniṃ prajvālya tadeva karma kuryāt /
XXbsu041_u:7415: brāhmaṇasya palāśasamidha kṣatriyasyāśvatthasamidhaṃ vaiśyasya khadirasamidhaṃ śūdrasya apāmārgasamidhaṃ tadanyairvā yathālabdhaiḥ rājyahomānte kuryāt /
XXbsu041_u:7417: aṣṭasahasraṃ ghṛtāhutīnāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ ante ca tasyāṃ tadeva bhasmaṃ kṣipet /

XXbsu041_u:7424: etāni vā parāṇi ca yatheṣṭāni karmāṇi bhavanti /

XXbsu041_u:7432: saumyaśca puṣpaphalaṃ anyaṃ vā yatkiñcitsagandhaṃ saptābhimantri kṛtvā rājño nivedayet /
XXbsu041_u:7434: anyo vā yaḥ kaścit sattvaḥ sa darśanamātreṇaiva vaśyo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:7438: anāthe patite klībe vratine ceha śāsane /
XXbsu041_u:7439: ratnatrayaprasannena kuryāt tat karma īdṛśam // Mmk_27.21 //
XXbsu041_u:7440: strīṣu karma na kuryād vai bālavṛddhe tathāture /
XXbsu041_u:7441: daridre duḥkhite cāpi alpasattve viyonije // Mmk_27.22 //
XXbsu041_u:7442: na kuryāt karmamevaṃ tu mahāsattve prayojayet /

XXbsu041_u:7446: aśrāddhe sarvamantrāṇāṃ oṣadhīnāṃ ca yoginām // Mmk_27.24 //
XXbsu041_u:7448: eteṣu karma prayuñjīta dhārmikeṣu vivarjitam // Mmk_27.25 //
XXbsu041_u:7450: tadeva bhasma kruddho vai yāṃ diśaṃ kṣipate japī // Mmk_27.26 //
XXbsu041_u:7452: dīrghaglānyatāṃ yāti te 'pi janā dhruvam // Mmk_27.27 //
XXbsu041_u:7453: mahāmāryopasargaṃ ca tasmiṃ deśe tu dṛśyate /

XXbsu041_u:7456: yāvat tatkarmaṇā pūrṇe dvisaptāhā tu saṃharet // Mmk_27.29 //
XXbsu041_u:7459: tṛsaptāhe tathā mṛtyuḥ tasmāt taṃ parivarjayet // Mmk_27.30 //

XXbsu041_u:7467: kevalaṃ tu idaṃ proktaṃ kṛṣṇaśubhakarmaphalodayam // Mmk_27.34 //

XXbsu041_u:7470: vyatimiśraṃ tathā karmaṃ vyatimiśraṃ tu paṭhyate /

XXbsu041_u:7474: prāṇoparidhānnarakaṃ tu jāpī yāti punaḥ punaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:7476: svarga tathā siddhiḥ mantrāṇāṃ ca śubhā gatiḥ /
XXbsu041_u:7480: mantrā tasya siddhyante jāpinasya śubhe sthite /

XXbsu041_u:7485: kṣudrakarma prakurvīta uttamaṃ tu na labhyate // Mmk_27.43 //
XXbsu041_u:7487: aghamaṃ siddhyate kṣipraṃ vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā // Mmk_27.44 //
XXbsu041_u:7489: utkṛṣṭarūpī tapasvī ca labhate uttamaṃ tathā // Mmk_27.45 //
XXbsu041_u:7496: stoka stokataraṃ karma labhyate kṣudrasiddhiriti // Mmk_27.48 //
XXbsu041_u:7497: āryamañjuśriyamūlakalpād bodhisattvapiṭakāvataṃsakāt mahāyānavaipulyasūtrāt pañcaviṃśatimaḥ ekākṣaramūlamantra āryamañjuśrīhṛdayakalpapaṭavidhānavisaraḥ parisamāpta iti //
XXbsu041_u:7500: atha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma /
XXbsu041_u:7501: asti mañjuśrīḥ aparamapi tvadīyapaṭavidhānaṃ sādhanaupayikaṃ sarvakarmārthasādhakam /
XXbsu041_u:7502: etenaiva tu ekākṣareṇa hṛdayamantreṇa ṣaḍākṣareṇa vāmakarāntena tvadīyena mūlamantreṇa vā ṣaḍakṣarahṛdayena omkārādyena ekākṣareṇa vā paṭasyāgrataḥ asyaiva kalpaṃ bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:7503: paścime kāle paścime samaye mayi tathāgate parinirvṛte śūnye buddhakṣetre yugādhame prāpte atrāṇe loke aśaraṇe aparāyaṇe idameva kalparājā trāṇabhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu041_u:7506: ādau tāvat pūrvamevānāhate paṭe keśāpagate saptahastāyate tṛhastapṛthake sadaśe kuṅkumacandanarasaparyuṣite buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ likhayet
XXbsu041_u:7508: dakṣiṇe pārśve sudhanaṃ subhūmiṃ āryākṣayamatiṃ mañjuśriyaṃ ca bhagavato namaskāraṃ kurvantaṃ kumārarūpiṇaṃ sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitāṅgaṃ vāmapārśve samantabhadraṃ āryāvalokiteśvaraṃ bhadrapālaṃ suśobhanaṃ ca lekhayet /
XXbsu041_u:7513: upariṣṭācca vidyādharakumārau mālādhāriṇau meghāśca varṣamāṇāḥ savidyutā lekhayitavyāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:7514: sarve ca bodhisattvā puṣpamāṇā yo bhagavato mukhaṃ vyavalokayantaḥ kartavyāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:7516: tamīdṛśaṃ paṭaṃ sadhātuke caitye sthāpya paścānmukhamakṣaralakṣaṃ japet /
XXbsu041_u:7517: asya mañjuśriyaḥ kāṣṭhamaunī triḥkālasnāyī tṛcelaparivarttī satatapoṣadhikaḥ śākayāvakayathābhaikṣabhaikṣāhāraścaturbhāgamannaṃ kṛtvā ratnatrayasya bhāgamekaṃ anyaḥ mañjuśriyaḥ anyat sarvasattvānāṃ śeṣamātmano payuñjīta akṣāntakāyo manasi bhagavantaṃ kṛtvā sarvasattvānālambanena manasā nātmārthamahaṃ kiñcit karomi kariṣyāmyanyatra sarvasattvānāmarthāyeti dhyātvā jāpaṃ kuryāt /
XXbsu041_u:7518: snānaṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ baliṃ pradīpāṃśca dadyāt /
XXbsu041_u:7519: snāpanaṃ paṭacchāyāyāḥ gandhānadhastāt puṣpāṇi ca baliṃ ca satataṃ dadyāt /
XXbsu041_u:7521: ratnatrayasya paścānmaitreyasya tadanantaramavalokiteśvarasya āryasamantabhadrasya āryākāśagarbhasya āryākṣayamateḥ kumārabhūtasya candraprabhasya sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhiṇaḥ āryavajradharasya āryatārāyāḥ āryamahāmāyūryā āryaparājitāyāḥ bhagavatyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāśca gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ baliṃ ca sarvameteṣāṃ pūrvaṃ datvā paścāt paṭasya dadyāt //
XXbsu041_u:7522: paścād bahirekasmiṃ pradeśe sarvoṣṭragardabhaśvahastirūpāṇi vināyakāni valmīkamṛttikayā kṛtvā teṣāṃ cāśeṣaṃ dadyāt /
XXbsu041_u:7535: japakāle bhagavato 'tha mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya mukhamavalokya jāpaṃ kuryāt /
XXbsu041_u:7538: anena vidhinā pūrvasevāṃ kṛtvā paṭaṃ kvacit svasthe sthāne sthāpya karma kuryāt /
XXbsu041_u:7540: paścād bhagavantaṃ mañjuśriyaṃ śvetacandanamayaṃ padmāsanasthaṃ bhagavatīṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ ekahaste dadhānaṃ dakṣiṇena phalaṃ dadhānaṃ kārayet /
XXbsu041_u:7541: tamekasmiṃ śucau pradeśe paścānmukhaṃ sthāpayitvā tasyāgrato 'gnikuṇḍaṃ
XXbsu041_u:7543: sarvakarma sacaturasraṃ dvivitastipramāṇaṃ adhaśca gandhāṃ sarvadhānyāni ca kṣipet /
XXbsu041_u:7545: anena vidhinā navamagnimutpādya aśvatthasamidbhiragniṃ athavāśokasya vā ghṛtatandulodanaṃ kṣīradadhi madhu ca sarvamupahṛtya tāmrabhājane sthāpayitvā aṣṭasahasraṃ parijapya pūrṇāhutiṃ dadyāt /
XXbsu041_u:7546: paścādanyasmiṃ dine śuklapratipadamārabhya karma kuryāt aśvatthasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya vigatadhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvā agnimāvāhayet /
XXbsu041_u:7547: āgaccha haripiṅgala dīptajihva lohitākṣa haripiṅgala dehi dadāpaya svāhā //
XXbsu041_u:7550: āgacchagaccha kumārabhūta sarvasattvārthamudyato 'haṃ sāhāyyaṃ me kalpaya
XXbsu041_u:7553: āgatasya cārgho deyaḥ sugandhapuṣpapānīyena paścāddhomaṃ kuryāt /
XXbsu041_u:7555: evaṃ saptadivasāni ghṛtatandulāni tilayāvakena cāpyāyanaṃ kuryāt //
XXbsu041_u:7581: jātīkusumānāṃ jale ekaikaṃ puṣpaṃ gṛhītvā juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:7582: avaśeṣaṃ khaṇḍaṃ yasya ghrāṇāya dīyate sa ghrāṇamātreṇa vaśyo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:7583: kuṅkuma kastūrikālavaṅgapuṣpaṃ ca mukhe prakṣipya japet /
XXbsu041_u:7584: yena saha mantrayate sa vaśyo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:7585: marīcamaṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā mukhe prakṣipya kruddho 'pi vacanena priyo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:7591: jātīkusumasahitaṃ pānīyaṃ śucau pradeśe bhūmau juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:7596: parasya kruddhasyāpi maitrīṃ bhāvayittvā anusmṛtya mukhaṃ vyavalokayet /
XXbsu041_u:7598: sarvasugandhapuṣpaiḥ homaṃ kuryād yamuddiśya karoti sa vaśyo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:7602: puṣpāṇyabhimantrya yasya dadāti sa vaśyo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:7606: vīrakrayakrītāṃ guggulusarjarasaṃ gandharasaṃ śrīvāsakaṃ caikataḥ kṛtvā juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:7607: pañcamyāṃ pañcamyāṃ ṣaṇmāsam pūrṇe sahasraguṇaṃ labhate /
XXbsu041_u:7608: sarvagandhaiḥ pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā tīkṣṇaśastreṇaikadhāreṇa cchitvā cchitvā juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:7609: dakṣiṇena pādā puruṣasya vāmapādaṃ striyaḥ yamicchati sa vaśyo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:7612: arkakāṣṭhairdhānyaṃ śirīṣapuṣpairaśvāṃ aśokapuṣpaiḥ suvarṇaṃ vyādhighātakapuṣpairvastrāṇi labhate /
XXbsu041_u:7613: yad yadicchati tat sarvaṃ jātīkusumahomena karoti /
XXbsu041_u:7616: saptajaptaṃ bhājanaṃ kṛtvā bhikṣāmaṭati bhikṣāmakṣayāṃ labhate /
XXbsu041_u:7617: rātryāmutthāya parijapyātmānaṃ svayaṃ śobhanāni svapnāni paśyati //
XXbsu041_u:7618: atha rājānaṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ tasya pādapāṃsuṃ gṛhītvā sarṣapaistailaiśca miśrayitvā juhuyāt
XXbsu041_u:7620: rājñīṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ sauvarcalāṃ śatapuṣpāṃ vārāhīṃ caikataḥ kṛtvā juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:7622: rājamātyaṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ bhallātakānāṃ tilāṃ vacāṃ ca pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:7624: purohitaṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ brahmadaṇḍīṃ śatapuṣpāṃ caikataḥ kṛtvā juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:7628: atha kṣatriyaṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ, śālyodanaṃ ghṛtasahitaṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:7634: sarvānekataḥ kṛtvā juhuyāt sarve vaśyā bhavanti /
XXbsu041_u:7635: catuḥpathe ekaśūnye gṛhe vā baliṃ nivedya yo 'sya glānaḥ sa tasmād vinirmukto bhavati //
XXbsu041_u:7638: sarvarogebhyaḥ mūśrakaṃ badhvā śikhā bandhaṃ kṛtvā svaptavyaṃ /
XXbsu041_u:7646: pūrvoktena vidhānena anāhate paṭe keśāpagate āryamañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ ābhilekhyaḥ sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitaḥ
XXbsu041_u:7659: yatpramāṇānāṃ padmānāṃ rāśiṃ juhoti tatpramāṇānāṃ dīnārāṇā rāśī labhate /
XXbsu041_u:7660: yāvad yāvat tāvajjapyamānāṃ na gṛhṇāti tāvad vidyādharacakravartī bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:7680: anenaiva vidhinā puṣpāṇāṃ sugandhānāṃ lakṣaṃ pādamūle nivedayet /
XXbsu041_u:7686: hastiskandhe mañjuśriyamagrato balasya dattvā darśanamātreṇaiva parabalasya bhaṅgo bhavati
XXbsu041_u:7692: pradīpānāṃ sahasraṃ dattvā ekapradīpaṃ padmasūtravarttiṃ kṛtvā madhuyaṣṭiṃ veṣṭayitvā prajvālya paśyed yathābhūtaṃ mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ paśyati // dvitīyaṃ paṭavidhānaṃ samāptam /
XXbsu041_u:7693: sauvarṇaṃ rajataṃ vā kumāraṃ kṛtvā varadaṃ dakṣiṇena pāṇinā /
XXbsu041_u:7694: vāmena bhagavatīṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dadhānaṃ tamīdṛśaṃ sadhātukakaraṇḍakaṃ purataḥ sthāpyākṣaralakṣaṃ japet /
XXbsu041_u:7699: pūrvoktena vidhānenāvāhanavisarjanaṃ padmamudrāṃ badhvā jāpaṃ kuryāt /
XXbsu041_u:7700: dhvajamudrāyā āvarttanaṃ svastikamudrayā āsanaṃ pūrṇamudrāyārghaṃ ekaliṅgamudrāyāṃ puṣpāṇi manorathamudrāyāṃ pradīpaṃ yamalamudrāyā dhūpaṃ mayūrāsanamudrāyā gandhaṃ yaṣṭimudrāyā baliṃ anena vidhānena rātrau dinedine kuryād yāvajjāpaparisamāptiriti /
XXbsu041_u:7704: rātrau jātikusumaughaṃ kṛtvā bhagavataḥ purataḥ svapet /
XXbsu041_u:7705: bhagavantaṃ paśyati dharma deśayamānaṃ bodhisattvaparivṛtaṃ yamuddiśya karoti tadeva kama kuryāt /
XXbsu041_u:7707: upoṣadhikena śuklapratipadamārabhya śrīvāsakadhūpaṃ madhumiśraṃ juhuyāt rājyaṃ labhate /
XXbsu041_u:7708: koṭiṃ japet mañjuśriyaṃ svayameva paśyati dharmadeśanāṃ ca karoti /
XXbsu041_u:7709: yadi kenacit sahollāpayati sammukhamavabhāṣate avaivarttikaśca bodhisattvo bhavati //
XXbsu041_u:7712: raktacandanamayaṃ kumārarūpiṇaṃ ekena pārśvena priyaṃkaraṃ anyena vīramatī sāśokavṛkṣāśrayāṃ kārayet /
XXbsu041_u:7713: tamekapārśve sthāpayitvā lavaṇasarvaparājikāvyāmiśreṇa raktacandanapratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā cchitvā cchitvā juhuyād yasya nāmnā sa vaśyo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:7714: udumbaraphalāni yasya nāmnā juhuyāt sa vaśyo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:7715: kākodumbarikāphalāni juhuyād yasya nāmnā sa vaśyo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:7716: śṛṅgāṭakaṃ juhuyāt brāhmaṇavaśīkaraṇe padmamūlāni kṣatriyavaśīkaraṇe kaśerukāṇi juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:7719: trisandhyaṃ saptāhaṃ yasya nāmnā juhoti sa vaśyo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:7720: nimbapatrāṇi kaṭutailāktāni juhuyāt āhutyāṣṭasahasraṃ trisandhyaṃ saptāhaṃ yasya nāmnā sa vaśyo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:7727: brāhmīrasaghṛtasahitaṃ tāmrabhājane sthāpayitvā tāvajjaped yāvad daśasahasrāṇi paścāt pibet sarvavādino vijayate /
XXbsu041_u:7728: yasya kruddhasyāṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā loṣṭaṃ kṣipet purataḥ sa krodhaṃ muñcati // caturthaṃ vidhānam /
XXbsu041_u:7729: anāhate paṭe keśāpagate upoṣadhikena citrakareṇa aśleṣakairvarṇakaiḥ āryamañjuśriyaścitrāpayitavyaḥ

XXbsu041_u:8079: yā tu sāmā taṭī vācā yā ca vācā harikelikā /
XXbsu041_u:8085: vācā rakārabahulā tu vācā asphuṭatāṃ gatā /
XXbsu041_u:8086: avyaktā niṣṭhurā caiva sakrodhāṃ pretayoniṣu // Mmk_31.38 //
XXbsu041_u:8089: ḍakāre rephasaṃyuktā sā vācā rākṣasī smṛtā /
XXbsu041_u:8093: pāścamī vāca nirdiṣṭā vaidiśīścāpi mālavī // Mmk_31.41 //
XXbsu041_u:8095: daśārṇavī cāpi pārvatyā śrīkaṇṭhī cāpi gaurjarī // Mmk_31.42 //
XXbsu041_u:8097: tadanyāṃ grahamukhyāṃ tu pāriyātrī vikalpitā // Mmk_31.43 //
XXbsu041_u:8099: khaṣadroṇyāṃ tu sambhūte jane vācā tu yādṛśī // Mmk_31.44 //
XXbsu041_u:8103: kaśmīre deśasamudbhūtā kāviśe ca janālaye // Mmk_31.46 //
XXbsu041_u:8109: vītarāgāṃ tu ye cihnā te cihnā jinasambhavā // Mmk_31.49 //
XXbsu041_u:8110: yatra deśe bhaved vācā tatrasthā gaticeṣṭitā /
XXbsu041_u:8111: tadeva nirdiśet sattvaṃ taccihnaṃ tu sarvataḥ // Mmk_31.50 //
XXbsu041_u:8115: śrīparvate tathā śaile sambhūtā ye ca jantavaḥ // Mmk_31.52 //
XXbsu041_u:8119: tatra deśe tu ye cihnā taddeśe gaticeṣṭitā // Mmk_31.54 //
XXbsu041_u:8121: ete cānye ca bahavo tacceṣṭāgaticeṣṭinaḥ // Mmk_31.55 //
XXbsu041_u:8126: sarveṣāṃ tu prakurvīta mānuṣāṇāṃ sukhāvaham // Mmk_31.57 //
XXbsu041_u:8130: pañcacīrāsu vinyastaḥ mahārakṣo kṛtā bhaviṣyati // Mmk_31.59 //
XXbsu041_u:8131: āryamañjuśriyamūlakalpād bodhisattvapiṭakāvataṃsakāt mahāyānavaipulyasūtrāt ekūnatriṃśatimaḥ āviṣṭaceṣṭavidhiparivartapaṭavisaraḥ parisamāptaḥ iti //
XXbsu041_u:8134: atha khalu bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma /
XXbsu041_u:8135: asti mañjuśrīḥ tvadīyamantrāṇāṃ sarvatantreṣu samanupraveśasarvavidyārahasyamanekakālaguṇaśakalaphalodayamapyanubandhanimittaṃ pramāṇato vakṣye siddhikāraṇāni /
XXbsu041_u:8142: tadyoge yuktitaḥ dhīro prāpnuyāt siddhimuttamām // Mmk_32.3 //
XXbsu041_u:8143: asiddhaṃ siddhyate karma na siddhiḥ karmaṇā vinā /
XXbsu041_u:8146: na vavre mantriṇā mantraṃ amantro mantriṇo bhavet // Mmk_32.5 //
XXbsu041_u:8152: na siddhistasya mantrāṇāṃ śakrasyāpi samāsataḥ // Mmk_32.8 //
XXbsu041_u:8154: na siddhistasya dṛśyate brahmaṇasyāpi mahātmanaḥ // Mmk_32.9 //
XXbsu041_u:8157: ālasyā mithunasaṃyogī asya siddhiḥ kuto bhavet /
XXbsu041_u:8158: surāṇāṃ guravo yadya asurāṇāṃ ca yestadā // Mmk_32.11 //
XXbsu041_u:8159: te 'pi sādhayituṃ mantraṃ na śakto vidhivarjitam /
XXbsu041_u:8161: tasmāt taṃ japenmantraṃ ayuktaṃ vidhinā vinā /
XXbsu041_u:8163: saṃmūḍhāstu tato bālā patante kaṣṭatamāṃ gatim /
XXbsu041_u:8166: anupūrvyā tataḥ siddhiṃ prayacchanti śubhāṃ gatim /
XXbsu041_u:8167: tato taṃ japinaṃ mantrā sthāpayanti śivācale // Mmk_32.15 //
XXbsu041_u:8175: sucirāt kālataraṃ gatvā mantrāṇāṃ siddhi dṛśyate // Mmk_32.19 //
XXbsu041_u:8176: vidhiyuktā hi mantrā vai kṣipraṃ siddhimavāpnuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:8179: na niṣpattiḥ phalakarmaṇāṃ nāphalaṃ karmamiṣyate // Mmk_32.21 //
XXbsu041_u:8185: ihaiva janme bhavet siddhiḥ janmānte ca pravarttate // Mmk_32.24 //
XXbsu041_u:8187: yattu lokavinirdiṣṭaṃ śivaṃ sthānaṃ sunirmalam // Mmk_32.25 //
XXbsu041_u:8189: tadantaṃ tasya antaṃ vai mantrasiddhirudāhṛtā // Mmk_32.26 //
XXbsu041_u:8191: mantrā tu kathitaṃ loke municandrairmaharddhikaiḥ // Mmk_32.27 //
XXbsu041_u:8192: sākṣāt siddhi samādiṣṭā iha janme 'pi dehinām /
XXbsu041_u:8193: śūnye tatvavide kṣetre mantrā buddhatvamāviśet // Mmk_32.28 //
XXbsu041_u:8194: ante kaliyuge kāle śāntiṃ tattvavide gate /
XXbsu041_u:8195: mantrā siddhiṃ na gaccheyuḥ kṣipramartthābhikāṃkṣiṇām // Mmk_32.29 //
XXbsu041_u:8200: madhyakāle tathā siddhi madhyamā tu udāhṛtā // Mmk_32.31 //
XXbsu041_u:8202: yuge śobhane kāle viyatyotpatanaṃ tathā // Mmk_32.32 //
XXbsu041_u:8204: tadā kāle jinendrāṇāṃ kulāgryaṃ tat prasidhyati // Mmk_32.33 //
XXbsu041_u:8205: madhye padmakule siddhiḥ yugānte vajrakulasya tu /
XXbsu041_u:8206: praṇidhānavaśāt kecit mantrā siddhyanti sarvadā // Mmk_32.34 //
XXbsu041_u:8207: avalokiteśo mañjuśrī tārā bhṛkuṭī ca yakṣarāṭ /
XXbsu041_u:8208: sarve māṇicarā yakṣā siddhyante sarvakālataḥ // Mmk_32.35 //
XXbsu041_u:8209: rāgiṇo ye ca mantrādyā prayuktā sarvadaivataiḥ /
XXbsu041_u:8210: siddhyante kaliyuge kāle laukikā ye sucihnitāḥ // Mmk_32.36 //
XXbsu041_u:8216: viṣṇunā sarvabhūtaistu mantra proktā maharddhikāḥ // Mmk_32.39 //
XXbsu041_u:8217: te 'pi tasmiṃ yugānte vai siddhiṃ gacchanti jāpinām /
XXbsu041_u:8218: krūrakarme tathā siddhiḥ tasmiṃ kāle mahadbhaye // Mmk_32.40 //
XXbsu041_u:8221: ata eva jinendreṇa tasmiṃ kāle mahadbhaye /
XXbsu041_u:8225: āryamañjuśriyamūlakalpād bodhisattvapiṭakāvataṃsakāt mahāyānavaipulyasūtrāt triṃśatimaḥ vidhiniyamakālapaṭalavisaraḥ parisamāptaḥ iti //
XXbsu041_u:8228: atha khalu bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ sarvāvantaṃ śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya,
XXbsu041_u:8230: tvadīye mañjuśrīkalparāje nirdiśasamākhyāte dharmadhātukośatathāgatagarbhadharmadhātuniṣpandānucarite mahāsūtravararatnapaṭalavisare tathāgataguhyavaramanujñāte mantravadhasādhyamāne nimittajñānacihnakālapramāṇāntaritasādhanaupayikāni sarvabhūtarutavitāni asattvasattvasaṃjñānirghoṣāni bhavanti //
XXbsu041_u:8231: śābdikaṃ jñānaṃ ityukta aśābdikaṃ caiva kīrtyate /
XXbsu041_u:8232: vyatimiśraṃ tathā yuktimantrāṇāṃ trividhā kriyā // Mmk_33.1 //
XXbsu041_u:8236: nityaṃ padārthahīnaṃ tu tat tridhā paribhidyate // Mmk_33.3 //
XXbsu041_u:8244: navamaṃ daśamaṃ caiva varṇānāṃ siddhiriṣyate // Mmk_33.7 //
XXbsu041_u:8246: yāvaddaśaguṇā hyete varṇā dṛśyanti mahītale // Mmk_33.8 //
XXbsu041_u:8250: jyeṣṭhāḥ pravarā hyāryā mantrā ye jinabhāṣitāḥ // Mmk_33.10 //
XXbsu041_u:8252: tadātmajairjinaputraistu bhāṣitā te tu madhyamā // Mmk_33.11 //
XXbsu041_u:8253: adhamā ye tu mantrā vai bhāṣitā sarvalaukikā /
XXbsu041_u:8254: nikṛṣṭā kathitā mantrā bhāṣitā nairṛtaistu ye // Mmk_33.12 //
XXbsu041_u:8256: etatpramāṇaṃ tu mantrāṇāṃ āryāṇāṃ jinabhāṣitām // Mmk_33.13 //
XXbsu041_u:8259: yāvatpramāṇaṃ tu mantrāṇāṃ bodhisattvaiḥ prakāśitā // Mmk_33.14 //
XXbsu041_u:8265: dantoṣṭhakaṇṭhataḥ śabdaṃ visṛtaṃ sādhanaṃ kriyā // Mmk_33.17 //
XXbsu041_u:8267: sampūrṇaṃ vākyataḥ śabdaṃ samprayuktaḥ sādhayiṣyati // Mmk_33.18 //
XXbsu041_u:8269: mantraṃ na siddhyate kṣipraṃ dīrghakālamapekṣate // Mmk_33.19 //
XXbsu041_u:8270: avandhyaṃ tasya siddhistu na vṛthā kārayo japī /
XXbsu041_u:8273: avandhyaṃ kurute karma samantrā mantravido janām // Mmk_33.21 //
XXbsu041_u:8275: sarvabhūtaistu ye proktā mantrā ye ca samatsarā // Mmk_33.22 //
XXbsu041_u:8279: sahasraṃ cāṣṭaśataṃ aṣṭa ca yāvadekaṃ tu varṇataḥ // Mmk_33.24 //
XXbsu041_u:8284: avyaktaṃ vyaktahīnaṃ tu mātrāhīnaṃ tu yujyate /
XXbsu041_u:8297: makāraṃ nakāramādyaṃ tu sa mantraḥ śreṣṭha ucyate // Mmk_33.31 //
XXbsu041_u:8301: vāruṇaḥ cakāramityāhuḥ hitaṃ loke tu pauṣṭikam /
XXbsu041_u:8302: vakārabahulo yo mantraḥ māhendraṃ tat pradṛśyate // Mmk_33.33 //
XXbsu041_u:8303: ādyaṃ triratnagamanaṃ yo mantraḥ śaraṇaṃ tathā /
XXbsu041_u:8306: svamantraṃ mantranāthaṃ ca sa mantraḥ sarvakarmikam // Mmk_33.35 //
XXbsu041_u:8308: ete mantrā mahākrūrā tejavanto mahaujasā // Mmk_33.36 //
XXbsu041_u:8310: tasmānna kuryāt karmāṇi pāpakāni viśeṣataḥ // Mmk_33.37 //
XXbsu041_u:8311: taṃ jāpī varjayed yasmāt munibhirvarjitā sadā /
XXbsu041_u:8313: kṣaṇena kurute sarvaṃ karmāṃ yāvanti bhāṣitā /
XXbsu041_u:8314: sujaptā mantrā hyete tejavantā maharddhikā // Mmk_33.39 //
XXbsu041_u:8316: pauṣṭikāni tu sarvāṇi kuryāt kokanade kule // Mmk_33.40 //
XXbsu041_u:8321: kathitaṃ triprakāraṃ tu trikuleṣveva sarvataḥ // Mmk_33.42 //
XXbsu041_u:8323: ye tu aṣṭa samākhyātā kulāgryā muninā svayam /
XXbsu041_u:8325: uttamā madhyamā nīcā tat tridhā paribhidyate // Mmk_33.43 //
XXbsu041_u:8329: etat karma nikṛṣṭaṃ tu sarvajñaistu garhitam // Mmk_33.45 //
XXbsu041_u:8333: karmarāje ihoktaṃ tu anyatantreṣu dṛśyate // Mmk_33.47 //
XXbsu041_u:8334: na bheje karmahīnaṃ tu sarvamantreṣu yuktimām /
XXbsu041_u:8335: yāvanti laukikā mantrā sakalā niṣkalāstathā // Mmk_33.48 //
XXbsu041_u:8339: tataḥ triṃśat samāsena catvāriṃśaṃ tu cāparam // Mmk_33.50 //
XXbsu041_u:8341: daśaṃ cāparamityāhu aśītisaṅkhyā tu cāparam // Mmk_33.51 //
XXbsu041_u:8343: śatasaṅkhyā tu saṅkhyātā taddaśaṃ sahasrāparam // Mmk_33.52 //
XXbsu041_u:8345: daśalakṣāvilakṣaṃ tu vilakṣaṃ daśa koṭim // Mmk_33.53 //
XXbsu041_u:8347: daśārbudā nirbudaḥ uktaḥ taddaśaṃ khaḍgamiṣyate // Mmk_33.54 //
XXbsu041_u:8349: daśa nikharvāṃ tathā padmaḥ daśapadmāṃ mahāpadmaḥ // Mmk_33.55 //
XXbsu041_u:8356: mahāsamudrastathā hyuktaḥ sadaśaṃ sāgaraḥ tataḥ // Mmk_33.58 //
XXbsu041_u:8358: mahāsāgarā daśa guṇīkṛtya pragharā hyevamucyate // Mmk_33.59 //
XXbsu041_u:8360: daśaghare nāmato 'pyuktā aśeṣaṃ tu taducyate // Mmk_33.60 //
XXbsu041_u:8362: tadasaṅkhyaṃ pramāṇaṃ tu kathitaṃ lokanāyakaiḥ // Mmk_33.61 //
XXbsu041_u:8366: lokāt pareṇa mahālokaṃ mahālokād guṇīkṛtam // Mmk_33.63 //
XXbsu041_u:8370: gambhīrā sthiramityāhuḥ sthirāt sthirataraṃ vrajet // Mmk_33.65 //
XXbsu041_u:8374: mitānmitasamaṃ kṛtvā mahārthaṃ tat parikīrtyate // Mmk_33.67 //
XXbsu041_u:8376: mahārṇavāt prathamamityāhuḥ prathamāt prathamataraṃ hi tat // Mmk_33.68 //
XXbsu041_u:8380: rāṣṭrāt pareṇa nidhyasto nidhyastaparataḥ śubham // Mmk_33.70 //
XXbsu041_u:8384: viśvāt pareṇa mahāviśvaḥ asvaraṃ tu taducyate // Mmk_33.72 //
XXbsu041_u:8391: aśakyaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ tu gaṇanā lokakalpanam // Mmk_33.75 //
XXbsu041_u:8392: tataḥ pareṇa buddhānāṃ gocaraṃ nāparaṃ matam /
XXbsu041_u:8395: dṛṣṭāntaṃ kriyate hyetat tarkajñānaṃ tu gocaram // Mmk_33.77 //
XXbsu041_u:8396: hetunā sādhyate dravyaṃ na śakyaṃ gaṇanāparaiḥ /
XXbsu041_u:8397: etatpramāṇaṃ sambuddhā paryupāste mayā purā // Mmk_33.78 //
XXbsu041_u:8401: tatra tatra mayā tantrā bhāṣitā kalpavistarā // Mmk_33.80 //
XXbsu041_u:8403: etad pramāṇaṃ sambuddhaiḥ kathito 'haṃ purātanam // Mmk_33.81 //
XXbsu041_u:8404: adhunā kumāra mayā prokta ante kāle tu janmike /
XXbsu041_u:8405: yāvanti laukikā mantrā kalparājāśca śobhanā // Mmk_33.82 //
XXbsu041_u:8412: kiṃ punarmānuṣe loke ye cānye mantradevatā /
XXbsu041_u:8413: sarve lokottarā mantrāḥ laukikā samaharddhikā // Mmk_33.86 //
XXbsu041_u:8424: gaṇitaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ śāstrāṃ śastraṃ caiva kramo vidhiḥ // Mmk_33.91 //
XXbsu041_u:8426: hetunīti tathā cānye śabdaśāstraṃ pravarttitam // Mmk_33.92 //
XXbsu041_u:8428: te mayā bodhisattvena sattvānāmarthāya bhāṣitā // Mmk_33.93 //
XXbsu041_u:8430: bhāṣitā te mayā pūrvaṃ saṃsārārṇavavāsinām // Mmk_33.94 //
XXbsu041_u:8432: yathā vaineyasattvānāṃ tathā tatra karomyaham // Mmk_33.95 //
XXbsu041_u:8433: yathā yathā ca sattvā vai hitaṃ karma samādadheḥ /
XXbsu041_u:8434: tathā tathā karomyeṣāṃ hitārthaṃ karma śubhālayam // Mmk_33.96 //
XXbsu041_u:8438: taṃ tathaiva karomyeṣāṃ vicitrāṃ rūpasampadām // Mmk_33.98 //
XXbsu041_u:8439: ahaṃ tathā veṣadhārī syā vicitrāṅgaṃ nijānijām /
XXbsu041_u:8440: hitāśayena sattvānāṃ vicitraṃ rūpaṃ nirmiṣe // Mmk_33.99 //
XXbsu041_u:8442: vicirāṃ graharūpāṃstu nirmime 'haṃ tathā purā // Mmk_33.100 //
XXbsu041_u:8444: anupūrvyā tu teṣāṃ vai sthāpayāmi śive pade // Mmk_33.101 //
XXbsu041_u:8448: cirā me saṃsaratā janme buddhagotre samāsṛta // Mmk_33.103 //
XXbsu041_u:8449: na ca me vidyate kaścit kartā vā svāmino 'pi vā /
XXbsu041_u:8451: kṣemo 'haṃ nirjaraṃ śāntaṃ aśokaṃ vimalaṃ śivam /
XXbsu041_u:8452: prāpto 'haṃ nirvṛtiṃ śāntiṃ mukto 'haṃ janmabandhanā // Mmk_33.105 //
XXbsu041_u:8455: darśayāmeṣa kalpaṃ vai mantravādaṃ savistaram // Mmk_33.106 //
XXbsu041_u:8458: pūjyā mānyāśca sarve te avajñā teṣāṃ tu varjitā /
XXbsu041_u:8459: nāvamanye tato mantrī teṣāṃ kalpāni vistaram // Mmk_33.108 //
XXbsu041_u:8467: evamādyāḥ śubhā yuktā aśubhāṃścāpi varjayet // Mmk_33.112 //
XXbsu041_u:8468: mayaiva kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ tasmād grāhyā tu jāpibhiḥ /
XXbsu041_u:8472: mayaiva kathitaṃ tat sarvaṃ grāhyate mantrajāpibhiḥ /
XXbsu041_u:8477: sarve laukikā mantrā uttamāśca prakīrtitāḥ // Mmk_33.117 //
XXbsu041_u:8479: na mithyaṃ kāraye cittaṃ na dūṣye tatra manaṃ kadā // Mmk_33.118 //
XXbsu041_u:8480: sarve pūjyāstu mantrā vai samayajñaḥ prakīrtitāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:8481: śāsane 'smiṃ tathā sāstuḥ buddhānāṃ samatāhite // Mmk_33.119 //
XXbsu041_u:8487: anāryā ye tu mantrā vai avandhyāste parikīrttitā // Mmk_33.121 //
XXbsu041_u:8489: sakleśā dṛṣṭamārgāntā avandhyāste tu jāpibhiḥ // Mmk_33.122 //
XXbsu041_u:8490: na vṛthā kāraye cittaṃ kopane roṣasaṃyutam /
XXbsu041_u:8491: rocanaṃ na caiva bhaktiṃ na kuryāt karma vṛthāphalam /
XXbsu041_u:8492: tadāyattaṃ hi cittasya na dadyāt sannatiṃ kvacit // Mmk_33.123 //
XXbsu041_u:8494: labhate phalamaśeṣaṃ tu yathoktaṃ vidhinā vidheḥ // Mmk_33.124 //
XXbsu041_u:8495: niścalaṃ tu manaḥ kṛtvā ekamantraṃ tu taṃ japet /
XXbsu041_u:8497: vyastacitto hi mūḍhātmā siddhistasya na dṛśyate /
XXbsu041_u:8498: aśeṣaṃ phalaniḥpattiṃ prāpnuyād vipulāṃ gatim // Mmk_33.126 //
XXbsu041_u:8499: nityaśuddhaṃ mano yasya sa śrāddhasyaiva śāsane /
XXbsu041_u:8500: ratnatraye ca prasannasya siddhiriṣṭā udāhṛtā // Mmk_33.127 //
XXbsu041_u:8505: atha khalu bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ punarapi taṃ śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokyaḥ mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma /
XXbsu041_u:8506: śṛṇu mañjuśrīḥ tvadīyamudrātantraṃ sarahasyaṃ paramaguhyatamaṃ aprakāśyamaśrāddhasattvatathāgataśāsane
XXbsu041_u:8507: asamayānujñānatriratnavaṃśānucchedanakare akalyāṇamitraparigṛhīte puṇyakāme duṣṭajanasamparkavyatimiśrite pāpamitraparigṛhīte dūrībhūte buddhadharmāṇāṃ niḥphalībhūte kalpe 'sminnācāryānupadeśe avabhiṣikta tava kumāra paramaguhyatame maṇḍale adṛṣṭasamaye tathāgatakule asamante jane aprakāśya sarvabhūtānāṃ tvanmantrānuvarttināṃ //
XXbsu041_u:8509: na tasyā dāpayenmudrāṃ tantraṃ caiva na darśayet // Mmk_34.1 //
XXbsu041_u:8511: na siddhyante tantramantrā vai viparītasya jāpinaḥ // Mmk_34.2 //
XXbsu041_u:8513: siddhiṃ na labhate kṣipraṃśca śarīreṇāpi hīyate // Mmk_34.3 //
XXbsu041_u:8519: nityaṃ bodhimārgasthāṃ teṣāṃ mudrāṃ prakāśayet // Mmk_34.6 //
XXbsu041_u:8521: mahābodho praticchūnāṃ teṣāṃ mudrāṃ prakāśayet // Mmk_34.7 //
XXbsu041_u:8523: dṛṣṭadharmaphalaṃ yeṣāṃ teṣāṃ mudrāṃ prakāśayet // Mmk_34.8 //
XXbsu041_u:8526: mudrā mudritā hyete pramāṇasthā sāṣṭaśataṃ tathā /
XXbsu041_u:8527: na cātiriktā na conāśca sākṣād buddhaiḥ prakāśitāḥ // Mmk_34.10 //
XXbsu041_u:8530: mudrāścaiva śatāṣṭaṃ tu kathitā munivaraiḥ purā // Mmk_34.11 //
XXbsu041_u:8535: na cakreṇa vinā spandaṃ yuktimutpadyate rathe // Mmk_34.13 //
XXbsu041_u:8539: kiṃ punarmānuṣe loke anyakarmeṣu saṃskṛte // Mmk_34.15 //
XXbsu041_u:8541: saṃyuktaḥ ubhayataḥ śuddhāṃ vidhiyuktena darśitā // Mmk_34.16 //
XXbsu041_u:8543: mantraṃ mudratapaścaiva tridhā karma kare sthitam // Mmk_34.17 //
XXbsu041_u:8545: mantrāṇāṃ mudritā mudrā mantraiścāpi mudritā // Mmk_34.18 //
XXbsu041_u:8546: na mantraṃ mudrahīnaṃ tu na mudrā mudravarjitā /
XXbsu041_u:8549: sādhake yuktimāyuñje na sārdhaṃ karma na vidyate // Mmk_34.20 //
XXbsu041_u:8552: na sau vidyati tat sthānaṃ yatrākṛṣṭo na siddhyati /
XXbsu041_u:8554: yatrāviṣṭo na cākṛṣṭaḥ asādhyo yo na vidyate /
XXbsu041_u:8555: na sau saṃvidyate kaścit sattvo yo nivartitum // Mmk_34.23 //
XXbsu041_u:8561: mudrā prayogayuktā vai ete rakṣāsamudbhavā // Mmk_34.26 //
XXbsu041_u:8566: ato jāta tathāsiddhiḥ mudrā mantreṣu dṛśyate // Mmk_34.28 //
XXbsu041_u:8568: siddhyante sarvamantrā vai avandhyaṃ munināṃ vacaḥ // Mmk_34.29 //
XXbsu041_u:8572: etat kumāra mañjuśrīḥ kathayāmi punaḥ punaḥ // Mmk_34.31 //
XXbsu041_u:8574: tāṃ vande kalparāje 'smiṃ naistārikaṃ phalasambhavam // Mmk_34.32 //
XXbsu041_u:8586: purāhaṃ bahukalpāni saṃsāre saratā ma ya // Mmk_34.38 //
XXbsu041_u:8588: tatra tatra mayā sattvā upakārakṛtaṃ bahu // Mmk_34.39 //
XXbsu041_u:8590: yadāhaṃ buddhamagro vai sambhavāmi yugādhame // Mmk_34.40 //
XXbsu041_u:8592: apaścime ca kāle vai nirvāsye 'haṃ yadā bhuvi /
XXbsu041_u:8595: dūrībhūte tathā śāstuḥ dharmakośe kalau yuge /
XXbsu041_u:8596: nāśanārthaṃ tu sattvānāṃ kariṣyatyepa kalparāṭ // Mmk_34.42 //
XXbsu041_u:8603: nāśayiṣyanti me sarvaṃ dharmakośaṃ mayoditam // Mmk_34.45 //
XXbsu041_u:8606: yāvanti kecid buddhā vai nirvṛtā lokabāndhavā /
XXbsu041_u:8607: teṣāṃ sāśanārthāya kariṣyāmi yuge yuge // Mmk_34.47 //
XXbsu041_u:8609: mantrarūpeṇa sattvānāṃ vineṣyāmi tadā tadā // Mmk_34.48 //
XXbsu041_u:8610: etat kumāra tubhyaṃ vai praṇidhānaṃ purā kṛtam /
XXbsu041_u:8611: tat prāptamadhunā bāla nirdekṣyāmi tenaive // Mmk_34.49 //
XXbsu041_u:8615: varadastvaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ tasmiṃ kāle yugādhame // Mmk_34.51 //
XXbsu041_u:8616: nirvṛte hi mayā loke śūnyībhūte mahītale /
XXbsu041_u:8619: nadyā hiraṇyavatītīre nirvāṇaṃ me bhaviṣyatīti // Mmk_34.53 //
XXbsu041_u:8623: atha khalu bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya tathāgatamahāmudrākośasañcodanī nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma /
XXbsu041_u:8625: / anekaraśmikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrasaṅkhyeyaparivārāḥ sā raśmijālā anekāṃ buddhakṣetrānavabhāsayitvā sarvabuddhāṃ sañcodya punarapi bhagavataḥ
XXbsu041_u:8627: samanantarasañcoditāśca sarve buddhā bhagavantaḥ gaganasvabhāvāṃ samādhiṃ samāpadya śuddhāvāsopari gaganatale pratyaṣṭhāt /
XXbsu041_u:8628: atha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ sarvabuddhānabhyarcya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma /
XXbsu041_u:8630: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavataścaraṇayornipatya sarvabuddhāṃ praṇamya bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatametadavocat /
XXbsu041_u:8631: tat sādhu bhagavāṃ nirdiśatu sarvatathāgatamudrākośapaṭalaṃ paramaguhyatamaṃ yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase tad bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu041_u:8632: bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārtthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca sarvasattvānāṃ sukhodayaṃ bhaviṣyati sukhavipākam //
XXbsu041_u:8633: atha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ adhyeṣato bhagavatā mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena sarvabuddhānavalokya sarvasattvāṃ samanvāhṛtya sarvabodhisattvāṃ samprahṛṣya sarvapratyekabuddhāryaśrāvakāṃ samprasāntya sarvamantramantrārtthodyuktamānasāṃ samudyujya sarvaduṣṭāṃ nivārya sarvabhītāṃ samāśvāsya sarvavyasanasthāṃ kṣeme śive nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpya sarvaduḥkhitānāṃ sukhārtthāya mudrāpaṭalavidhānaṃ bhāṣate sma -
XXbsu041_u:8635: ādau pañcaśikhā bhavati mahāmudrā tu sā matā // Mmk_35.1 //
XXbsu041_u:8638: pañcamaḥ svastiko dṛṣṭaḥ ṣaṣṭho dhvaja ucyate /
XXbsu041_u:8642: ekādaśaṃ tu sambuddhā sampuṭaṃ tu samādiśet /
XXbsu041_u:8643: dvādaśaṃ pharamityukto trayodaśaṃ tu gadastathā // Mmk_35.5 //
XXbsu041_u:8645: ṣoḍaśaḥ pāśamityuktaḥ aṅkuśaḥ saptadaśaḥ smṛtaḥ // Mmk_35.6 //
XXbsu041_u:8654: tomaraṃ triṃśamityāhuḥ ekatriṃśaṃ tu dakṣiṇam // Mmk_35.10 //
XXbsu041_u:8656: catustriṃśastathā kumbhaḥ pañcatriṃśe tu khakharam // Mmk_35.11 //
XXbsu041_u:8657: kalaśaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśatiḥ prokto saptatriṃśe tu mauśalam /
XXbsu041_u:8658: aṣṭatriṃśe tu paryaṅkaḥ ūnacatvāriṃśat paṭaham // Mmk_35.12 //
XXbsu041_u:8660: catvāriṃśaṃ sa ekaṃ ca śaṅkalā parikīrtitā // Mmk_35.13 //
XXbsu041_u:8662: caturtthī jananī dṛṣṭā prajñāpāramitā mitā // Mmk_35.14 //
XXbsu041_u:8664: toraṇaṃ ṣaṣṭhamityuktaḥ saptamaṃ tu sutoraṇam // Mmk_35.15 //
XXbsu041_u:8666: pañcāśad bherimityuktā dharmabheriṃ tu sādhikā // Mmk_35.16 //
XXbsu041_u:8672: ṣaṣṭiścaiva bhavedyuktā lāṅgalaṃ tu samāsataḥ // Mmk_35.19 //
XXbsu041_u:8674: triṣaṣṭiḥ kathitaṃ loke dharmacakraṃ pravarttitam // Mmk_35.20 //
XXbsu041_u:8677: ṣaṭṣaṣṭi tathā vadhvā vajramudrā tu kīrttitā /
XXbsu041_u:8687: ardhacandraṃ ca vīṇā ca ubhau mudrāvudāhṛtau // Mmk_35.26 //
XXbsu041_u:8691: navamaṃ navatisaṅkhyā tu ubhau mudrau śubhottamau // Mmk_35.28 //
XXbsu041_u:8692: sampuṭaṃ yamalamudrā ca saṅkhyā navatimaṃ bhavet /
XXbsu041_u:8694: dvitīyā valayamudrā tu tṛtīyā dhūpayet sadā /
XXbsu041_u:8695: caturtthā gandhamudrā tu pañcamī dīpanā smṛtā // Mmk_35.30 //
XXbsu041_u:8696: ṣaṣṭhyā sādhanaṃ vindyāt saptamyā āsane smṛtā /
XXbsu041_u:8697: aṣṭamamāhvānanaṃ proktaṃ navamaṃ tu visarjanam // Mmk_35.31 //
XXbsu041_u:8701: taṃ mudraṃ prathamataḥ proktā dvitīyā sitamudbhavā // Mmk_35.33 //
XXbsu041_u:8707: mudrā padmamāleti mahāmudrāṃ tu tāṃ viduḥ // Mmk_35.36 //
XXbsu041_u:8711: mudrāṇāṃ kathitā saṅkhayā asmiṃ tantre mahodbhavā // Mmk_35.38 //
XXbsu041_u:8713: etatpramāṇaṃ tu sambuddhaiḥ purā gītaṃ mahītale /
XXbsu041_u:8714: nirnaṣṭe śāsane śāstuḥ pracariṣyati dehinām // Mmk_35.39 //
XXbsu041_u:8716: ādau tāvat kare nyastamubhayāgrāṃ kare sthitau /
XXbsu041_u:8720: mudrā pañcaśikhā jñeyā pañcacīrakameva tu // Mmk_35.41 //
XXbsu041_u:8724: keśinyā caiva mantreṇa mūlamantreṇa vā sadā // Mmk_35.43 //
XXbsu041_u:8726: kuryāt sarvāṇi karmāṇi avandhyedaṃ vacanaṃ muneḥ // Mmk_35.44 //
XXbsu041_u:8729: ubhau hastau tu yadāṅguṣṭhau śūnyākārau tu niśritau /
XXbsu041_u:8731: etat tat triśikhaṃ jñeyaṃ tricīrākāra iti punaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:8732: eṣā mudrā mahāmudrā mañjughoṣasya dhīmataḥ // Mmk_35.47 //
XXbsu041_u:8733: kuryāt sarvāṇi karmāṇi vidhidṛṣṭāni yāni vai /
XXbsu041_u:8738: eṣā mudrā mahāmudrā sambuddhaistu prakāśitā // Mmk_35.49 //
XXbsu041_u:8742: kṣipraṃ sādhayate hyarthāṃ vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā // Mmk_35.51 //
XXbsu041_u:8746: anāmikāṃ veṣṭayitvā tu utpaleti udāhṛtam // Mmk_35.53 //
XXbsu041_u:8749: tadeva sarvaṃ yat karma nirdiṣṭaṃ pañcacīrake // Mmk_35.54 //
XXbsu041_u:8750: sarvaṃ tat kuryāt kṣipraṃ utpalena tu sādhayet /
XXbsu041_u:8753: ubhau karau tathā yuktau kuryāduttānakau sadā /
XXbsu041_u:8756: madhyamāṅgulimadhye tu kanyasī tu samā bhavet /
XXbsu041_u:8759: hṛdayaiḥ ṣaḍakṣarairyuktā sarvakarmāṃ karoti vai // Mmk_35.58 //
XXbsu041_u:8767: ubhau hastau tathā kṛtvā vāmatarjanimāśritam // Mmk_35.62 //
XXbsu041_u:8768: dakṣiṇaṃ tu karaṃ kṛtvā tasya maṅgulitasthitam /
XXbsu041_u:8770: dhvajamudrā iti khyātā ucchritā śakradhāraṇī // Mmk_35.63 //
XXbsu041_u:8779: tadeva hastau vinyastau vāmahastaupari sthitam // Mmk_35.67 //
XXbsu041_u:8782: eṣā yaṣṭiriti khyātā mudrā śakranivāraṇī // Mmk_35.68 //
XXbsu041_u:8787: dakṣiṇaṃ tu karaṃ kṛtvā visṛtaṃ chatramucyate /
XXbsu041_u:8788: anena mudrayā kuryādātmarakṣaṃ tu mūrddhitaḥ // Mmk_35.70 //
XXbsu041_u:8790: śatrūṇāṃ chādayed vaktraṃ stambhayedvā manīṣitam // Mmk_35.71 //
XXbsu041_u:8792: naśyante sarvavighnā vai dṛṣṭvā mudrāṃ sacchatrakām // Mmk_35.72 //
XXbsu041_u:8798: vinyastā krodharājena yamāntena tu roṣiṇā // Mmk_35.75 //
XXbsu041_u:8801: na kuryāt karmamevaṃ tu niṣiddhaṃ lokamuttamaiḥ /
XXbsu041_u:8803: laukikā ye ca mantrā vai tathaiva jinabhāṣitā /
XXbsu041_u:8804: tāṃ prayuñjīta mudre 'smiṃ śaktinā susamāhitaḥ // Mmk_35.78 //
XXbsu041_u:8808: naśyante sarvaduṣṭā vai ye kecit krūrakarmiṇāḥ // Mmk_35.80 //
XXbsu041_u:8814: pithayet sarvavidiśāṃ kṛtsnāṃ diśābandhaṃ taducyate // Mmk_35.82 //
XXbsu041_u:8816: naśyante sarvaduṣṭā vai ye cānye ahitāni vai // Mmk_35.83 //
XXbsu041_u:8817: dehaṃ rakṣayate sarvaṃ parivāraṃ cāpi gocare /
XXbsu041_u:8818: aśeṣaṃ rakṣate cakraṃ yatra jāpī vaset sadā // Mmk_35.84 //
XXbsu041_u:8819: na tasya pātakaṃ kiñcit ahitaṃ cāpi sambhavet /
XXbsu041_u:8821: ubhau karau samāśliṣya viparītaṃ tu kārayet /
XXbsu041_u:8822: dakṣiṇaṃ tu adhaḥ kṛtvā vāmamuttānakaḥ sadā /
XXbsu041_u:8829: anyāṃ vā yuktikṛtāṃ doṣāṃ nirnāśayati dehinām // Mmk_35.89 //
XXbsu041_u:8831: tadeva hastau vinyastau saṃśliṣṭāvaṅgulībhi tat // Mmk_35.90 //
XXbsu041_u:8836: daityā ca duṣṭacittāśca saumyacittā tu darśane /
XXbsu041_u:8837: naśyante udyate mudre gade vāpi supūjite // Mmk_35.93 //
XXbsu041_u:8840: tathaiva hastau kurvīta prasāritāgraṃ tu kuñcitam /
XXbsu041_u:8842: ghaṇṭāṃ tāṃ vidurbuddhāḥ prakāśayāmāsa dehinām // Mmk_35.95 //
XXbsu041_u:8843: tadeva hastau sammiśrā ubhau badhvā tu sampuṭam /
XXbsu041_u:8845: kuryāttanmaṇḍalākāraṃ pāśākāraṃ tu ta bhavet // Mmk_35.96 //
XXbsu041_u:8848: eṣa pāśamiti khyātaḥ mudro 'yaṃ buddhanirmitaḥ // Mmk_35.97 //
XXbsu041_u:8850: ye ca duṣṭā grahāḥ krūrā ye vai sarvarākṣasāḥ // Mmk_35.98 //
XXbsu041_u:8853: kiṃ punarmānuṣe loke kravyādāṃ piśitāśinām // Mmk_35.99 //
XXbsu041_u:8854: tadeva hastau vinyastau ubhau kṛtvā tu tatsamau /
XXbsu041_u:8855: vāmapāṇopari nyastaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ tu karaṃ tathā // Mmk_35.100 //
XXbsu041_u:8860: ānayet kṣipra devendrāṃ brahmādyāṃ saśakrakām // Mmk_35.102 //
XXbsu041_u:8864: tarjanī kanyasāṃ cāpi ubhau tarjanyadakṣiṇā // Mmk_35.104 //
XXbsu041_u:8866: viparyasta tato nyastaṃ śliṣṭau aṅguṣṭhakāritau // Mmk_35.105 //
XXbsu041_u:8867: tadreva bhadrapīṭhaṃ tu kathitā mudravarā śubhā /
XXbsu041_u:8871: sadevakaṃ ca lokaṃ vai sarvā niścalakārikā // Mmk_35.107 //
XXbsu041_u:8883: mahāprabhāvā iyaṃ mudrā purā hyuktā svayambhubhiḥ // Mmk_35.112 //
XXbsu041_u:8886: paripūrṇaṃ tathā viṃśanmudrāṇāṃ tu mataḥ param /
XXbsu041_u:8893: tadeva mudrāṃ bandhīyād bandyādyāṃ dvipadottamām // Mmk_35.117 //
XXbsu041_u:8900: ācāryāṃ tu yaṃ dṛṣṭvā sandehārthaṃ vimucyate /
XXbsu041_u:8902: saṃśodhya ca viviktaṃ vai kṛtvā sthānābhimantritam /
XXbsu041_u:8903: na kruddho na cocchiṣṭo na cākruṣṭo pareṇa tu // Mmk_35.122 //
XXbsu041_u:8905: na saktaḥ paradāreṣu paradravyeṣu vai tadā // Mmk_35.123 //
XXbsu041_u:8906: na sthito na nipannaśca bandhenmudrāṃ sukhodayām /
XXbsu041_u:8908: na cordhve nāpyadhaścaiva mudrābandhaṃ tu kārayet /
XXbsu041_u:8909: udaṅmukhaḥ pūrvataścāpi vidiśeṣveteṣu teṣu vai // Mmk_35.125 //
XXbsu041_u:8911: eṣā vidhimataḥ śreṣṭhā sarvamudreṣu bandhane // Mmk_35.126 //
XXbsu041_u:8915: madhyamaṃ tu tataḥ śūnyaṃ aṅgulībhiḥ samādiśet /
XXbsu041_u:8923: rudreṇa bhāṣitā ye mantrā viṣṇunā brahmaṇā svayam /
XXbsu041_u:8924: tāṃ viccheda mantrajño vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā // Mmk_35.132 //
XXbsu041_u:8932: maheśvaro devaputro vai ātmamantraṃ ca mudriṇam /
XXbsu041_u:8933: kathayāmāsa tantre vai ākṛṣṭau muninā purā // Mmk_35.136 //
XXbsu041_u:8934: anyeṣāṃ cātmano mantrāṃ mudrāṃ caiva savistarām /
XXbsu041_u:8941: yāvanti kecid duṣṭā vai paryaṭante mahītale /
XXbsu041_u:8944: punaretanmudravaraṃ hyuktaṃ balikarmeṣu vai niśā // Mmk_35.141 //
XXbsu041_u:8948: tathaiva mālamaṅgulyai sa mālā parikīrtitā // Mmk_35.142 //
XXbsu041_u:8951: aṅguṣṭhau pīḍayenmuṣṭau dhanurmudrā sa lakṣyate // Mmk_35.143 //
XXbsu041_u:8953: vāmaṃ tarjanīṃ muṣṭau niṣpīḍyante tu parvaṇi // Mmk_35.144 //
XXbsu041_u:8955: ubhau hastau tataḥ kṛtvā anyonyā sṛtapiṇḍitau // Mmk_35.145 //
XXbsu041_u:8957: samaliṅgaṃ taṃ viduḥ kalpe śāsane 'smiṃ viśāradāḥ // Mmk_35.146 //
XXbsu041_u:8959: ubhau tarjanya saṃyojya śūlākāraṃ tu kārayet /
XXbsu041_u:8961: tadeva hastau nisṛtya muṣṭiṃ badhvā ubhau punaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:8962: aṅguṣṭhau sthitakāṃ kṛtvā mudgaraṃ samudāhṛtam // Mmk_35.148 //
XXbsu041_u:8964: tomaraṃ kathitaṃ hyagraṃ mudraṃ śakranāśanam // Mmk_35.149 //
XXbsu041_u:8967: eta daṃṣṭramiti proktaṃ vivṛte vaktramucyate // Mmk_35.150 //
XXbsu041_u:8969: ure datvāvasavyaṃ vai kṣipet tvā paṭamucyate // Mmk_35.151 //
XXbsu041_u:8973: tadeva muṣṭi saṃyojya tarjanyau punarucchritau // Mmk_35.153 //
XXbsu041_u:8982: tadeva hastau vinyastau madhyamānāmikau adhaḥ // Mmk_35.157 //
XXbsu041_u:8983: upariṣṭāt teṣu vai nityaṃ nyastaṃ dakṣiṇāvāyaveṣṭitam /
XXbsu041_u:8984: saṃveṣṭya aṅguṣṭhayornyastau kanyasā tarjanī tu tām // Mmk_35.158 //
XXbsu041_u:8986: etat paryaṅkamudreti khyātaṃ loke samantataḥ // Mmk_35.159 //
XXbsu041_u:8990: ye ca mudrāstathā proktā muśalādyāḥ śūlasambhavāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:8998: madhye prādeśinī kṛtvā ucchritāgraṃ tu kārayet /
XXbsu041_u:9002: aṅguṣṭhaṃ te adhaḥ kṛtvā aṅguṣṭhau nāmitau ubhau /
XXbsu041_u:9009: nirviṣo 'pi bhavet kṣipraṃ yo janturviṣamūrcchitaḥ // Mmk_35.168 //
XXbsu041_u:9015: adhastāt sarvataḥ kṛtvā śaṅkaleti udāhṛtā // Mmk_35.170 //
XXbsu041_u:9019: tadeva hastau saṅkocya muktvā veṇi samucchrayet /
XXbsu041_u:9034: manorathaṃ tu taṃ vindyā mudrāṃ sarvārtthasādhikām // Mmk_35.178 //
XXbsu041_u:9035: eṣā mudrā varā śreṣṭhā purā gītā tathāgataiḥ /
XXbsu041_u:9037: manasā kāṃkṣate sattvo yo hitārtthaṃ manoratham /

XXbsu041_u:11306: ākṛtya sāgare sthāne śīghramuttiṣṭhate mṛtaḥ // Mmk_40.147 //
XXbsu041_u:11308: taṃ nyaset sāgare sthāne nirviṣo bhavati tatkṣaṇāt /
XXbsu041_u:11309: evaṃ jvarapiśācāṃśca kravyādāṃ vyantarāṃ śubhām // Mmk_40.148 //
XXbsu041_u:11311: grahaścaiva sadā loke paraprāṇaharāṃ narām // Mmk_40.149 //
XXbsu041_u:11313: mānuṣiṃ tanumāśritya tiṣṭhante bhuvi mānuṣām // Mmk_40.150 //
XXbsu041_u:11314: gṛhṇante bālināṃ sattvāṃ teṣāṃ dhyānenānena cintayet /
XXbsu041_u:11316: dhyāyīta mātaraṃ sattvaṃ kṣipraṃ muñcati bālisam // Mmk_40.151 //
XXbsu041_u:11320: anyāṃ cotthitāṃ caiva nityaṃ bhagandararohitām // Mmk_40.152 //
XXbsu041_u:11322: yakṣāṇāṃ sapadmakaṃ caiva tathā padmottaraṃ kṛśam // Mmk_40.153 //
XXbsu041_u:11324: sarvāṃ sāgare sthāne sanyaset pannagottame // Mmk_40.154 //
XXbsu041_u:11327: kṣipraṃ mocayate nāgaḥ sugatājñāṃ pratīcchakaḥ // Mmk_40.155 //
XXbsu041_u:11334: kāle varṣadharā nityaṃ dhārmikāṃ vṛttimāśritām // Mmk_40.158 //
XXbsu041_u:11336: sasyauṣadhye tathā brīhyāṃ niṣpanne phalati haitukam // Mmk_40.159 //
XXbsu041_u:11339: teṣāṃ bhogavatī nāma purī ambhodamāśritā // Mmk_40.160 //
XXbsu041_u:11341: tato tiṣṭhante mahānāgāḥ parivārāśca teṣu vai // Mmk_40.161 //
XXbsu041_u:11343: jambūvṛkṣagatā tasthuḥ jambūdvīpaṃ ca madhyataḥ // Mmk_40.162 //
XXbsu041_u:11345: sarvaśuklagatāṃ karmāṃ teṣu nāgeṣu yojayet // Mmk_40.163 //
XXbsu041_u:11346: kurvanti samaye bhraṣṭā ye nāgā jalamāśritā /
XXbsu041_u:11348: mumucuḥ sarvato nāgā āsuro pakṣamāśritāḥ // Mmk_40.164 //
XXbsu041_u:11353: kṛṣṇakarme sthitā nityaṃ vyatimiśreṇa vā pare // Mmk_40.166 //
XXbsu041_u:11359: evaṃ te ca mahānāgā bahuprakāropadravāśubhā // Mmk_40.169 //
XXbsu041_u:11361: teṣāṃ ca darpanāśāya idaṃ dhyānaṃ samārabhet // Mmk_40.170 //
XXbsu041_u:11366: dhyāyīta mastake teṣāṃ daṃṣṭriṇāṃ sarvaviṣotkaṭām // Mmk_40.172 //
XXbsu041_u:11368: punarnivarttya gacchante praviśante ca ruṣālayam // Mmk_40.173 //
XXbsu041_u:11370: evaṃ dhyāyīta mantrajña mañjughoṣaṃ samāhitaḥ // Mmk_40.174 //
XXbsu041_u:11374: tadgotrajaśca uragā vai daśante bhuvi mānuṣām // Mmk_40.176 //
XXbsu041_u:11376: kuryāt sarvāṇi karmāṇi pakṣirājena dehinām // Mmk_40.177 //
XXbsu041_u:11377: kṛṣṇaśuklādayo nāgā ye nāgā bhuvi maṇḍale /
XXbsu041_u:11378: vicaranti mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ sūryarūpeṇa dehinām // Mmk_40.178 //
XXbsu041_u:11379: sādhyāsādhye tato jñātvā viṣaṃ ca caturo hitām /
XXbsu041_u:11387: śleṣmāṇāṃ ca gajetyāhuḥ pittajaṃ dveṣasambhavam // Mmk_40.182 //
XXbsu041_u:11393: sarīsṛpeṣu ca sarvatra vyatimiśraṃ liṅgamīkṣayet // Mmk_40.185 //
XXbsu041_u:11404: śuklābhaṃ vainateyasthaṃ bahisthaṃ cātha cintayet // Mmk_40.190 //
XXbsu041_u:11405: sāttvike viṣamūrcchā tu śleṣmaṃ vamanti sarvataḥ /
XXbsu041_u:11406: lālā ca sruvate 'jasraṃ nimajjate ca muhurmuhuḥ /
XXbsu041_u:11407: taṃ vidyāt sāttvikaṃ daṣṭaṃ śuklapakṣāhito bhavet // Mmk_40.191 //
XXbsu041_u:11408: bhramate kampate caiva stabdhe kṣobhe sarveśvaraḥ /
XXbsu041_u:11409: viṣe ca pittaje mūrcchā dāgho jāyati dāruṇām // Mmk_40.192 //
XXbsu041_u:11410: rājase daṃṣṭriṇe daṣṭro etad bhavati ceṣṭitam /
XXbsu041_u:11411: tāmase tamasaṃ mohaḥ mūrcchā nidrā ca jāyate // Mmk_40.193 //
XXbsu041_u:11413: sattve bhavati śuklābhaḥ daṃṣṭre bhavati mānuṣe // Mmk_40.194 //
XXbsu041_u:11423: krūrāḥ krūratarā loke āhārārthaparā sadā // Mmk_40.198 //
XXbsu041_u:11427: sannyaset prāṇināṃ cintyā kṣipraṃ muñcati tadviṣam // Mmk_40.200 //
XXbsu041_u:11430: yathā nāgā tathā sattvā rākṣasā grahamātarā /
XXbsu041_u:11432: sarvavyādhimatā loke liṅgeṣveva tu yojayet // Mmk_40.202 //
XXbsu041_u:11433: dhyānaṃ dhyeyaṃ tathā muktiṃ karmaṃ cāpi sadā nyaset /
XXbsu041_u:11440: sarvaṃ stambhayate hyeṣa sarvaṃ śobhayate śubham // Mmk_40.206 //
XXbsu041_u:11442: siddhiṃ gacchanti te kṣipraṃ parakalpe 'pīhoditā // Mmk_40.207 //
XXbsu041_u:11447: sarvamantrāśca siddhyante asmiṃ kalpe tu dhyāyine // Mmk_40.209 //
XXbsu041_u:11450: kuryāt karmasiddhiṃ ca kṣipraṃ dhyānagatena vai /
XXbsu041_u:11455: dṛṣṭvā parabalastambhaṃ jāyate ca manīṣitam // Mmk_40.212 //
XXbsu041_u:11456: sarve ca daṣṭāḥ stabhyante nṛtyante ca parasparam /
XXbsu041_u:11457: hasante āturāḥ sarve grahāviṣṭāśca dehinām // Mmk_40.213 //
XXbsu041_u:11458: jvarārtā mūrcchitā ye ca uttiṣṭhante drutaṃ tataḥ /
XXbsu041_u:11459: krandante vividhā ārtā bhīmanādaṃ karoti vai // Mmk_40.214 //
XXbsu041_u:11462: icchayā mocayet kṣipraṃ viṣasaṅkramaṇaṃ tu vai /
XXbsu041_u:11463: krīḍāpayati bhūtānāṃ tadā yogī ririṃsayā // Mmk_40.216 //
XXbsu041_u:11467: tatottiṣṭhate kṣipraṃ viṣasupto na saṃśayaḥ // Mmk_40.218 //
XXbsu041_u:11468: anyaśca varddhate kṣipraṃ viṣārtto bhuvi bhūtale /
XXbsu041_u:11476: asaṅkhyaṃ ca vidhiṃ kuryāt paramantrāsṛtena vā // Mmk_40.222 //
XXbsu041_u:11477: eṣa prayogaḥ samāsena dhyāno hyukto 'tha jāpinām /
XXbsu041_u:11480: mataṃ saṅkalpajaṃ proktaṃ śaivaṃ cāpi viśeṣataḥ /
XXbsu041_u:11481: sarve ca laukikā mantrā prayoktavyā dhyānavistare // Mmk_40.224 //
XXbsu041_u:11484: matayo ye 'pi kalpārthāḥ prayoktavyā iha te sadā // Mmk_40.225 //
XXbsu041_u:11490: iti bodhisattvapiṭakāvataṃsakānmahāyānavaipulyasūtrād āryamañjuśriyamūlakalpād aṣṭatriṃśatimaḥ mahākalparājapaṭalavisarād dvitīyasarvalokatattvārthatārakrīḍāvidhisādhanopayikasarvakarmadhyānapaṭalanideśaḥ parivartaḥ samāptaḥ //
XXbsu041_u:11493: atha khalu bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ, punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya,
XXbsu041_u:11496: sarvabuddhānumodite tvadīyamahākalparājamahāvisare mahāmantracaryānuvartake sarvasamayānupraviṣṭe mahāmūlakalprapraviṣṭāspadabhūte pañcamasarvabhūtarutajñānābhijñānaṃ sarvabhūtarutajñānācintyagocaraṃ eṣa te pakṣirāṭ garutmā svamantracaryānuvartanarutajñānābhijñānāṃ sarvamantrāṇāṃ sarvamantrāṇāṃ
XXbsu041_u:11497: sarvakalpānāṃ svasamayamanupraviṣṭasarvalaukikānām eṣa eva te bhāṣiṣyati sarvatiryagyonigatānāṃ sarvapakṣirājagarutmanāṃ sarvamantrakalpagocararutajñānaṃ ca caritaṃ ceti //
XXbsu041_u:11498: atha khalu tasmāt parṣanmaṇḍalād vainateyo garutmā bodhisattvādhiṣṭhānenānekairgaruḍaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ utthāyāsanāt parṣanmaṇḍalaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya, yena mañjuśrīḥ, tenopasaṅkramya,
XXbsu041_u:11499: mahābodhisattvasya pādau kṛtāñjalipuṭaḥ, mañjuśriyametadavocat - ahaṃ mahābodhisattva asmiṃ mahākalparāje sattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya karmāntaraśataṃ sarahasyaṃ bhāṣiṣye /
XXbsu041_u:11503: atha vainateyo buddhādhiṣṭhānena svakīye āsane niṣadya, prahṛṣṭamanasi karmottaraśataṃ sarahasyaṃ bhāṣati sma /
XXbsu041_u:11505: tadyathā - om śakuna mahāśakuna vitatapakṣa sarvapannaganāśaka khakha khāhi khāhi
XXbsu041_u:11510: sarpamāvāhānaṃ, sarpanigrahakaraṇaṃ viṣakrīḍanaṃ, sarvaviṣakrāmaṇaṃ, vācā manasā buddhyā vā, poṣadhiko trirātroṣitaḥ, śukladvādaśyāṃ nadītīre śucau
XXbsu041_u:11512: tatra madhye bhagavāṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānaḥ likhet /
XXbsu041_u:11513: tasya dakṣiṇenāryamañjuśriyaṃ kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhagavato mukhamavalokayamānaṃ likhet /
XXbsu041_u:11514: bhagavato buddhasya vāme nārāyaṇaṃ caturbhujaṃ likhet sarvapraharaṇahastam /
XXbsu041_u:11517: āryamañjuśriyasya pṛṣṭhataḥ āryākṣayamatiṃ sudhanaṃ subhūtiṃ ca likhet kṛtāñjalipuṭā /
XXbsu041_u:11519: pūrvadvāre bāhyataḥ śulkabhasmanā vajraṃ samālikhet dakṣiṇena kṛṣṇavarṇikayā khaḍgam uttareṇa pītavarṇikayā gadaṃ likhet /
XXbsu041_u:11521: evaṃ bāhyamaṇḍalebhyaḥ mūlamantreṇa sarvadevāhvānanaṃ kṛtvā, sarvapuṣpaiḥ
XXbsu041_u:11522: sarvagandhairabhyarcya, guguḷudhūpaṃ, trimadhūreṇa ca baliṃ dattvā,
XXbsu041_u:11529: svamantramāvartya vadet - mama siddhiṃ vidhāya gacchata /
XXbsu041_u:11539: strīpuruṣavaśīkaraṇe sarṣapāṇāṃ ghṛtāktānāmekaviṃśatyāhutiṃ juhuyād vaśyā bhavanti /
XXbsu041_u:11540: rājānaṃ rājamātraṃ vaśīkaraṇe paramānnasya ghṛtāktasya ekaviṃśatyāhuti juhuyād vaśo bhavati
XXbsu041_u:11548: tameva daṇḍaṃ nīlapaṭaprāvṛtaṃ gṛhya saṅgrāme gacchet,
XXbsu041_u:11553: yasya nāmaṃ gṛhya karoti, sa mūko bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:11561: evaṃ varṣāpayitukāmaḥ pūrvoktaṃ maṇḍalakaṃ lekhya, pūjāṃ
XXbsu041_u:11562: kṛtvā, agnimupasamādhāya, varuṇasamidhānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt; āḍhakaṃ varṣati /
XXbsu041_u:11564: pippalāmabhimantrya hastena gṛhya, yāvaddiśaṃ kṣipati; tatra aśanaṃ saṅkrāmati /
XXbsu041_u:11568: mṛnmayaṃ sarpaṃ kṛtvā yamicchati taṃ daśāpayati /
XXbsu041_u:11575: udakena mokṣaṇaṃ leṣṭunā nāgākārṣaṇaṃ pāṃsu parijapya udake kṣipet; nirviṣa bhavanti /
XXbsu041_u:11576: dhanuṃ gṛhya alohāścatvāraḥ śarāḥ caturdiśaṃ kṣeptavyā /
XXbsu041_u:11581: atha sarpāṇi śallayituṃ pānīye pānīyenābhyukṣya tasya tasya śarāḥ patanti /
XXbsu041_u:11592: yāvanto mṛtakāḥ viṣapītakāśca sarve nirīkṣya nirviṣā bhavanti vāditramabhimantrya vādayet
XXbsu041_u:11603: evaṃ vācayā daṣṭamadaṣṭaṃ vā veśayati mokṣayati /
XXbsu041_u:11604: viṣṇunirmālyamabhimantrya yatra rathyāyāṃ gṛhe vā kṣipati, tatkṣaṇādeva sarpo mānuṣaṃ daśati
XXbsu041_u:11611: udakenāpi vyajanenāpi manasā siddhirmantramāvartya bhūmau pāṃsuṃ dadyāt /
XXbsu041_u:11617: vidveṣaṇaṃ, kapālacūrṇamadhūkacūrṇaṃ caikataḥ kṛtvā madhunā saha dhūpaḥ
XXbsu041_u:11620: gopittaṃ mānuṣāsthi ca ghṛtena śatrormāraṇe dhūpaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:11624: eṣa praviśatasya dhūpo deyaḥ akārṣaṇamataḥ param // Mmk_41.2 //
XXbsu041_u:11633: kapālacūrṇaṃ sahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā yamicchati taṃ cūrṇena saṃspṛśya vaśamānayati /
XXbsu041_u:11634: śmaśānabhasmasahitena yaṃ cūrṇayati taṃ jvareṇa gṛhṇāpayati mokṣayati /
XXbsu041_u:11635: nakularomāṇi sarṣapāṇi ca sarpanirmokaṃ yasya nāmnā dhūpo dahati sa sarvalokavidviṣṭo bhavati
XXbsu041_u:11640: mṛṇmayaṃ garuḍaṃ kṛtvā karasampuṭena gṛhya aṃsamātramudakamavatīrya arddharātraṃ japet, yasya nāmnā sa vaśo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:11641: śmaśāne taṇḍunāṃ prakīrya devahṛdayaṃ sthāpya praharaṇaṃ japet vṛttiṃ kalpayati, saparivārasya
XXbsu041_u:11646: śatapuṣpā devadāruṃ purīṣaṃ maṇḍūkaṃ caṭakasya dhūpo vaśyārthaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:11647: yavāstilā dūrvā ca gomūtreṇa dhūpo vaśīkaraṇe /
XXbsu041_u:11648: haritālaṃ kākajihvā ca śoṇitena dhūpaḥ mūkīkaraṇe /
XXbsu041_u:11656: pūjābalividhānaṃ kṛtvā viṣṇupratimāyā agrataḥ upariṣṭānmahāmāṃsāhutīnaṣṭau hutvāṣṭasahasraṃ japet trirātram, dravyaṃ yamicchati /
XXbsu041_u:11657: śmaśānabhasmanā pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā mahāmāṃsadhūpaṃ dattvā kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ aṣṭasahasraṃ japet
XXbsu041_u:11660: uccāṭane karpāsātuṣāṃ juhuyāt kākapakṣaiḥ kṣaṇāduccāṭano bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:11661: śmaśāna udumbarasamidhābhiragniṃ prajvālya kapālopaviṣṭaḥ sarpakañcukaṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:11663: śmaśānāsthicūrṇaṃ sarṣapasahitamaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt yasya nāmnā, sa yojanaśatādāgacchati
XXbsu041_u:11665: devo śvetacandanena vitatapakṣa sarvanāgābharaṇaṃ tīkṣṇaghoraṃ vikṛtānanaṃ vikṛtanakhaṃ padmopaviṣṭaṃ adhodattadṛṣṭiṃ nimnataraṃ kāṣṭhe kuṭye bhittau vā poṣadhikena karmakāreṇa kārāpayet /
XXbsu041_u:11668: udumbaraṃ ca putrakāmāya, gokāmaḥ śirīṣamayaṃ madhukaṃ vā dravyakāmaḥ kārayed vidhivat
XXbsu041_u:11671: kṛṣṇasāramāṃsena śriyārthī, pṛthutamānukīrtikāmo vā strīkāmaḥ pṛthivīkāmo
XXbsu041_u:11672: vā, vyāghramāṃsaṃ vyavahāradivijayārthī mahāmāṃsam vastrārthī hastibalā rājavaśikaraṇe atibalā rājāmātyavaśīkaraṇe aśvagandhāṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:11674: hastiromāṇi, picumardamabhicāre tu ete kāṣṭhā proktāḥ //
XXbsu041_u:11686: mahiṣamāṃsenākarṣayati, ābhicāruke mahāmāṃsena, śāntike mṛgaromāṇi kanyārthī ulūkaromāṇi deśaghātecchā galaromāṇi vidveṣaṇe mānuṣaromāṇi
XXbsu041_u:11687: ābhicāruke mānuṣyaromāṇi śatrunāśane sarveṣveva teṣu trisandhyaṃ saptāhiko homaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:11690: yo mama bhagavaṃ asmiṃ kalparāje mantraṃ sādhayamānaḥ trisandhyamudīrayiṣyati, tasyāhaṃ sarvaviṣopadravacikitsāṃ kariṣyāmi /
XXbsu041_u:11692: atha tasmin samaye svarūpamudrāṃ bhāvayati sma /
XXbsu041_u:11693: aṅguṣṭhau parasparaveṣṭitau kṛtvā śeṣāṅgulyo pakṣavat saṃsthitā syād /
XXbsu041_u:11701: aṅguṣṭhau madhyataḥ sthāpya niṣpīḍyāṅgulyaṃ tu yatnataḥ /
XXbsu041_u:11702: nāgadamanīti vikhyātā divyā divyeṣu karmasu // Mmk_41.6 //
XXbsu041_u:11704: aṅguṣṭhau vaktrasaṃsthānaṃ śeṣā pārśvataḥ sthitāḥ // Mmk_41.7 //
XXbsu041_u:11706: yāni ca mayoktāni sarvamantreṣu sādhane // Mmk_41.8 //
XXbsu041_u:11712: te vai mantramukhye tu prayoktavyāḥ karmavistare // Mmk_41.11 //
XXbsu041_u:11713: iha kalpavare mūle pratiṣṭhā kṣmātalena te /
XXbsu041_u:11729: kuryāt sarvāṇi karmāṇi sarvakarmeṣu sādhanam // Mmk_41.19 //
XXbsu041_u:11730: eṣa devo mahātmā vai mahādeveti kīrtyate /
XXbsu041_u:11732: tasya mantraṃ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇudhvaṃ bhūtikāṃkṣiṇaḥ // Mmk_41.20 //
XXbsu041_u:11736: śivodbhavodbhava bhuvanatrayapūjitāya hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ //
XXbsu041_u:11739: sarveṣveva hi karmeṣu prayoktavyo manasodbhavai // Mmk_41.21 //
XXbsu041_u:11744: tāṃ sarvāṃ prāpnuyānmantrī siddhamantrastu buddhimāṃ // Mmk_41.23 //
XXbsu041_u:11748: te syurmantrarāṭ sarve nibaddhā vidhihetutaḥ // Mmk_41.25 //
XXbsu041_u:11753: sarve te vaśamāyānti mantre nāmīritādhipa // Mmk_41.27 //
XXbsu041_u:11755: diṅmandirāśrayā ye ca vidikṣu ścāpi cāriṇaḥ // Mmk_41.28 //
XXbsu041_u:11762: yatrasthā ye 'tra nāgā vai ye tu bhūtagaṇāśrayā /
XXbsu041_u:11763: vicitrarūpiṇo ye vā tataḥ sthā ye samāgatā /
XXbsu041_u:11764: sarve te vaśamāyānti mantreṇānena yojitā // Mmk_41.32 //
XXbsu041_u:11766: sarve te vaśamāyānti mantreṇānena yojitā // Mmk_41.33 //
XXbsu041_u:11781: vibharti sarvato mantrāṃ kalpāṃścaiva supuṣkalām // Mmk_41.40 //
XXbsu041_u:11786: caritaṃ cāpi bhūtānāṃ rutaṃ cāpi japet sadā /
XXbsu041_u:11787: mantribhiḥ sarvakālaṃ vai prayoktavyaḥ siddhikāṃkṣibhiḥ // Mmk_41.42 //

XXbsu041_u:15015: acintyaṃ te ṛddhiviṣayaṃ vineyaṃ vāpi acintitam /

XXbsu041_u:15022: mañjudhvajo 'tha nāmo vai buddhā loke bhaviṣyasi // Mmk_53.151 //
XXbsu041_u:15023: buddhakṛtyaṃ tadā kṛtvā anupūrveṇa vo sadā /
XXbsu041_u:15024: vimocyatha bahuṃ sattvāṃ parinirvāṇaṃ te bhaviṣyati // Mmk_53.152 //
XXbsu041_u:15026: sa dīrghaṃ niḥśvasya saṃvignaḥ karuṇāviṣṭacetasā // Mmk_53.153 //
XXbsu041_u:15032: niḥśvasya ca ciraṃ kālaṃ vistarārthaṃ nivedya ca // Mmk_53.156 //
XXbsu041_u:15034: mahākāśyapaṃ tato vavre gacchāmostaṃ citālayam // Mmk_53.157 //
XXbsu041_u:15037: tatrasthaḥ śrāvako hyagraḥ ṛddhyā caivamupāgamam // Mmk_53.158 //
XXbsu041_u:15040: apaścime gatiḥ śāstuḥ darśanārthaṃ tu māgamam /
XXbsu041_u:15041: tato 'rdhapathe tasthuḥ saṅghārāte tu sa vratī // Mmk_53.160 //
XXbsu041_u:15044: sa dṛṣṭvā upasaṅkrānta mahallo taṃ ciroṣiṇam /
XXbsu041_u:15047: uvāca taṃ mahābhāgaṃ svāgataṃ te kimāgatam // Mmk_53.163 //
XXbsu041_u:15048: kutra vā yāsyate kṣipraṃ udvigno vā kiṃ vatiṣṭhase /
XXbsu041_u:15049: uvāca so taṃ ṛṣiṃ taṃ bālaṃ āyuṣmaṃ na śrutaṃ tvayā // Mmk_53.164 //
XXbsu041_u:15051: pitā me agradhīḥ buddhaḥ pradīpārciriva nirvṛtaḥ // Mmk_53.165 //
XXbsu041_u:15052: astaṃ gato mahāvīraḥ śūnyībhūtā hi medinī /
XXbsu041_u:15053: sarvaśūnyāstathā lokāḥ śūnyā bhūtāśca me diśāḥ // Mmk_53.166 //
XXbsu041_u:15055: prasahya vacanaṃ cāha nirvṛto 'sau pradīrghakaḥ // Mmk_53.167 //
XXbsu041_u:15060: bhṛkuṭiṃ kṛtvā tato vaktre huṅkāro 'sau prayojayet /
XXbsu041_u:15061: ruruṣya tatkṣaṇād vipraḥ bāsanābhāvito yatiḥ // Mmk_53.170 //
XXbsu041_u:15063: sarvaṃ pracalitā urvī parvatoccāḥ samo ravaḥ // Mmk_53.171 //
XXbsu041_u:15064: kṣubhitāḥ sāgarāḥ sarve sarve vṛkṣāśca parvatāḥ /
