XXbsu041_u:17574: padmaṃ vā padmapatraṃ vā nirdhūmeṣu aṅgāreṣu yasya nāmnā juhoti sa vaśyo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:17585: bilvasamidhābhiragniṃ prajvālya, vikasitānāṃ padmānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ trisandhyamaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:17590: prabhṛti vikasitānāṃ śvetapadmānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ trisandhyamaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:17605: priyaṅgunāgakesarasamidhānāṃ yasya nāmnā juhoti; sa vaśyo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:17646: śucirbhūtvā caturbhaktoṣitaḥ bilvasamidhābhiragniṃ prajvālya, bilvānāṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:17650: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ gaurasarṣapāṇāṃ ghṛtāktānāṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ rātrau divasaṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:17654: sadhātuke caitye paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya, palāśakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya, utpalānāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt
XXbsu041_u:17656: paṭasyāgrataḥ gandhapuṣpadhūpaṃ vā kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ padmaṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:17662: paṭasyāgrato dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ padmānāṃ śatasahasraṃ juhuyāt kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ /
XXbsu041_u:17682: viṣayamapi labhate paṭasyāgrata ādhārako 'gnimupasamādhāya pratidinaṃ varddhamānā pūjā kāryā
XXbsu041_u:17706: samānavatsāyā goḥ ghṛtaṃ gṛhya, lakṣābhimantritaṃ pibet /
XXbsu041_u:17713: 'patitagomayena maṇḍalakamupalipya, gandhapuṣpaghṛtapradīpābhiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā, udumbarakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya, brahmīsamidhānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:17737: prāsādikaṃ śuklapratipadamārabhya pūrvābhimukhaṃ paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpyaḥ, pratidinaṃ gugguluguḍikānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:17744: vidyādharamantardhānaṃ vā pādapracārikaṃ vā śrutidharatvaṃ dadāti /
XXbsu041_u:17745: atha gulikāṃ sādhayitukāmena karṇikārakesaraṃ nāgakesaraṃ śvetacandanaṃ gajamadaṃ cekīkṛtya,
XXbsu041_u:17746: chāyāśuṣkāṃ guḍikāṃ kṛtvā, śucivastrāyāḥ kanyāyāḥ pīṣayet /
XXbsu041_u:17749: śucirbhūtvā saptaguṭikāṃ trilohaveṣṭitāṃ kṛṣṇāgarusamudgake prakṣipya, paṭasyāgrato japed; yāvat khaṭakhaṭāyati /
XXbsu041_u:17750: tāṃ gṛhya, bhagavato ekaṃ datvā, mukhe prakṣipyāntarhito bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:17770: sadhātuke caitye rocanāmaṣṭasahasrābhimantritāṃ kṛtvā, rājakule gacchet /
XXbsu041_u:17774: ātmanaḥ śāntiṃ karttukāmena trisandhyaṃ kṣīraṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:17776: mahādevasya dakṣiṇāṃ mūrttiṃ tāmrabhājane ghṛtaṃ sthāpya,
XXbsu041_u:17783: rajate vā tāmre vā ghṛtaṃ sthāpya, tāvajjaped; yāvat trividhā siddhiḥ /
XXbsu041_u:17790: ayantrita ātmanaḥ sakhāyānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kṛtvā tāvajjaped, yāvat trividhā siddhiḥ /
XXbsu041_u:17792: ayomayaṃ cakraṃ kṛtvā, triśūlaṃ vā, udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā, dakṣiṇahastena gṛhītvā, paṭasyāgrataḥ
XXbsu041_u:17797: aṅgulisādhanaṃ kartukāmaḥ nadyā ubhayakūlamṛttikāṃ gṛhya, tayāṅguliṃ kārayet /
XXbsu041_u:17802: rocanāṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ pratiṣṭhāpya, gandhapuṣpadhūpaṃ datvā,
XXbsu041_u:17805: padmaṃ sādhayitukāmena raktacandanamayaṃ padmaṃ kṛtvā, paṭaṃ sadhātuke caitye pratiṣṭhāpya, tasyāgrato gṛhītvā, kṛtapuraścaraṇastāvajjaped;
XXbsu041_u:17814: kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāmahorātroṣitena kapilāyā goḥ samānavatsāyā apatitagomayenāryamañjuśriyaṃ kṛtvā, pūrvābhimukhaṃ sthāpya, mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā, tasyāgrato lakṣaṃ (Vaidya 536) japet /
XXbsu041_u:17839: paṭasyāgrataḥ śleṣmātakakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya, trirātraṃ dūrvapravālānāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt
XXbsu041_u:17851: śuklāṣṭamyāṃ śuklapañcadaśyāṃ vā viviktabhūpradaśe, śvetārkasyādhastādāryamañjuśriyasya gandhapuṣpadhūpaṃ ca datvā mālyaṃ cāṣṭasahasraṃ japet /
XXbsu041_u:17855: tasyā mṛttikayā pūrvakṛtaṃ pratimāmudramarkakṣīreṇa pratimudrāṃ kṛtvā, tataḥ śuklapratipadamārabhya,
XXbsu041_u:17856: yāvadaṣṭamīti triḥ kālaṃ bhagavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā baliṃ dadyāt /
XXbsu041_u:17865: arthamutpādayitukāmena goṣṭaṃ gatvā kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ parebhyaḥ kṣīrayāvakāhāro lakṣaṃ japet /
XXbsu041_u:17866: aparasmiṃ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ te tato 'horātroṣitena tatraiva śatasahasraṃ japtavyam /
XXbsu041_u:17872: kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ palāśakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya, dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ gugguluguḍikānāṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ śatasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:17882: evaṃ dine dine gandhādīn dattvā yāvadaṣṭottaraṃ stūpasahasraṃ pūrṇamiti paṭṭabandhamavāpnoti tilānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:17886: āpyāyanaṃ karttukāmo bhagavato 'grataḥ kṣīravṛkṣasamidhānāṃ ghṛtāktānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt
XXbsu041_u:17889: yatra brahmarākṣaso 'nyo vā sattvaḥ kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ, tatra gatvā, daśasahasrāṇi japet /
XXbsu041_u:17892: tatraiva paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya, kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ trirātroṣitaḥ udārāṃ pūjāṃ
XXbsu041_u:17893: kṛtvā, baliṃ nivedyaṃ, paṭasyāgrataḥ agniṃ prajvālya, vaṭavṛkṣasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:17895: na bhetavyaṃ ca sthāpya, tasyopari supiṇḍaṃ paryaṅkaṃ badhvā,
XXbsu041_u:17905: sā ced vidyā sādhyamānā na siddhyati; tāmanena mantreṇa sametaṃ bhagavato buddhasyāgrataḥ
XXbsu041_u:17908: ūnātiriktaṃ yaṃ vā mṛgayati, tatra sthāne yakṣayakṣiṇīsahitā pūrvasevaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:17916: atha śāntiṃ kartukāmaḥ bhagavato 'grataḥ kṣīrāhutyāṣṭasahasraṃ gandhodakena vābhyukṣayet /
XXbsu041_u:17920: valmīkaśikharamāruhya nirāhāra ekapāda pūrvāhnād yāvadaparāhṇaṃ japet /
XXbsu041_u:17936: evaṃ vaśīkaraṇe kṛṣṇayorekatareṇa trirātroṣitaḥ kṛtarakṣaḥ suyantritaḥ paṭasyāgrato nirdhūmāṅgārairguggulugulikānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:17950: candrasūryagrahe vā, śrotāñjane mukhe prakṣipya, tāvajjaped,
XXbsu041_u:17962: maṇḍalakamupalipya, puṣpāvakīrṇaṃ kṛtvā, udakacūlakāḥ saptābhimantritāḥ pātavyāḥ divasāni sapta /
XXbsu041_u:17973: saptajaptena śvetapuṣpeṇa gugguludhūpena vā grahagṛhītānāṃ snāpayata /
XXbsu041_u:17978: sadhātuke caitye pūrṇamāsyāṃ sagauraveṇa maṇḍalakamupalipyāṣṭau pūrṇakalaśā aṣṭau ca puṣpamālāgaruturuṣkacandanakundurudhūpaṃ duhatā tāvajjapet /
XXbsu041_u:17980: sadhātuke caitye kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ yathāvi bhavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā śatasahasraṃ japet /
XXbsu041_u:17984: vaśīkaraṇaṃ antardhānaḥ śilādiṣu prayogeṣu susamartho bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:17988: dakṣiṇahastādaṅgulimaṣṭābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā, gajānaṃ tarjayed; vaśyo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:17990: tilahomena naranārīvaśīkaraṇaṃ viśitavikrayena rakṣā ātmarakṣā pararakṣā,
XXbsu041_u:17992: yuddhe rājakule vivāda japamānasya vijayo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:17993: ātmanā abhiṣekaṃ karttukāmaścatvāraḥ kalaśā akālanadīpalvalaprasravaṇodake vā sarvagandhavījāni prakṣipya aṣṭasahasrābhimantritāni kṛtvā, tenodakenātmānamabhiṣiñcet /
XXbsu041_u:17999: suprayatnataścaturdikṣu diśāsu khaḍgahastān puruṣāṃsthāpya, vetāḍasya hṛdaye upaviśya, āyasena sruveṇa lohacūrṇaṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:18001: tāṃ tīkṣṇena śastreṇa cchidya, nīlotpalasannikāśaṃ khaḍgaṃ bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:18006: puṣpalohamayīṃ muṇḍiṃ lakṣaṇopetāṃ kṛtvā, paṭasyāgrataḥ kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ saptarātrādhivāsitāṃ kṛtvā, sahasrasampātāhutiṃ bhagavato 'grataḥ
XXbsu041_u:18007: kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ trirātroṣitaḥ udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā, balividhānaṃ rakṣāmaṇḍalabandhasīmābandhādikaṃ kṛtvā, āryasaṅghaṃ yathāśaktitaḥ bhojayitvā, pādayoḥ praṇipatya, āryasaṅghaṃ anujñāpya mriyate /
XXbsu041_u:18008: paṭasyāgrataḥ siddhārthakapuñjakaṃ sthāpya, puñjasyopari japya dātavyam /
XXbsu041_u:18015: sarvakalikalahavigrahavivādeṣu pañjaraṅgikaṃ sūtramaṣṭa śatābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā, guhyasthāne dhārayitavyam /
XXbsu041_u:18019: arthakāmaḥ, śucinā śucivastraprāvṛtenāhorātroṣitaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ kundurukadhūpo deyaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:18022: sarvamudrā bhedabhasmanā bhogārthī nadīsaṅgame taḍāgānāmekatame 'nyatra vā śucipradeśe paṭaṃ (Vaidya 539) pratiṣṭhāpya jāpahomaṃ samārabhet /
XXbsu041_u:18035: kṛtvā, sūtrakaṃ gṛhya, maṇḍalamadhye sthāpya gugguludhūpaṃ datvā, mantraṃ japet /
XXbsu041_u:18039: maṇḍalakamupalipya, caturhastapramāṇaṃ puṣpadhūpaṃ dattvā, tasminneva sthito japet śutrūṇāṃ stambhanam /
XXbsu041_u:18040: śastraṃ saptavāra parijapya, dharaṇyāḥ sthāne nikhanitavyam /
XXbsu041_u:18050: sarvasattvānāṃ candrasūryoparāge upavāsaṃ kṛtvā, tailaṃ japet /
XXbsu041_u:18054: anenaiva vidhānena pratisarāṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā, haste badhvā,
XXbsu041_u:18057: kālyamutthāya sadhātuke caitye gomayamaṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā, udakaculukadvayamekaikaṃ saptavārāṃ
XXbsu041_u:18060: prātarvelākāle tato bhojane prathamamālāpaṃ trayo vārāṃ parijapya bhoktavyam /
XXbsu041_u:18065: evaṃ divasāni sapta udakaṃ saptavārāṃ parijapya, tato
XXbsu041_u:18073: trayo vārāṃ cīvarakarṇakaṃ parijapya cīvarakarṇikaṃ bandhitavyam /
XXbsu041_u:18082: yatra corastatragacchati bhasmanā maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā, sa vaśyo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:18083: sarvasattvā stambhanaṃ manasīkaraṇe śuklapūrṇamābhyāṃ paṭasyāgrato bodhivṛkṣakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya, tilānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:18095: dakṣiṇapradeśinīmaṅgulīṃ saptabhiraśvatthapatraiḥ sthāpya, daśa sahasrāṇi japet /
XXbsu041_u:18107: śuklāṣṭamyāṃ trirātroṣitaḥ paṭasyodārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā, tāvajjaped ; yāvad raśmirniścarati /
XXbsu041_u:18109: rājyaṃ vidyādharatvaṃ yanmanasā cintayati; taṃ labhate /
XXbsu041_u:18112: raktasūtreṇa pariveṣṭya śarāvasampuṭaṃ sadhātuke caitye pratimāyāgrataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā, tāvajjaped; yāvat trividhā siddhirbhavatīti /
XXbsu041_u:18123: pūrṇapūrṇapañcadaśyāṃ poṣadhikaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ padmānāṃ daśasahasrāṇi juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:18129: ante trirātropitaḥ pañcadaśyāṃ sadhātuke caitye pratimāyā pūjāṃ kṛtvā, bhagavato 'grataḥ
XXbsu041_u:18130: aśvatthasaṃstare tāvajjaped; yāvad divyarūpā strī āgacchati /
XXbsu041_u:18134: candragrahe, samānavatsāyā gornavanītaṃ gṛhya, ṣaḍaṅgulimātrāṃ puttalikāṃ kṛtvā, caturbhaktoṣitaḥ aśvatthasaṃstaraṃ kṛtvāṣṭasahasraṃ
XXbsu041_u:18147: madanaputtalikāṃ sarvālaṅkāropetāṃ rājavṛkṣakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya śalākayā viddhā tāpayet
XXbsu041_u:18150: aśokakāṣṭhamayīṃ ṣaḍaṅgulāṃ sālabhañjikāṃ kṛtvā, tāṃ gṛhya, parvataśikharamāruhya, śatasahasraṃ japet /
XXbsu041_u:18158: agniṃ stambhayitukāmaḥ paṭṭikā saptavārāṃ parijapya, mukhe prakṣipitavyam /
XXbsu041_u:18160: vivāde sūtrakaṃ aṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā, trayo granthayaḥ kāryāḥ /
XXbsu041_u:18162: gavyaghṛtapalaṃ pañcadaśyāṃ bhājane kṛtvā, āryamañjuśriyasya purato gomayamaṇḍalakamagarudhūpaṃ
XXbsu041_u:18166: divasāni sapta jvarapreṣaṇaṃ bhūtapreṣaṇaṃ ātmarakṣā vetāḍotthāpanaṃ bilapraveśaṃ vanapraveśaṃ rakṣā sīmābandhaḥ diśābandhaḥ coravyāghraḍākinīnāṃ jāpena stambhitā bhavatīti /
XXbsu041_u:18170: tataḥ śatapuṣpāyā vīrakraye krītvā dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:18178: marīcaphalaṃ saptavārānabhimantrya mukhe prakṣipya yasya alāpaṃ dadāti /
XXbsu041_u:18180: sadhātuke caitye buddhapratimāyā agrataḥ kṛtvā udake kṣipet /
XXbsu041_u:18185: puṣpeṇa phalena vā lakṣajaptena maśakā na bhavanti /
XXbsu041_u:18187: rājadvārikaṃ dantakāṣṭhabhakṣaṇaṃ phaladānaṃ gandhadānaṃ bhūmibandhaṃ corabandhaṃ sarvadaṃṣṭrāstambhanaṃ upajambhanaṃ nigaḍasphoṭanaṃ udakastambhanaṃ agnistambhanaṃ viṣomārjanaṃ viṣasaṅkramaṇaṃ viṣabandhaḥ bhūtavaśīkaraṇaṃ ḍākinīgrahamokṣaṇaṃ naṣṭavidyāyā gorocanayā bhūrjapatre likhitvā bhagavato 'grataḥ sadhātuke caitye śatavārāṃ japet /
XXbsu041_u:18189: saptajaptvā siddhārthakāṃ grāme vā nagare vā kṣipet /
XXbsu041_u:18190: ye tatra vasanti; te mṛtā iva svapante /
XXbsu041_u:18192: striyaṃ puruṣaṃ vā vaśīkartukāmo yasya yato bhāge gṛham; tāṃ diśābhimukhaṃ vikāle
XXbsu041_u:18197: oṣadhabandhaṃ manasā nidhānabandhaṃ khadirakīlakairekaviṃśatisaptanidhānasthāneṣu caturṣu koṇeṣu nikhanet /
XXbsu041_u:18199: candragrahe bhikṣuṇā śrāvayitavyāḥ sarvairetaiḥ kalpasthāyī brahmacāryapratihatagatiryatheṣṭaṃ vicarati /
XXbsu041_u:18214: vinaye pramāṇopetaṃ pātraṃ gṛhya, paṭasyāgrataḥ paryaṅkopaviṣṭo dakṣiṇahastena
XXbsu041_u:18219: atha śāntiṃ kartukāmaḥ, dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ sugandhikusumānāṃ vāṣṭasahasraṃ
XXbsu041_u:18229: tataḥ paurṇamāsyāṃ candagrahe vā sarvakāmikāṃ baliṃ datvā, ahorātroṣitaḥ sakalāṃ rātriṃ japet /
XXbsu041_u:18236: asurāvivaradvāre paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya, niyamastho lakṣaṃ japet /
XXbsu041_u:18246: raktacandanamayaṃ ṣoḍaśāṅgulaṃ dvādaśāṅgulaṃ vā poṣadhikena karmakāreṇa daṇḍakāṣṭhaṃ kārayet
XXbsu041_u:18248: ahorātroṣitaḥ pūrṇamāsyāmudārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā, daṇḍakāṣṭhaṃ dakṣiṇena hastena gṛhya, tāvajjaped; yāvat trividhā siddhiḥ /
XXbsu041_u:18259: rājā vā rājamātro vā vaśī bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:18260: kṣīrāhāraḥ śākāhāro vā poṣadhikaḥ sadhātuke caitye lakṣatrayaṃ japet /
XXbsu041_u:18271: paṭasyāgrataḥ śuklapratipadamārabhya kṣīrayāvakāhārastriḥkālasnāyī tricelaparivarttī, agaruturuṣkacandanaṃ dahatā triśuklaṃ nivedyam /
XXbsu041_u:18273: surabhipuṣpāṃ jalajāni vā sthalajāni vā sugandhī nivedyaṃ vā gāvyaghṛtapradīpatrayaṃ ca /
XXbsu041_u:18279: tataḥ paṭādarciṣo niḥsarati, bhūmikampaḥ, pradīpajvālā ca niścarati /
XXbsu041_u:18282: śrotāñjanamaśvatthapatrāntaritaṃ sahasrasampātābhihutaṃ kṛtvā sakṛduccāritena ṣaḍbhirmāsairmahārogānmucyate māsamekaṃ japet /
XXbsu041_u:18286: strīvaśyārthaṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ lalāṭāṃ madhvāktānāmekaviṃśati āhutī juhuyāt trisandhyaṃ saptarātram
XXbsu041_u:18304: puṣpalohamayaṃ cakraṃ kṛtvā, sadhātuke caitye paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya, ahorātroṣitaḥ udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā, cakraṃ grahāya tāvajjaped ; yāvannimittāni bhavanti /
XXbsu041_u:18336: vidyādharatvaṃ rājyamathavā yādṛśo bhagavān tādṛśo bhavāmi /
XXbsu041_u:18337: eṣā siddhiḥ kāruṇikena sarvasattvānāṃ nirāmiṣacittena dānaṃ dadatā sidhyati /
XXbsu041_u:18343: aṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā, tena samālabdhagātraḥ saṅgrāme dūte aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:18350: kṛtvā, triḥ kālasnāyī payobhakṣaḥ mūlapaṭasyāgrataḥ aṣṭaśatiko japo deyaḥ
XXbsu041_u:18351: / paścādaṣṭamyāṃ kṛṣṇāyāṃ yathāśaktya pūjāṃ kṛtvā paṭasyāgrataḥ
XXbsu041_u:18359: paṭasyāgrataḥ śvetacandanena maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā gandhadhūpapuṣpabalivilepanaṃ ca datvā keśarapuṣpāṇāṃ śatatrayaṃ gṛhītvā aṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ ghṛtapradīpatrayaṃ prajvālya udumbassamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya ekaikaṃ puṣpamaṣṭaśatabhimantritaṃ kṛtvā ghṛtābhyaktānāṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:18361: yaḥ trikālaṃ parivartayati tasya pañcānantaryāṇi tanvībhavanti /
XXbsu041_u:18364: cakṣuṣāṃ yaṃ paśyati sa vaśo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:18370: āryamañjuśriyaṃ pūrvoktena vidhānena paṭake phaleka vā aśleṣakairvarṇaiścitrāpayitavyaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:18372: kuśasaṃstaraśāyī kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ triḥkālasnāyī śucivastraprāvṛtenāṣṭāṅgapoṣadhikena pratipadamārabhya japo deyaḥ yāvat pañcadaśīti /
XXbsu041_u:18375: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ kṣīragomūtrāhāraḥ yāvakāhāro vā triḥkālasnāyī poṣadhikaḥ sadhātuke caitye paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya pratidinaṃ ghṛtapradīpo prajvālayitavyaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:18379: paurṇamāsyāṃ trirātropitena udārāṃ (Vaidya 544) pūjāṃ kṛtvā sarvarātriko jāpo deyaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:18383: āveśanaṃ dhūpena vipanāśanaṃ pallavena ātmarakṣā jāpena śuklacaturdaśyāmārabhya yāvat pañcadaśīti śucinā śucivastraprāvṛtena aṣṭāṅgapoṣadhikena paṭasyāgrato yaṃ mṛgayati taṃ labhate /
XXbsu041_u:18389: śuklacaturdaśyāṃ trirātroṣitaḥ udumbarakāṣṭhaiḥ agniṃ prajvālya udumbarasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:18391: aṃdhaḥ poṣadhiko kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ dīpānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ prajvālya dīpavartīnāmaṣṭaśataṃ juhuyāt
XXbsu041_u:18394: vadhiraḥ pustakaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ praveśayitvā aṣṭasahasrābhimantritānāṃ padmānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:18398: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ kṛṣṇapañcamyāṃ sadhātuke caitye paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā udārāṃ baliṃ nivedya bāhyā sarvabhautikāṃ baliṃ nivedya priyaṅgucūrṇena puttalikāṃ kṛtvā likhet /
XXbsu041_u:18399: maṇḍalabandhaṃ diśābandhaṃ kṛtvā kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ tāvajjaped yāvadulkāpātaṃ bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:18406: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāmahorātroṣitaḥ udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā akṣataṃ sarvaṃ gṛhya gandhapuṣpairalaṅkṛtya dhūpena ca dakṣiṇahastena gṛhya tāvajjaped yāvajjvalitamiti /
XXbsu041_u:18407: paṭasyāgrataḥ āryamañjuśriyasya rocanāṃ sthāpya tāvajjaped yāvajjalitamiti /
XXbsu041_u:18411: yaṃ mantro payati sa vaśo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:18413: kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāmahorātroṣitaḥ paṭasyāgrato bilvakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya vaikaṅkatasamidhānāṃ kaṭutailāktānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:18414: saptāhaṃ kanyāṃ yāmicchati sā vaśā bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:18415: kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ ekarātroṣitaḥ śmaśānaṃ gatvā apatitagomayena maṇḍalamupalipya akṣatakapālaṃ gṛhya raktacandanena prakṣālya raktapuṣpadhūpaiścābhyarcya tata upaviśya taṃ kapālaṃ mantraṃ japatā karṣayet /
XXbsu041_u:18417: yamaṅgulyāmākarṣati sa āgacchati tat sarvaṃ karoti śāntiṃ kartukāmena paṭasyāgrataḥ lakṣaṃ japet /
XXbsu041_u:18425: śuklapratipadamārabhya paṭasyāgrataḥ ghṛtakṣīrasahitāṃ tāmrabhājane sthāpya aṣṭaśatajaptpaṃ kṛtvā pibed divasāni sapta /
XXbsu041_u:18431: kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāmahorātroṣitaḥ nirbhayena bhūtvā tato vidyādhareṇa saptābhimantritena siṃhastāḍayitavyaḥ
XXbsu041_u:18441: yadā mriyati tadā yatrecchati tatra utpadyati //
XXbsu041_u:18443: punaḥ siṃhasādhanaṃ kartukāmena śuklapūrṇamāsyāṃ atyantamaunī kṣīrayāvakāhāro yāvadaparā paurṇamāsīti lakṣaṃ japet /
XXbsu041_u:18444: maunī pauṣadhiko vajrahataṃ kāṣṭhaṃ gṛhya kṣīre saptadivasāṃ sthāpayet /
XXbsu041_u:18445: tatodhṛtya śvetamṛttikayā candanodakaparivartitayā vajrahataṃ kāṣṭhaṃ snāpayet /
XXbsu041_u:18446: tataḥ sādhakaḥ poṣadhikena rūpakāreṇa siṃhaḥ kārayitavyaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:18447: tataḥ puṣyanakṣatre ratnatrayasyodārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā saṅghoddiṣṭakabhikṣavo bhojayitavyā /
XXbsu041_u:18448: paṭasyāgrataḥ udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā nānābali nivedya tataḥ sādhakena śucinā śucivastraprāvṛtena kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ dakṣiṇahastena siṃhamavaṣṭabhya tāvajjapet yāvat siṃhavaccalati /
XXbsu041_u:18464: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ sadhātuke caitya paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya paścāmānā mukhe pratiṣṭhāpya adṛśyo bhavati
XXbsu041_u:18466: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ parvataśikhare paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya gandhapuṣpairdhūpairabhyarcya lakṣatrayaṃ japet /
XXbsu041_u:18467: tataḥ bhasma balmīkamṛttikayā ca poṣadhiko gṛhya kṣīreṇāloḍya mardayitvā sugatavitastipramāṇāṃ mayūraḥ poṣadhikena citrakareṇa aśleṣakairvarṇaiścitrāpayitavyaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:18468: vivikte pradeśe gatvā paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya gandhapuṣpadhūpairabhyarcya sarvabhūtikāṃ baliṃ datvā tataḥ śucinā śucivastraprāvṛtena paṭasyāgrataḥ mayūraṃ sthāpya tāvajjaped yāvanmayūraścalati tato vidyādhareṇa aparājitapuṣpaiḥ pūrvaparijaptayā mūrtā śarāvasampuṭāṃ dakṣiṇahastenāvaṣṭabhya tāvajjapet yāvat śivārutaśabdaḥ śrūyate /
XXbsu041_u:18469: mantraṃ japatā sakhāyebhyo sattvā ātmano mukhe prakṣipya adṛśyo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:18471: / padmakesarasauvīramañjanaḥ śilāṃ samāṃ kṛtvā poṣadhikakanyāhaste pīṣayet
XXbsu041_u:18472: / (Vaidya 546) trilohapariveṣṭitaṃ kṛtvā kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ puṣyayogena maheśvarasya mūrttau sarvabhūtikaṃ baliṃ gandhapuṣpadhūpaiśca pūjāṃ kṛtvā śarāvasampuṭe sthāpya dakṣiṇahastena avaṣṭabhya tāvajjaped yāvat
XXbsu041_u:18474: bhagavata ekā nivedya sakhāyebhyo vibhajya ātmanaśca apāmārgasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ daśasahasrāṇi juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:18476: vaṃśarocanāṃ gṛhya tṛlohapariveṣṭitānāṃ guḍikānāṃ kṛtvā tataḥ śuciśuklavāso śmaśānaṃ gatvā gandhapuṣpadhūpaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā sārvabhautikaṃ baliṃ kṛtvā gulikā kapālasampuṭā pratiṣṭhāpya tāvajjaped yāvat kilakilāśavdaḥ śrūyate /
XXbsu041_u:18479: vibhajya ātmano mukhe prakṣipya adṛśyo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:18481: ulūkanetraṃ gṛhya añjanena saha kumārīhaste pīṣayet /
XXbsu041_u:18483: kṛtvā, guṭikāṃ śarāvasampuṭe sthāpya maheśvarasya dakṣiṇīyāṃ mūrttau
XXbsu041_u:18487: rājārkamayīṃ pratimāṃ ṣaḍaṅgulaṃ kṛtvā aśleṣakairvarṇakaiścitrāpayitvā sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitā tasyāgrataḥ ṣaṇmāsāṃ japet /
XXbsu041_u:18490: paṭasyāgrataḥ maunī ṣaṇmāsāṃ vāmakaratalamabhimantrya ayutaṃ parijapyaṃ sunihitaṃ nidhānaṃ labhati /
XXbsu041_u:18491: rājārkānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ daśasahasrāṇi samudragāminīṃ nadīmavatīrya arkapuṭe juhuyāt
XXbsu041_u:18501: mūlapaṭasyāgrataḥ udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā cakraṃ svastikamaśvatthapatre sthāpya paryaṅkopaviṣṭaḥ tāvajjaped yāvajvalitamiti /
XXbsu041_u:18502: tena gṛhītamātreṇa ākuñcitakuṇḍalakeśaḥ uditādityavarṇaḥ vidyādharacakravartī bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:18503: yaiśca dṛśyate yāṃśca paśyati taiḥ sahotpatati /
XXbsu041_u:18504: sudarśanamūlikāṃ gṛhya hastenāvaṣṭabhya tāva sahasrajaptāṃ kṛtvā haste badhvā yaṃ spṛśati sa vaśo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:18505: kuśamayaṃ cakraṃ gṛhītvā sahasraṃ japtvā jale prakṣipya nāgamuttiṣṭhati /
XXbsu041_u:18510: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā yat sādhayati tat sidhyati /
XXbsu041_u:18515: śuklapratipadamārabhya ahorātroṣitaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ brahmīsakarṣagāvyaghṛtakarṣaṃ kṣīrakaṣaṃ aṣṭaśataṃ parijapya pibed divasāni sapta /
XXbsu041_u:18517: paṭasyāgrataḥ nānāprakārasya bhakṣabhojyapiṭakaṃ sthāpya tāvajjaped yāvad bhaktamantarhitaṃ bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:18520: kṛtapuraścaraṇastrilohamayaṃ ṣoḍaśāraṃ cakraṃ kṛtvā kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ ahorātroṣitaḥ tripathe pūjāṃ kṛtvā upaviṣṭaḥ kalāpamātrāṃ manaḥśilāṃ mukhe prakṣipya tāvajjaped yāvanmukhaṃ sphuṭati manaḥśilāṃ siddhā bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:18521: tilakaṃ kṛtvā adṛśyaḥ kāmarūpī pañcavarṣaśatāni jīvati /
XXbsu041_u:18523: avare kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ ahorātroṣitaḥ śmaśānaṃ gatvā triśūlasya mahatī pūjāṃ kṛtvā paryaṅkopaviṣṭaḥ dakṣiṇahastena tṛśūlaṃ gṛhya tāvajjaped yāvat tṛśūlād raśmirniścarati /
XXbsu041_u:18526: śucau deśe paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya ahorātroṣitaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ puttalikāṃ kṛtvā vidhivat pūjayitvā bilvasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:18530: ahorātroṣitaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ karavīrapuṣpāṇāmekaṃ gṛhya nāgasthānaṃ gatvā puṣpaṃ nāgahrade prakṣipya mantramāvartayet /
XXbsu041_u:18538: vastre bhūrjapatre vā likhitvā dhvajāgre badhnīyāt /
XXbsu041_u:18540: udakasaktavāhāraḥ kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ vā trirātroṣita ekaliṅgaṃ gatvā liṅgopari dakṣiṇāyāṃ mūrtiṃ pādaṃ sthāpya vālaśollakena bandhayet muṣṭiṃ badhvā tāvajjaped yāvad rāvo niścarati marāmīti /
XXbsu041_u:18546: prātarutthāyodakaṃ saptābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā mukhaṃ prakṣālya yasya darśanaṃ dadāti sa vaśo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:18547: evaṃ tailenāhārakāma udakacūlake saptābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā pibet /
XXbsu041_u:18549: rājakulaṃ praviśatā cīvarāttaṃ gṛhya ekaviṃśativārāṃ parijapya vāmahastena granthiṃ kṛtvā apratihatavākyo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:18552: cchinnabhinnādhikānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ śālivrīhiśvetakaravīrasiddhārthakaiḥ pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā paṭasyāgrataḥ vāmahastenāvaṣṭabhyāṣṭasahasraṃ japet /
XXbsu041_u:18555: anenaiva vidhānena ghṛtasarjarasaṃ dahatā śatasahasraṃ japet /
XXbsu041_u:18557: anenaiva vidhānena stūpaṃ kṛtvā candanābhyaktānāṃ padmānāṃ śatasahasraṃ nivedayet /
XXbsu041_u:18559: sugatavitastipramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ kṛtvā dhūpaṃ ca dahatā campakapuṣpāṇāṃ śatasahasraṃ nivedayet
XXbsu041_u:18561: sugatavitastipramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ kṛtvā pratikṛtimālikhya vāmapādenāvaṣṭabhya aṣṭasahasraṃ japet
XXbsu041_u:18563: sugatavitastipramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ kṛtvā vivāhalājānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāmagnāvaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt
XXbsu041_u:18565: prabhāte snātvā anenaiva mantreṇa nirmathya navanītaṃ grahāya udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā dhūpaṃ dahatāṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ dantairaspṛśya graset /
XXbsu041_u:18568: sarvagandhānāṃ vīravikrayakrītānāṃ trirātroṣitaḥ paṭasyodārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā ghṛtapradīpaṃ prajvālya svayameva mantraṃ japet /
XXbsu041_u:18569: tena puttalikāṃ kṛtvā saptānāmuparyaśvatthapatrāṇāmupario sthāpya tāvajjaped yāvat prasandhitā iti /
XXbsu041_u:18570: taṃ cūrṇaṃ kṛtvā yaṃ spṛśyati sa vaśo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:18571: anenaiva vidhinā nāgakesaracūrṇasya pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā dhūpaśarāveṣu aṣṭaśataṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:18575: goṣṭhaṃ gatvā paṭasyāgrataḥ apatitagomayena hastocchritaṃ stūpaṃ kṛtvā vidhivat pūjayitvā gugguluṃ dahatāṃ śatasahasraṃ japtavyam /
XXbsu041_u:18577: asaṃvatsarajātasya pradeśinīmaṅgulīṃ gṛhya hastapramāṇaṃ caityaṃ kṛtvā śmaśāne vidhivat pūjāṃ kṛtvā prāṅmukhopaviṣṭaḥ kuśasaṃstare tāmaṅguliṃ nivedya pradeśinyāṅgulyāvaṣṭabhya tāvajjaped yāvad raśmirniścarati /
XXbsu041_u:18579: kṛtarakṣāstā rājyaṃ gṛhya prabhāte tayāṅgulyā yamākarṣayati sa vaśaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:18580: trirātroṣitaḥ samānavatsāyā goḥ payasvinyāḥ kṣīraṃ gṛhya paṭasyāgrataḥ maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā ghṛtapradīpaṃ prajvālya kuśasaṃstarasthamaṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā mṛdbhājane kṣīraṃ kuryāt /
XXbsu041_u:18582: tato maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā caturṣu diśāpālān (Vaidya 548) sthāpya dvitīyamaṇḍale prabodhako sarṣapahastaḥ tṛtīyamaṇḍale susahāyo vā mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā kṛtarakṣaḥ prāṅmukhopaviṣṭaḥ
XXbsu041_u:18584: prathamenāñjitākṣaḥ yaṃ paśyati ye ca paśyanti sarve te vaśā bhavanti /
XXbsu041_u:18587: antardhānikānāṃ aṣṭasahasrābhimantritā jvalita uditādityavaṇaḥ ratnālaṅkṛtaśarīraḥ kalpāntarasthāyī aṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā śatrumadhye praviśed bhayaṃ na bhavati avadhyaḥ sarvaśatrūm āveśanaṃ śvetapuṣpeṇa nṛtyāpanamudakena trijaptena karavīrapuṣpeṇa trijaptenāharet /
XXbsu041_u:18590: añjanaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ vīrakrayakrītaṃ sauvīrāñjanaṃ gṛhya prāṇakānyapanīya pañcagavyenottaramukhayā pīṣayet /
XXbsu041_u:18591: anāmikayāṅgulyā catasro gulikā kṛtvā padmapatreṇācchādya śoṣayet /
XXbsu041_u:18592: paṭasyāgrataḥ vidhivadagniṃ prajvālya sahasrasampātāhutiṃ kṛtvā sadhātuke caitye udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā aṣṭabhirdigbhiḥ palāśakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya śikkakaṭipradeśe sthāpayet /
XXbsu041_u:18598: aṅguliṃ parijapya yaṃ tarjayati sa vaśo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:18601: sadhātuke caitye paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya tasyāgrata udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā śvetapadmānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ bilvakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya lakṣaṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:18604: gorocanā manaḥśilāṃ vā paṭasyāgrataḥ sahasraṃ japet /

XXbsu041_u:19024: candragrahe bodhivṛkṣasyādhastāt gandhapuṣpadhūpaiśca pūjāṃ kṛtvā manaḥśilāṃ rocanāṃ ekaviṃśativārāṃ parijapya śirasyopari mārjayet /
XXbsu041_u:19029: yasya nāmaṃ grahāya sa vaśo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:19031: pūrṇamāsyāṃ caturbhiḥ kalaśairudakaparipūrṇairaṣṭasahasrābhimantritai rājānaṃ rājamātraṃ vā snāpayet /
XXbsu041_u:19033: asādhyamānāyāḥ kṣīrasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya vidyānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtānāṃ śatasahasraṃ juhuyāt
XXbsu041_u:19042: kṛṣṇavrīhi yasyoddiśya parijapya hūyate sa vaśyo bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:19044: paṭasyāgrataḥ bilvakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya agarusamidhānāṃ śatasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:19049: sarveṣāṃ homānāṃ (Vaidya 556) gandhapuṣpadhūpanaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā homamārabhet /
XXbsu041_u:19054: sadhātuke caitye gandhapuṣpadhūpaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā prāgutthitaḥ śucirbhūtvā agniṃ prajvālya nāgakesarapriyaṅgu aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:19058: udumbarakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya vāṣakasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ śatasahasraṃ juhuyāt
XXbsu041_u:19059: śatasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā haste baddhvā yuddhe 'parājito bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:19061: kṛṣṇapañcamyāṃ nadīṃ gatvā śvetapuṣpāṇāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ pravāhayet /
XXbsu041_u:19066: kṛṣṇapañcamyāṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ ahorātroṣitena śuklanantake gorocanāṃ sthāpya tāvajjaped yāvat trividhā siddhiḥ /
XXbsu041_u:19071: padmānāṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt trisandhyaṃ divasāni sapta /
XXbsu041_u:19081: kṛṣṇacaturdaśyā rātroṣitaḥ rātrau āryamañjuśriyasyāgrataḥ nirmālya dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ daśasahasrāṇi juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:19087: ete karma trirātroṣitena bodhivṛkṣasyādhastāt kṣīrasamidbhi agniṃ prajvālya guggulugulikānāṃ karpāsāsthipramāṇānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:19093: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ manaḥśilāṃ gṛhya mānuṣakṣīreṇa pīṣayitvā sahasrasampātāhutiṃ kṛtvā poṣadhikaḥ pañcagulikāṃ kṛtvā āgarumaye samudgake prakṣipya śvetasiddhārthakasahitānāṃ candragrahe sūryagrahe vā balividhānaṃ kṛtvā paṭasyāgrataḥ samudgake sthāpya tāvajjapet yāvat sarṣapā ciṭiciṭāyanti tadā sarvasattvavaśīkaraṇaṃ karoti /
XXbsu041_u:19096: atha prajvalati, tadā devakumāraḥ uditādityasamaprabhaḥ mahākalpasthāyī vidyādhararājā bhavati /
XXbsu041_u:19099: śāntiṃ kartukāmena yājñikaiḥ samidbhiragniṃ prajvālya paramānnamaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt trirātram
XXbsu041_u:19101: ātmanaḥ parasya vā saptarātreṇa grāmasya nagarasyānāvṛṣṭau trimadhuraṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:19108: ghṛtamadhu āmalakīrasaṃ samabhāgāni tāmrabhājane sthāpya paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā tāvajjaped yāvadūṣmāyati
XXbsu041_u:19110: poṣadhiko vikāle udakaculakaṃ saptavārāṃ parijapya pātavyam /
XXbsu041_u:19112: śvetavacāṃ saptavārāṃ parijapya mukhe dantāntare prakṣipya yaṃ yācati taṃ labhate /
XXbsu041_u:19114: yaṃ yameva bhāvaṃ manasi kṛtvā japati taṃ tathāgatasya purataḥ puṣpagandhādīn dattvā diśābaliṃ ca caturdiśaṃ kṣipet /
XXbsu041_u:19117: valmīkamṛttikayā siṃhaṃ kṛtvā gorocanayā samālabhya paṭasyāgrataḥ kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ piṇḍakāṃ kṛtvā sthāpya lakṣatrayaṃ japet /
XXbsu041_u:19124: sarvavrīhigandhodakakalaśaṃ paripūrṇaṃ kalaśaṃ āmrapallavamukhapracchāditaṃ kṛtvā aṣṭasahasrābhimantritena vināyakaṃ snāpaya /
XXbsu041_u:19132: mahāsāmantavaśīkaraṇe paṭasyāgrataḥ arkasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt saptarātraṃ trisandhyam /
XXbsu041_u:19134: rājakanyāyai priyaṅgukusumānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt saptāhā yasya dīyate /
XXbsu041_u:19137: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ sadhātuke caitye lakṣaṃ japte bhikṣāhāraḥ
XXbsu041_u:19138: / tataḥ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ ekarātroṣitaḥ paṭasya yathāvibhavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā kṛṣṇatilānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:19142: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ nadītaṭe paścābhimukhaṃ paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya udakasaktavāhāraḥ yathāvibhavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā ghṛtapradīpāṃ ekaviṃśatipradīpāṃ prajvālya bahiḥ sārvabhūtikāḥ baliṃ nivedya
XXbsu041_u:19146: tataḥ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ gocarmamātraṃ sthaṇḍilakamupalipya sarvarasikaṃ baliṃ nivedyam /
XXbsu041_u:19147: bahiḥ sarvabhūtikaṃ baliṃ dattvā tataḥ kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ nirdhūmāṅgāreṣu guggulugulikānāṃ badarāsthipramāṇānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
XXbsu041_u:19150: sā bravīti kiṃ karomīti mātā bhaginī sakhī eṣāmekatamaṃ grāhyam /
XXbsu041_u:19154: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ sadhātuke caitye yathāvibhavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā triḥkālasnāyī tṛsandhyaṃ ṣaṇmāsāṃ aparimito jāpaḥ /
XXbsu041_u:19157: kṛṣṇapakṣe puṣyanakṣatre karavīrikāṃ manaḥśilāṃ vīrakrayakrītāṃ gṛhya pañcagavyena saṃśodhya brāhmaṇakanyāṃ vāmoṣadhaṃ dattvā snānālaṅkṛtāṃ kṛtvā pūrvābhimukhe praviśya tithikaraṇamuhūrtena pīṣayet /
XXbsu041_u:19158: anāmikāṅgulyā viṣamāṃ badarāsthipramāṇāṃ gulikāṃ kṛtvā aśvatthasamudgake prakṣipya paṭasyāgrataḥ sahasrasampātābhihutaṃ kṛtvā saptarātroṣitaṃ ca ante śuklapakṣe udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā udāratarīṃ baliṃ (Vaidya 558) nivedya gandhapuṣpadhūpārcitaṃ samudgakaṃ kṛtvā caturbhiraśvatthapatrai sthāpya tribhirācchādya hastenāvaṣṭabhya sarvabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ namaskāraṃ kṛtvā kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ tāvajjaped yāvad rasarasāyanādīni dravyāni dadanti /
XXbsu041_u:19170: vastrakarṇake mṛṇmayīṃ mudrāṃ kṛtvā aṣṭasahasrābhimantrya daṣṭakopari sthāpayitvā ākarṣayet
XXbsu041_u:19173: dravyāṇāṃ ca manaḥśilādīnāṃ khaḍgacakramusuṇḍyādīnāṃ pañcagavyena śodhayitvā sahasrasampātāhutiṃ kṛtvā anyatamaṃ dravyaṃ gṛhya pūrṇamāsyāṃ sādhanamaṇḍalaṃ likhya vastropari dravyaṃ sthāpya paryaṅkopaviṣṭaḥ tāvajjaped yāvat siddhirbhavati /
XXbsu041_u:19174: phalake yamicchati dravyaṃ tasya tasya nāmaṃ likhya aṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā yatra nāgastiṣṭhati tatra hrade kṣeptavyā /
XXbsu041_u:19177: kūpe hrade vābhilaṣitavyaṃ nāmaṃ likhya dravyādīnāṃ phalake tathaiva hrade kṣeptavyam /
XXbsu041_u:19182: nadīsantārakādau daśaṣu ca sabhāyāṃ rājakule vā vivāde vā smartavyam /
XXbsu041_u:19184: yamicchati vaśaṃ kartum tasya mukhe āryamañjuśriyaṃ dhyātvā kiñcit sambhāṣaṇaṃ kuryāt /
XXbsu041_u:19189: tatroktena vidhānena maṇḍalaṃ praviṣṭa sampūrṇasya vṛṣasya apatitagomayaṃ gṛhya haviṣyāhāraḥ samaunī maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā tāvajjapet paurṇamāsyāṃ ārabhya yāvat tṛtīyamapi lakṣaṃ japet /
XXbsu041_u:19198: svasti śrīrājamaṅgalakāvasthitena mārgaśīrṣaśuklā + + + padānakṣatre siṃhasthe 'pi gurau mañjuśrīkalpaṃ samāptamiti /
XXbsu041_u:19199: śrīmūlaghoṣavihārādhipatinā śrībo + + + madhyadeśād vinirgatena paṇḍitaravicandreṇa likhitamiti
